name: ClonePage
content:
<skuidpage showsidebar="true" showheader="true" tabtooverride="skuid__Page__c" unsavedchangeswarning="" globalfeedbackenabled="false">
  <labels/>
  <models>
    <model id="PageData" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c" doclone="yes" datasourcetype="" type="">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
        <field id="OwnerId"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="Owner.Name" targetobjects="User"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__IsMaster__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Max_Auto_Saves__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" value="Id" field="Id" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <components>
    <pagetitle model="PageData">
      <maintitle>Clone {{Model.Label}}</maintitle>
      <subtitle>
        <template>{{Model.Label}}</template>
      </subtitle>
      <actions>
        <action type="savecancel" afterSave="/{{Id}}" afterCancel="/{{$Param.id}}" saveLabel="Create Cloned Page" window="self">
          <savehotkeys>
            <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="s"/>
            <hotkey modifiers="meta" key="s"/>
          </savehotkeys>
          <cancelhotkeys/>
          <renderconditions/>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </pagetitle>
    <basicfieldeditor showsavecancel="false" showheader="true" model="PageData" mode="edit">
      <columns>
        <column width="100%">
          <sections>
            <section title="New Page Information">
              <fields>
                <field id="Name" required="true"/>
                <field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
                <field id="OwnerId">
                  <label>Page Owner</label>
                  <filters/>
                </field>
              </fields>
            </section>
          </sections>
        </column>
      </columns>
    </basicfieldeditor>
  </components>
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="setDefaultsOnClonedRecord" url="">
// When cloning Pages in protected modules,
// we want to set the default Module to be '' instead.
// Also, when the Owner.Name is 'Skuid',
// we want to set the OwnerId to be the running user.
$j().ready(function(){
    var model = skuid.model.getModel('PageData');

    if (model && model.data.length) {
        var row = model.getFirstRow(),
            needToRedraw = false;
        if (model.getFieldValue(row,'Owner.Name') == 'Skuid') {
            model.updateRow(row,'OwnerId',skuid.utils.userInfo.userId);
            model.updateRow(row,'Owner',{Name:skuid.utils.userInfo.name});
            needToRedraw = true;
        }
        
        if (model.getFieldValue(row,'skuid__Module__c') == 'Skuid') {
            model.updateRow(row,'skuid__Module__c',null);
            needToRedraw = true;
        }

        // Now redraw our list, if necessary
        if (needToRedraw) {
            $j.each(model.registeredLists,function(listId,list){
                list.render({doNotCache:true});
            });
        }

    }
});
</jsitem>
    </javascript>
    <css/>
  </resources>
</skuidpage>

name: CredentialsManagement
content:
<skuid__page unsavedchangeswarning="yes" globalfeedbackenabled="false" personalizationmode="server" theme="Skuid App">
  <models>
    <model id="cm_ModelDataSources" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="" type="" sobject="skuid__Model_Service__c" doclone="" orderby="Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="user" field="skuid__Credential_Source__c" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="cm_AuthProviders" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" type="" sobject="skuid__Auth_Provider__c" doclone="" orderby="Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_Url__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Client_Id__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Default_Scopes__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__OAuth_Grant_Type__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="oauth2" field="skuid__Auth_Method__c" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="cm_ModelDataSourceCreds" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="" type="" sobject="skuid__Model_Service_Credential__c" orderby="skuid__Service_Name__c" doclone="" processonclient="true" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false" datasource="salesforce" label="Data Source Credential" labelplural="Data Source Credentials">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Applies_To__c" overridemetadata="true" required="true"/>
        <field id="skuid__Service_Name__c" overridemetadata="true" required="true"/>
        <field id="skuid__Username__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="TEXT" length="80"/>
        <field id="skuid__Password__c"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedById"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedBy.Name"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedDate" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="DATETIME" displaytype="DATE"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.credentialsManagement.populateDataSourceCredentials"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>models.loaded</event>
          </events>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="cm_OAuthCredentials" sobject="skuid__Auth_Provider_Credential__c" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" type="" limit="" orderby="skuid__Auth_Provider__c" label="OAuth Credential" labelplural="OAuth Credentials" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Auth_Provider__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Access_Token_Expiration__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Access_Token_Issued__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Access_Token__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Refresh_Token__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Refresh_Token_Issued__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Times_Refresh_Token_Used__c"/>
        <field id="Auth_Provider_Name__ui" label="Auth Provider" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" returntype="TEXT" readonly="true">
          <formula>MODEL_LOOKUP("cm_AuthProviders","Name","Id",{{skuid__Auth_Provider__c}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="Auth_Provider_Oauth_Type__ui" label="Auth Provider Type" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" returntype="TEXT" readonly="true">
          <formula>MODEL_LOOKUP("cm_AuthProviders","skuid__Type__c","Id",{{skuid__Auth_Provider__c}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="action" label="Action" displaytype="TEXT" accessible="true" createable="true" editable="true" filterable="false" required="false" uionly="true"/>
        <field id="AccessToken__ui" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" label="Has Access Token" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">
          <formula>!ISBLANK({{skuid__Access_Token__c}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="RefreshToken__ui" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" label="Has Refresh Token" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">
          <formula>!ISBLANK({{skuid__Refresh_Token__c}})</formula>
        </field>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <events>
            <event>models.loaded</event>
          </events>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.credentialsManagement.populateOAuthCredentials"/>
          </actions>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="cm_EncryptionSettings" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="" type="" sobject="skuid__Encryption_Settings__c" datasource="salesforce">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__JobId__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="userinfo" value="" field="SetupOwnerId" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" userinfotype="organizationid"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <pageregioncontents>
    <pageregioncontent regionid="sk-1uFo3V-67" uniqueid="sk-2ghgL6-74">
      <components>
        <skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-z4L-30244">

                  <divisions>

                  <divisions>

                      <components/>

                    <division alignSelf="auto" ratio="1" maxWidth="1440px" minWidth="100%">
                      <components>

                          <tabs>
                            <!-- This tab is behind a feature flag that doesn't exist and the work for it is not yet done, more details in CORE-1288 -->

                                                                  <skuid__text contents="Are you sure you want to permanently delete this credential? <strong>You can&#39;t undo this.</strong>" uniqueid="sk-wJU-29713"/>
                                                                </components>
                                                                <buttons>
                                                                  <skuid__button label="Yes, delete credential" uniqueId="sk-wJk-31282" styleSettingsVariant="destructive">
                                                                    <renderConditions logictype="and"/>
                                                                    <enableConditions/>
                                                                    <styleVariantConditions/>
                                                                    <actions>
                                                                      <action type="save">

                                                                          <model>cm_ModelDataSourceCreds</model>
                                                                        </models>
                                                                        <onerroractions>
                                                                          <action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000"/>
                                                                        </onerroractions>
                                                                      </action>
                                                                      <action type="closeAllPopups"/>
                                                                    </actions>
                                                                  </skuid__button>
                                                                  <skuid__button label="Cancel" uniqueId="sk-wJk-31540">
                                                                    <actions>
                                                                      <action type="cancel">
                                                                        <models>
                                                                          <model>cm_ModelDataSourceCreds</model>
                                                                        </models>
                                                                      </action>
                                                                      <action type="closeAllPopups"/>
                                                                    </actions>
                                                                    <renderConditions logictype="and"/>
                                                                    <enableConditions/>
                                                                    <styleVariantConditions/>
                                                                  </skuid__button>
                                                                </buttons>
                                                                <afterCloseActions>
                                                                  <action type="cancel">
                                                                    <models>
                                                                      <model>cm_ModelDataSourceCreds</model>
                                                                    </models>
                                                                  </action>
                                                                </afterCloseActions>
                                                              </skuid__modal>
                                                            </action>
                                                          </actions>
                                                        </option>
                                                      </options>
                                                    </optionGroup>
                                                  </optionGroups>
                                                </action>
                                              </actions>
                                            </action>
                                          </rowActions>
                                          <massActions/>
                                          <styles>
                                            <spacing/>
                                          </styles>
                                        </skuid__table>
                                      </components>
                                      <background/>
                                      <styles>
                                        <spacing top="5" bottom="5"/>
                                      </styles>
                                      <renderConditions logictype="and">
                                      </renderConditions>
                                      <styleVariantConditions/>
                                    </skuid__wrapper>
                                  </components>
                                  <background/>
                                  <styles>
                                    <spacing/>
                                  </styles>
                                </skuid__wrapper>
                              </components>
                            </skuid__tabPanel>
                          </tabs>
                          <renderConditions logictype="and"/>
                          <styles>
                            <spacing left="5" right="5"/>
                          </styles>
                        </skuid__tabSet>
                      </components>
                    </division>
                    <division alignSelf="auto" minWidth="0px" ratio="1">
                      <components/>
                    </division>
                  </divisions>
                </skuid__grid>
              </components>
              <background color="white"/>
              <styles>
                <spacing top="-5.125"/>
              </styles>
            </skuid__wrapper>
          </components>
          <background color="white"/>
          <renderConditions logictype="and"/>
          <styleVariantConditions/>
          <styles>
            <spacing/>
          </styles>
        </skuid__wrapper>
      </components>
    </pageregioncontent>
  </pageregioncontents>
  <components/>
  <resources>
    <labels>
      <label id="MyCredentials"/>
      <label id="DataSource"/>
      <label id="Username"/>
      <label id="Password"/>
    </labels>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="next" filepath="js/skuidPages/skuidCredentialsManagement.js" cachelocation="false" namespace="skuid"/>
    </javascript>
    <actionsequences/>
  </resources>
</skuid__page>

name: DataSources
content:
<skuid__page unsavedchangeswarning="yes" theme="Skuid App">
	<models>
		<model id="page_ui_control" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="Ui-Only">
			<fields>
				<field id="DSsortby" displaytype="PICKLIST" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="-updated_at">
					<picklistentries>

						<entry value="name" label="Name A-Z"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="AUTHsortby" displaytype="PICKLIST" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="-updated_at">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="-updated_at" label="Last Updated"/>
						<entry value="name" label="Name A-Z"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
			</fields>
			<conditions/>
			<actions>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="page_ui_control">
							<formula>{{DSsortby}} === "name"</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="sortModel" client-side="true" model="stng__ModelDataSources" method="asc" field="Name"/>
							</iftrueactions>
						</action>
						<action type="sortModel" client-side="true" model="stng__ModelDataSources" method="desc" field="LastModifiedDate"/>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>DSsortby</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="page_ui_control">
							<formula>{{AUTHsortby}} === "name"</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="sortModel" client-side="true" model="stng__AuthProviders" method="asc" field="Name"/>
							</iftrueactions>
						</action>
						<action type="sortModel" client-side="true" model="stng__AuthProviders" method="desc" field="LastModifiedDate"/>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>AUTHsortby</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
			</actions>

																																									<skuid__field id="publicKey" showHelp="belowlabel"/>
																																								</fields>
																																							</row>
																																						</rows>
																																					</section>
																																				</sections>
																																			</skuid__form>
																																		</components>
																																		<buttons>
																																			<skuid__button label="Save" uniqueId="sk-1y6s-31247" styleSettingsVariant="primary">
																																				<actions>
																																					<action type="blockUI" message="Updating..." styleSettingsVariant="dark" showPlaceholder="true"/>
																																					<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.settings.dataSources.modifyDataServiceConfig">
																																						<onerroractions>
																																							<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="5000" subtext="{{$PreviousAction.error}}" styleSettingsVariant="dark"/>
																																						</onerroractions>
																																					</action>
																																					<action type="publish" event-scope="global" event-name="skuid.settings.jwtSigningCertificateChanged"/>
																																					<action type="unblockUI"/>
																																					<action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
																																				</actions>
																																				<enableconditions logictype="and" message="No changes have been made.">
																																					<condition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="stng__ModifyDataServiceSettings" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="skipandnorender" field="certificateName" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
																																					<condition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="stng__ModifyDataServiceSettings" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="skipandnorender" field="publicKey" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
																																				</enableconditions>
																																			</skuid__button>
																																			<skuid__button label="Cancel" uniqueId="sk-1y6s-31622">
																																				<actions>
																																					<action type="closeAllPopups"/>
																																				</actions>
																																			</skuid__button>
																																		</buttons>
																																		<afterCloseActions>
																																			<action type="emptyModelData">
																																				<models>
																																					<model>stng__ModifyDataServiceSettings</model>
																																				</models>
																																			</action>
																																		</afterCloseActions>
																																	</skuid__modal>
																																</action>
																															</actions>
																														</skuid__button>
																													</buttons>
																												</skuid__buttonGroup>
																											</groups>
																											</skuid__buttonSet>
																										<skuid__buttonSet uniqueid="sk-1ko9-20634" position="left">
																											<groups>
																												<skuid__buttonGroup>
																													<buttons>
																														<skuid__button label="Save" uniqueid="button-dataservices-save" styleSettingsVariant="primary">
																															<actions>
																																<action type="custom" snippet="validateDataServiceName">
																																	<onerroractions>
																																		<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error saving the data service: name must must only contain alpha-numeric characters, underscores, and dashes" timeout="3000" styleSettingsVariant="dark"/>
																																	</onerroractions>
																																	</action>
																																	<action type="save">
																																	<models>
																																		<model>stng__DataServices</model>
																																	</models>
																																</action>
																																<action type="showToast" duration="4" styleSettingsVariant="default" message="Data services saved"/>
																															</actions>
																															<hotkeys>
																																<hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="s"/>
																															</hotkeys>
																															<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
																															<enableConditions logictype="and">
																																<condition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="stng__DataServices" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasChanged" value="true" operator="="/>
																															</enableConditions>
																														</skuid__button>
																														<skuid__button label="Cancel" uniqueid="button-dataservices-cancel">
																															<actions>
																																<action type="cancel">
																																	<models>
																																		<model>stng__DataServices</model>
																																	</models>
																																</action>
																															</actions>
																															<hotkeys>
																																<hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="s"/>
																															</hotkeys>
																															<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
																															<enableConditions logictype="and">
																																<condition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="stng__DataServices" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasChanged" value="true" operator="="/>
																															</enableConditions>
																														</skuid__button>
																													</buttons>
																												</skuid__buttonGroup>
																											</groups>
																											<styles>
																												<spacing top="4"/>
																											</styles>
																											<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
																										</skuid__buttonSet>
																									</components>
																								</division>
																								<division alignSelf="auto" minWidth="100px" ratio="1">
																									<components/>
																								</division>
																							</divisions>
																						</skuid__grid>
																					</components>
																					<background/>
																					<styles>
																						<spacing bottom="4"/>
																					</styles>
																				</skuid__wrapper>
																			</components>
																			<background/>
																			<styles>
																				<spacing top="5"/>
																			</styles>
																		</skuid__wrapper>
																	</components>
																	<background/>
																	<styles>
																		<spacing/>
																	</styles>
																</skuid__wrapper>
															</components>
															<onInitialShowActions>

															</onInitialShowActions>
															<onShowActions/>
															<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
														</skuid__tabPanel>
													</tabs>
													<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
													<styles>
														<spacing left="5" right="5"/>
													</styles>
												</skuid__tabSet>
											</components>
										</division>
										<division alignSelf="auto" minWidth="0px" ratio="1">
											<components/>
										</division>

								</skuid__grid>
							</components>

					<styleVariantConditions/>
					<styles>

				</skuid__wrapper>

	</pageregioncontents>

								<skuid__button label="Cancel" uniqueid="button-datasource-delete-cancel">

name: DesignSystemList
content:
<skuid__page unsavedchangeswarning="yes" theme="Skuid App">
	<models>
		<model id="page_ui_control" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="Ui-Only">
			<fields>
				<field id="sortby" displaytype="PICKLIST" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="-updated_at">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="-updated_at" label="Last Updated"/>
						<entry value="name" label="Name A-Z"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
			</fields>
			<conditions/>
			<actions>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="page_ui_control">
							<formula>{{sortby}} === "name"</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="sortModel" client-side="true" model="stng__Design_Systems" method="asc" field="Name"/>
							</iftrueactions>
						</action>
						<action type="sortModel" client-side="true" model="stng__Design_Systems" method="desc" field="LastModifiedDate"/>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>sortby</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
			</actions>
		</model>
		<!-- control if blank state shows -->
		<model id="stng__Themes_UI_Control" limit="2" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Theme__c" doclone="" datasource="salesforce">
			<fields>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="Id"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="multiple" value="" field="Name" operator="not in" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
					<values>
						<value>Ink</value>
						<value>Ink Composer Dark</value>
						<value>Ink Composer Light</value>
						<value>Lightning</value>
						<value>Skuid App</value>
						<value>Composer Dark</value>
						<value>Composer Light</value>
						<value>Classic</value>
						<value>Modern</value>
						<value>Paper</value>
						<value>Composer Light</value>
						<value>Composer Dark</value>
						<value>Clean Green</value>
						<value>Cool Grey</value>
						<value>Dynamics</value>
						<value>Glacial</value>
						<value>Ice Age</value>
						<value>Ink</value>
						<value>Investor</value>
						<value>Lightning Design</value>
						<value>Slated</value>
						<value>Material Blue</value>
						<value>MobileClassic</value>
						<value>Ice Age Mobile</value>
						<value>Material Blue Mobile</value>
						<value>Northern Lights Mobile</value>
						<value>Cool Grey Mobile</value>
					</values>
				</condition>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<!-- check if name is duplicate when creating new theme -->
		<model id="DuplicateCheck" limit="" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Theme__c" doclone="" datasource="salesforce">
			<fields>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="Id"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
			<condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Name" clientorserver="server" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="searchname"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<!-- list all user created design systems -->
		<model id="stng__Design_Systems" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Theme__c" doclone="" orderby="LastModifiedDate DESC" datasource="salesforce" label="Design System" labelPlural="Design Systems">
			<fields>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="skuid__Resource_Name__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Resource_Namespace__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Type__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="Ink" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="Desktop" label="v1"/>
						<entry value="Ink" label="v2"/>
						<entry value="Mobile" label="v1 (mobile)"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="skuid__Active__c"/>
				<field id="Id"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedById"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedBy.Name"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedBy.SmallPhotoUrl"/>
				<field id="CreatedDate"/>
				<field id="CreatedById"/>
				<field id="CreatedBy.Name"/>
				<field id="skuid__Skuid_Version_Date__c"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
				<field id="pretty_update_date" displaytype="FORMULA" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT" uionly="true">
					<formula>IF({{CreatedDate}}={{LastModifiedDate}},
					JOIN_TEXT( " ","Created", DATE_DIFF({{LastModifiedDate}}) ),
					JOIN_TEXT( " ","Updated", DATE_DIFF({{LastModifiedDate}}) )
					)
					</formula>
				</field>
				<field id="isV2" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">
					<formula>{{skuid__Type__c}} === "Ink"</formula>
				</field>
				<field id="marked_as_default" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="false" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">
					<formula>{{{Name}}} === MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__OrgPreferences","skuid__Default_Theme__c")</formula>
				</field>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="multiple" value="" field="Name" operator="not in" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
					<values>
						<value>Ink</value>
						<value>Ink Composer Dark</value>
						<value>Ink Composer Light</value>
						<value>Lightning</value>
						<value>Skuid App</value>
						<value>Composer Dark</value>
						<value>Composer Light</value>
						<value>Classic</value>
						<value>Modern</value>
						<value>Paper</value>
						<value>Composer Light</value>
						<value>Composer Dark</value>
						<value>Clean Green</value>
						<value>Cool Grey</value>
						<value>Dynamics</value>
						<value>Glacial</value>
						<value>Ice Age</value>
						<value>Ink</value>
						<value>Investor</value>
						<value>Lightning Design</value>
						<value>Slated</value>
						<value>Material Blue</value>
						<value>MobileClassic</value>
						<value>Ice Age Mobile</value>
						<value>Material Blue Mobile</value>
						<value>Northern Lights Mobile</value>
						<value>Cool Grey Mobile</value>
					</values>
				</condition>
				<condition type="userinfo" value="" field="LastModifiedById" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="LastModifiedByMe" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" userinfotype="userid" clientorserver="server"/>

			<jsitem location="inline" name="buttonHider" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
  var $ = skuid.$;
  function checkShow(rows, field){
    var filteredRows = rows.filter(function(row) { 
      return skuid.themeBuilder.utils.baseThemes.indexOf(row.skuid__Resource_Name__c) === -1; 
    });
    var model = skuid.$M("UiDriver"),
        record = model.getFirstRow(),
        shouldShowButton = false;
    $.each(filteredRows, function(i, el){
        if(el.skuid__Skuid_Version_Date__c != skuid.version.date && el.skuid__Skuid_Version_Date__c != '-1'){
            shouldShowButton = true;
        }
    });
    var recordUpdate = {};
    recordUpdate[field] = shouldShowButton;
    model.updateRow(record, recordUpdate);
  }
  function getRowsInModels(modelIds) {
      var rows = [];
      modelIds.forEach(function(modelId){
         var model = skuid.$M(modelId);
         if (model) {
             var modelRows = model.getRows();
             if (modelRows && modelRows.length) {
                 Array.prototype.push.apply(rows, modelRows);
             }
         }
      });
      return rows;
  }
  skuid.events.subscribe('models.saved', function(data){
        checkShow(getRowsInModels([
          "stng__Design_Systems",
        ]), "showUpdateDesignSystemsButton");
  });

  $(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
        checkShow(getRowsInModels([
          "stng__Design_Systems",
        ]), "showUpdateDesignSystemsButton");
      
  });
})(skuid);</jsitem>

			<actionsequence id="2238a2ac-5a2f-4856-b430-5968ab0244bf" label="Clone Design System" type="reusable">
				<actions>

						</defaults>
					</action>
					<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.loadJSZip"/>

									</group>
									<renderConditions logictype="and">

									</styles>

								<skuid__form showErrorsInline="true" model="stng__Design_System_New" uniqueid="form-designsystems-clone" mode="edit">

											<rows>

													<fields>
														<skuid__field id="Name" uniqueid="field-designsystems-clone-name" showHelp="true"/>
													</fields>
												</row>
											</rows>
										</section>
									</sections>
								</skuid__form>
							</components>
							<buttons>
								<skuid__button label="Create" uniqueid="button-designsystems-clone-save" styleSettingsVariant="primary">
									<actions>
										<action type="blockUI" message="Creating initial Design System files..."/>
										<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.theme.createDSResource">

												<action type="blockUI" message="Error creating Design System resources" timeout="3000"/>
											</onerroractions>
										</action>
										<action type="save" rollbackonanyerror="true">
											<models>
												<model>stng__Design_System_New</model>
											</models>
											<onerroractions>
												<action type="blockUI" message="Error: {{insertResults.0.errors.0.message}}" timeout="3000"/>
											</onerroractions>
										</action>
										<action type="redirect" window="self" url="/apex/skuid__EditDesignSystem?id={{$Model.stng__Design_System_New.data.0.Id}}"/>
										<action type="closeAllPopups"/>
									</actions>
									<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
									<enableConditions logictype="and">
										<condition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="stng__Design_System_New" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="Name" fieldtargetobjects="salesforce" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>

									</enableConditions>

									<actions>
										<action type="cancel">
											<models>
												<model>stng__Design_System_New</model>
											</models>
										</action>
										<action type="closeAllPopups"/>
									</actions>
								</skuid__button>
							</buttons>
							<afterCloseActions>
								<action type="cancel">
									<models>
										<model>stng__Design_System_New</model>
									</models>
								</action>
								<action type="emptyModelData">
									<models>
										<model>stng__Design_System_New</model>
									</models>
								</action>
							</afterCloseActions>
						</skuid__modal>

				</actions>
				<inputs>
					<input type="value" name="name"/>
					<input type="value" name="type"/>
				</inputs>
			</actionsequence>
			<actionsequence id="493e03ba-3fbf-4dcf-bee7-f7924a754a99" label="SelectedNav" type="event-triggered" event-scope="component" event-name="page.rendered">
				<description/>

			</actionsequence>

	</resources>
</skuid__page>

name: DesignSystemManager
content:
<skuid__page unsavedchangeswarning="yes" personalizationmode="client" showsidebar="false" showheader="false" theme="Skuid App">
  <models>
    <model id="Theme" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Theme__c" datasource="salesforce">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Resource_Name__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Resource_Namespace__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" field="Id" value="id"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="ThemeResource" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="StaticResource" doclone="" datasource="salesforce">
      <fields>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="NamespacePrefix"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="SystemModstamp"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions logic="">
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="" field="Name" operator="=" model="Theme" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="skuid__Resource_Name__c" novaluebehavior="deactivate"/>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="" field="NamespacePrefix" operator="=" model="Theme" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="skuid__Resource_Namespace__c" novaluebehavior="deactivate" state=""/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="Controller" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="currentPage" displaytype="TEXT" label="Current Page" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="Brand Colors"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="FakeAccounts" label="Account" labelplural="Accounts" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true">

        <field id="Name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Name" helptext="First and last names"/>
        <field id="Employees" displaytype="INTEGER" label="Employees"/>
        <field id="BillingCountry" displaytype="TEXT" label="Billing State"/>
        <field id="Type" displaytype="PICKLIST" label="Type" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual">
          <picklistentries>
            <option value="Prospect" label="Prospect"/>
            <option value="Customer - Direct" label="Customer - Direct"/>
            <option value="Customer - Channel" label="Customer - Channel"/>
            <option value="Channel Partner / Reseller" label="Channel Partner / Reseller"/>
            <option value="Installation Partner" label="Installation Partner"/>
            <option value="Technology Partner" label="Technology Partner"/>
            <option value="Other" label="Other"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="Description" displaytype="TEXTAREA" label="Description" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" helptext="When your field has inline help text and you choose the 'Below Label' option on the form, you'll see it here."/>
        <field id="Notes" displaytype="TEXTAREA" label="Notes"/>
        <field id="__fieldComponentPreview" displaytype="TEXT" label="Name"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" field="Type" operator="=" inactive="true" enclosevalueinquotes="true" name="__autofilter__Type" state="filterableoff" value=""/>
			</conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="FakeOpportunitiesChart" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Name"/>
        <field id="Amount" displaytype="NUMBER" label="Amount"/>
        <field id="StageName" displaytype="PICKLIST" label="Type" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual">
          <picklistentries>
            <option value="" label="--None--"/>
            <option value="Prospecting" label="Prospecting"/>
            <option value="Qualification" label="Qualification"/>
            <option value="Needs Analysis" label="Needs Analysis"/>
            <option value="Value Proposition" label="Value Proposition"/>
            <option value="Id. Decision Makers" label="Id. Decision Makers"/>
            <option value="Perception Analysis" label="Perception Analysis"/>
            <option value="Proposal/Price Quote" label="Proposal/Price Quote"/>
            <option value="Negotiation/Review" label="Negotiation/Review"/>
            <option value="Closed Won" label="Closed Won"/>
            <option value="Closed Lost" label="Closed Lost"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="Lipsum" limit="20" query="false" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="Label" displaytype="TEXT" label="Label" defaultValue="Lorem ipsum"/>
 				<field id="Description" displaytype="TEXTAREA" label="Description" defaultValue="Vestibulum et lorem pretium, pellentesque elit ac, tempus nunc. Ut ultricies ornare elit, eget commodo massa sollicitudin quis."/>
        <field id="First" displaytype="TEXTAREA" label="First" defaultValue="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Morbi massa est, fringilla nec rutrum vitae, cursus eu nulla. Vestibulum id nisl auctor, ornare augue in, finibus nulla. In interdum maximus sodales."/>
        <field id="Second" displaytype="TEXTAREA" label="Second" defaultValue="Sed est odio, faucibus quis mollis quis, varius et tellus.         <field id="Third" displaytype="TEXTAREA" label="Third" defaultValue="Phasellus fringilla vestibulum massa vitae porta. Sed sed iaculis neque. Nulla ac maximus ante, nec semper neque.         <field id="Fourth" displaytype="TEXTAREA" label="Fourth" defaultValue="Vestibulum et lorem pretium, pellentesque elit ac, tempus nunc. In ante lectus, viverra a condimentum eget, semper eget mi. Fusce id urna eros. Fusce sit amet ultricies augue. Etiam lacus augue, mattis et diam vel, sodales lacinia quam."/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <resources>

    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" namespace="skuid" cachelocation="false" name="next" filepath="js/skuidPages/skuidDesignSystemManager.js"/>
    </javascript>
    <css>

    padding-right: 0 !important;

}

}

}</cssitem>
    </css>
    <actionsequences uniqueid="sk-13ADNw-453">
    	<actionsequence id="493e03ba-3fbf-4dcf-bee7-f7924a754a99" label="SelectedNav" type="event-triggered" event-scope="component" event-name="page.rendered">
				<description/>
				<actions>
					<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="uiControl" affectedrows="context">
						<updates>
							<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Selected_Global_Nav" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="DESIGN SYSTEMS"/>
						</updates>

				</actions>
			</actionsequence>

  <styles>

name: FeedbackDetail
content:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" personalizationmode="server" showsidebar="false" useviewportmeta="true" showheader="false" globalfeedbackenabled="false">
  <models>
    <model id="FeedbackItemResponse" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" type="" sobject="skuid__Feedback_Response__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Answer_Number__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Answer_Text__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Feedback__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Feedback__r.Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Question_Text__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Question_Type__c"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" value="id" field="skuid__Feedback__r.Name" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Feedback__c" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="FeedbackItem" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" type="" sobject="skuid__Feedback__c" doclone="">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="CreatedDate" overridemetadata="false" ogdisplaytype="DATETIME" displaytype="DATETIME"/>
        <field id="skuid__Page__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Page__r.Name"/>
        <field id="OwnerId"/>
        <field id="Owner.Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Status__c"/>
        <field id="Owner.Email"/>
        <field id="skuid__Page__r.skuid__UniqueId__c"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="skuid__Skuid_Version__c" overridemetadata="false" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="STRING" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="n/a" placeholder="n/a"/>
        <field id="skuid__Page_Last_Modified_Date__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" value="id" field="Name" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" novaluebehavior="noquery" state=""/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="toggleRenderComponent" behavior="show" componentid="saving-button"/>
            <action type="save" rollbackonanyerror="true">
              <models>
                <model>FeedbackItem</model>
              </models>
            </action>
            <action type="publish" event="fm.item.updated"/>
            <action type="toggleRenderComponent" behavior="hide" componentid="saving-button"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>skuid__Status__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="FeedbackItemImages" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" type="" sobject="Attachment">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="ContentType"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="" field="ParentId" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Feedback__c" operator="=" model="FeedbackItem" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="Id" novaluebehavior="deactivate"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="image" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="ContentType" operator="starts with"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="FeedbackItemAttachments" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" type="" sobject="Attachment">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="ContentType"/>
        <field id="BodyLength"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="" field="ParentId" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Feedback__c" operator="=" model="FeedbackItem" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="Id" novaluebehavior="deactivate"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="image" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="ContentType" operator="does not start with"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <components>
    <pagetitle model="FeedbackItem" uniqueid="sk-31yBaQ-350">
      <maintitle>{{skuid__Page__r.Name}}</maintitle>
      <actions>
        <action type="multi" label="Saving..." uniqueid="saving-button" window="self" secondary="true" cssclass="sk-fm-detail-saving-button">
          <actions>
            <action type="cancel">
              <models>
                <model>FeedbackItem</model>
              </models>
            </action>
          </actions>
          <hotkeys/>
          <renderconditions logictype="and">
            <rendercondition type="blank" operator="=" fieldmodel="FeedbackItem" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="Id" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Feedback__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
          </renderconditions>
          <enableconditions logictype="and"/>
        </action>
        <action type="redirect" label="Respond" uniqueid="sk-31_KWK-469" window="self" url="mailto:{{{Owner.Email}}}" icon="sk-icon-send-email">
          <hotkeys/>
          <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
          <enableconditions/>
        </action>
        <action type="delete" uniqueid="sk-31zVoX-386" label="Delete" secondary="true" afterDelete="/apex/skuid__FeedbackManager">
          <hotkeys/>
          <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
          <enableconditions/>
        </action>
      </actions>
      <renderconditions logictype="and">
        <rendercondition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="FeedbackItem" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="skipandnorender" field="Name" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Feedback__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
      </renderconditions>
      <subtitle>{{skuid__Type__c}}</subtitle>
    </pagetitle>
    <basicfieldeditor showheader="true" showsavecancel="false" showerrorsinline="true" model="FeedbackItem" buttonposition="" uniqueid="sk-1zxHcy-241" mode="edit" layout="above" cssclass="sk-fm-detail-overview">
      <columns>
        <column width="33.3%">
          <sections>
            <section title="Section A" collapsible="no" showheader="false">
              <fields>
                <field uniqueid="sk-1zy2IX-153" id="CreatedDate" valuehalign="" type="" minuteincrement="5">
                  <label>Submitted</label>
                </field>
                <field uniqueid="sk-1zxpam-121" id="Owner.Name" valuehalign="" type="" cssclass="fs-block">
                  <label>Submitted by</label>
                </field>
                <field uniqueid="sk-1zxxKi-145" id="Owner.Email" valuehalign="" type="" cssclass="fs-block">
                  <label>Email</label>
                </field>
              </fields>
            </section>
          </sections>
        </column>
        <column width="33.3%">
          <sections>
            <section title="Section B" collapsible="no" showheader="false">
              <fields>
                <field uniqueid="sk-1zxMu7-258" id="skuid__Page__r.Name" valuehalign="" type="" readonly="true">
                  <label>Page</label>
                </field>
                <field uniqueid="sk-2aQ5-5-438" id="skuid__Page_Last_Modified_Date__c" valuehalign="" type="" readonly="true">
                  <label>Page Modified</label>
                </field>
                <field uniqueid="sk-25i5cT-157" id="skuid__Skuid_Version__c" valuehalign="" type="" readonly="true">
                  <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep"/>
                  <enableconditions/>
                </field>
              </fields>
            </section>
          </sections>
        </column>
        <column width="33.3%">
          <sections>
            <section title="New Section" collapsible="no" showheader="false">
              <fields>
                <field uniqueid="sk-1zyGmX-188" id="skuid__Status__c" valuehalign="" type="" required="true">
                  <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep"/>
                  <enableconditions logictype="and"/>
                  <label>Status:</label>
                </field>
              </fields>
            </section>
          </sections>
        </column>
      </columns>
      <renderconditions logictype="and">
        <rendercondition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="FeedbackItem" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="skipandnorender" field="Name" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Feedback__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
      </renderconditions>
    </basicfieldeditor>
    <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-29YaAQ-1379" model="FeedbackItemResponse" allowhtml="true" cssclass="sk-fm-comments">
      <contents>{{skuid__Answer_Text__c}}</contents>
    </template>
    <pagetitle model="FeedbackItemAttachments" uniqueid="sk-29XVmi-1175" cssclass="sk-fm-secondary-header">
      <maintitle>Attachments</maintitle>
      <actions/>
      <renderconditions logictype="custom" logic="1 AND (2 OR 3)">
        <rendercondition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="FeedbackItem" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="skipandnorender" field="Id" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Feedback__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
        <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="FeedbackItemAttachments" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasRows"/>
        <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="FeedbackItemImages" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasRows"/>
      </renderconditions>
    </pagetitle>
    <deck searchmethod="server" searchbox="false" columngutter=".75em" rowgutter=".75em" model="FeedbackItemAttachments" filtersposition="top" filterswidth="150px" showsavecancel="false" behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" ratio="1" minwidth="100%" uniqueid="sk-29V3ZX-808" buttonposition="" pagesize="all" setmaxwidth="manual" maxwidth="100%" emptysearchbehavior="query" cssclass="sk-fm-deck">
      <components>
        <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-29V4gO-822" model="FeedbackItemAttachments" allowhtml="true">
          <contents>{{Name}}</contents>
          <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
        </template>
      </components>
      <massactions/>
      <interactions/>
      <actions/>
      <styles>
        <styleitem type="border" borders="all" padding="all">
          <styles>
            <styleitem property="border" value="0px solid transparent"/>
            <styleitem property="padding" value="0px"/>
            <styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/>
          </styles>
        </styleitem>
      </styles>
      <renderconditions logictype="and">
        <rendercondition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="FeedbackItem" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="skipandnorender" field="Id" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Feedback__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
        <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="FeedbackItemAttachments" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasRows"/>
      </renderconditions>
      <searchfields/>
    </deck>
    <deck searchmethod="server" searchbox="false" columngutter=".75em" rowgutter=".75em" model="FeedbackItemImages" filtersposition="top" filterswidth="150px" showsavecancel="false" behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" ratio="1" minwidth="350px" uniqueid="sk-29Q7-H-396" buttonposition="" pagesize="all" emptysearchbehavior="query" cssclass="sk-fm-deck fs-block">
      <components>
        <image source="attachment" uniqueid="sk-29Pt3l-366" datasource="salesforce" behavior="none" model="FeedbackItemImages" field="">
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
            <styleitem type="border"/>
          </styles>
          <renderconditions logictype="and">
            <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="starts with" fieldmodel="FeedbackItemImages" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="ContentType" fieldtargetobjects="Attachment" value="image" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
          </renderconditions>
          <conditions/>

      </components>
      <massactions/>
      <interactions/>

      <styles>
        <styleitem type="border" borders="all" padding="all" margin="none">
          <styles>
            <styleitem property="border" value="0px solid transparent"/>
            <styleitem property="padding" value="0px"/>
            <styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/>
          </styles>
        </styleitem>
      </styles>
      <renderconditions logictype="and">
        <rendercondition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="FeedbackItem" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="skipandnorender" field="Id" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Feedback__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
        <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="FeedbackItemImages" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasRows"/>

name: FeedbackManager
content:
<skuidpage globalfeedbackenabled="false">
  <models>
    <model id="Feedback" limit="10" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" type="" sobject="skuid__Feedback__c" doclone="" orderby="CreatedDate DESC">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="CreatedDate"/>
        <field id="skuid__Status__c"/>
        <field id="Owner.Name"/>
        <field id="OwnerId"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Page__r.Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Page__c"/>
        <field id="Date" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue">
          <formula>FORMAT_DATE('MM d, yy',{{CreatedDate}})</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Is_Current__c" overridemetadata="false" ogdisplaytype="BOOLEAN" displaytype="BOOLEAN" picklistsource="manual" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="true">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="true" label="Current Page Revisions"/>
            <entry value="false" label="Previous Page Revisions"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Status__c" operator="=" inactive="true" enclosevalueinquotes="true" name="__autofilter__skuid__Status__c" state="filterableoff" value=""/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" field="CreatedDate" operator="gte" inactive="true" enclosevalueinquotes="false" name="__autofilter__start__CreatedDate" state="filterableoff" value=""/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" field="CreatedDate" operator="lte" inactive="true" enclosevalueinquotes="false" name="__autofilter__end__CreatedDate" state="filterableoff" value=""/>
        <condition type="blank" value="null" field="skuid__Page__c" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Page__c" state="" operator="!=" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Type__c" operator="=" inactive="true" enclosevalueinquotes="true" name="__autofilter__skuid__Type__c" state="filterableoff" value=""/>
