name: MobilePageBuilder
content:
<skuidpage showsidebar="false" showheader="false" unsavedchangeswarning="yes" globalfeedbackenabled="false">
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="deleteThisPage" cachelocation="false">var pageModel = skuid.$M('page'),
   pageRow = pageModel.getFirstRow(),
   pageRowId = pageRow.Id,
   $ = skuid.$;
if (confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this Page?')) {
   $.blockUI({message: 'Deleting this page...'});
   pageModel.deleteRow(pageRow);
   pageModel.save({callback:function(result){
      if (result.totalsuccess){
         $.blockUI({message: 'Page successfully deleted. Navigating to list of Skuid Mobile Pages...',timeout:2000});
         skuid.utils.redirect({url: '/apex/skuid__UI?page=MobilePageList'}); 
      } else {
         $.unblockUI();
         alert('There was a problem deleting this Page:\n\n' + result.deleteResults[0].message);
      }
   }});
}
</jsitem>
    </javascript>
    <css/>
  </resources>
  <models>
    <model id="page" sobject="skuid__Page__c" createrowifnonefound="true" query="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
        <field id="OwnerId"/>
        <field id="Owner.Name" targetobjects="User"/>
        <field id="skuid__Max_Auto_Saves__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Count_Auto_Saved_Versions__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__IsMaster__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Pages__r" type="childRelationship" limit="1"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Module__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Type__c"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
        <field id="skuid__Last_Modified_Date_Check__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" field="Id" value="id" operator="=" novaluebehavior="deactivate"/>
        <condition type="param" value="pagename" operator="=" field="Name" enclosevalueinquotes="true" novaluebehavior="deactivate"/>
        <condition type="param" value="pagemodule" operator="=" field="skuid__Module__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" novaluebehavior="deactivate"/>
      </conditions>
    </model>
    <!--
      <model id="versions" limit="10" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page_Version__c" orderby="CreatedDate DESC"><fields><field id="CreatedDate"/><field id="skuid__IsAutoSave__c"/><field id="skuid__Description__c"/><field id="Id"/><field id="Name"/><field id="CreatedById"/><field id="CreatedBy.Name"/><field id="skuid__Layout__c"/><field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/><field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/><field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/><field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/></fields><conditions><condition type="modelmerge" value="" field="skuid__Page__c" operator="=" model="page" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="Id"/><condition type="fieldvalue" value="false" enclosevalueinquotes="false" field="skuid__IsAutoSave__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="IsNotAutoSave"/></conditions></model>
      -->
    <model id="ClonedPage" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" field="Name" name="Name"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" field="skuid__Layout__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" field="skuid__Layout2__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" field="skuid__Layout3__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" field="skuid__Layout4__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" field="skuid__Layout5__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="Mobile" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" field="skuid__Type__c"/>
      </conditions>
    </model>
  </models>
  <components>
    <skuidmobile>
      <mobilenavs>
        <mobilenav>
          <components>
            <mobilegrid precision="6" minwidth="50">
              <divisions>
                <division size="1">
                  <components>
                    <mobilebutton label="Preview" icon="fa-flask" style="nav">
                      <actions>
                        <action type="publish" event="skuidMobilePreviewPage"/>
                      </actions>
                      <hotkeys>
                        <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="p"/>
                        <hotkey modifiers="meta" key="p"/>
                      </hotkeys>
                    </mobilebutton>
                  </components>
                </division>
                <division size="1">
                  <components>
                    <mobilebutton label="More..." style="nav" icon="fa-gear">
                      <actions>
                        <action type="setPopupPanel" panel="MorePageActions" title="Additional Page Actions"/>
                      </actions>
                    </mobilebutton>
                  </components>
                </division>
                <division size="2">
                  <components>
                    <mobiletitle model="page">
                      <contents>Editing Page: {{Name}}</contents>
                    </mobiletitle>
                  </components>
                  <interactions>
                    <interaction type="tap">
                      <actions>
                        <action type="toggleSetupMenu"/>
                      </actions>
                    </interaction>
                  </interactions>
                </division>
                <division size="1">
                  <components>
                    <mobilebutton label="Save" icon="fa-check" style="nav">
                      <actions>
                        <action type="publish" event="skuidMobileSavePage"/>
                      </actions>
                      <hotkeys>
                        <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="s"/>
                        <hotkey modifiers="meta" key="s"/>
                      </hotkeys>
                    </mobilebutton>
                  </components>
                </division>
                <division size="1">
                  <components>
                    <mobilebutton label="Cancel" icon="fa-times" style="nav">
                      <actions>
                        <action type="publish" event="skuidMobileCancelPage"/>
                      </actions>
                    </mobilebutton>
                  </components>
                </division>
              </divisions>
            </mobilegrid>
          </components>
          <interactions>
            <interaction type="drag">
              <actions>
                <action type="toggleSetupMenu"/>
              </actions>
            </interaction>
          </interactions>
        </mobilenav>
      </mobilenavs>
      <mobilepanels>
        <mobilepanel uniqueid="componentviewer" minwidth="400">
          <components>
            <custom uniqueid="mobileComponentViewer" name="mobileComponentViewer"/>
          </components>
        </mobilepanel>
        <mobilepanel uniqueid="quicknav" preferredwidth="41">
          <components>
            <mobilebutton tooltip="Models" style="list" buttonset="nav" icon="fa-cube">
              <actions>
                <action type="toggleLeftPanel" panel="models" position="1" replace="true"/>
              </actions>
              <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
              <enableconditions logictype="and"/>
            </mobilebutton>
            <mobilebutton tooltip="Headers and Footers" style="list" buttonset="nav" icon="fa-bars">
              <actions>
                <action type="toggleLeftPanel" panel="navs" position="1" replace="true"/>
              </actions>
            </mobilebutton>
            <mobilebutton tooltip="Page Panels" style="list" buttonset="nav" icon="fa-tablet">
              <actions>
                <action type="toggleLeftPanel" panel="panels" position="1" replace="true"/>
              </actions>
            </mobilebutton>
            <mobilebutton tooltip="Resources" style="list" buttonset="nav" icon="fa-external-link">
              <actions>
                <action type="toggleLeftPanel" panel="resources" position="1" replace="true"/>
              </actions>
            </mobilebutton>
            <mobilebutton tooltip="Page Properties" style="list" buttonset="nav" icon="fa-gear">
              <actions>
                <action type="toggleLeftPanel" panel="pageproperties" position="1" replace="true"/>
              </actions>
            </mobilebutton>
          </components>
        </mobilepanel>
        <mobilepanel uniqueid="models">
          <components>
            <custom name="mobileBuilderModelList"/>
          </components>
          <interactions>
            <interaction type="swipeleft">
              <actions>
                <action type="toggleLeftPanel" panel="models"/>
              </actions>
            </interaction>
          </interactions>
        </mobilepanel>
        <mobilepanel uniqueid="navs">
          <components>
            <custom name="mobileBuilderNavList"/>
          </components>
          <interactions>
            <interaction type="swipeleft">
              <actions>
                <action type="toggleLeftPanel" panel="navs"/>
              </actions>
            </interaction>
          </interactions>
        </mobilepanel>
        <mobilepanel uniqueid="panels">
          <components>
            <custom name="mobileBuilderPanelList"/>
          </components>
          <interactions>
            <interaction type="swipeleft">
              <actions>
                <action type="toggleLeftPanel" panel="panels"/>
              </actions>
            </interaction>
          </interactions>
        </mobilepanel>
        <mobilepanel uniqueid="resources">
          <components>
            <custom name="mobileBuilderResourcePanelHeader"/>
            <mobileaccordion level="1">
              <items>
                <item label="Labels" icon="fa-tags">
                  <itembuttons>
                    <mobilebutton icon="fa-plus-circle">
                      <actions>
                        <action type="publish" event="skuidMobileAddLabelItem"/>
                      </actions>
                    </mobilebutton>
                  </itembuttons>
                  <components>
                    <custom name="mobileBuilderLabelList"/>
                  </components>
                </item>
                <item label="Javascript" icon="sk-bi-jsitem">
                  <itembuttons>
                    <mobilebutton icon="fa-plus-circle">
                      <actions>
                        <action type="publish" event="skuidMobileAddJSItem"/>
                      </actions>
                    </mobilebutton>
                  </itembuttons>
                  <components>
                    <custom name="mobileBuilderJSList"/>
                  </components>
                </item>
                <item label="CSS" icon="fa-css3">
                  <itembuttons>
                    <mobilebutton icon="fa-plus-circle">
                      <actions>
                        <action type="publish" event="skuidMobileAddCSSItem"/>
                      </actions>
                    </mobilebutton>
                  </itembuttons>
                  <components>
                    <custom name="mobileBuilderCSSList"/>
                  </components>
                </item>
              </items>
            </mobileaccordion>
          </components>
          <interactions>
            <interaction type="swipeleft">
              <actions>
                <action type="toggleLeftPanel" panel="resources"/>
              </actions>
            </interaction>
          </interactions>
        </mobilepanel>
        <mobilepanel uniqueid="propertyviewer">
          <components>
            <custom name="mobilePropertyViewer" uniqueid=""/>
          </components>
          <interactions>
            <interaction type="swipeleft">
              <actions>
                <action type="toggleLeftPanel" panel="propertyviewer"/>
              </actions>
            </interaction>
          </interactions>
        </mobilepanel>
        <mobilepanel minwidth="200" uniqueid="pageproperties">
          <components>
            <custom name="mobileBuilderPagePropertiesHeader"/>
            <mobiledeck showsavecancel="false" searchmethod="server" searchbox="false" tokenizesearch="true" createrecords="false" precision="1" minwidth="200" model="page" mode="read">
              <components>
                <mobilegrid precision="2" minwidth="200">
                  <divisions>
                    <division size="1">
                      <components>
                        <mobilefield id="Name"/>
                      </components>
                    </division>
                    <division size="1">
                      <components>
                        <mobilefield id="skuid__Module__c" showhelp="true"/>
                      </components>
                    </division>
                    <division size="1">
                      <components>
                        <mobilefield id="OwnerId" cssclass="fs-block">Page Owner</mobilefield>
                      </components>
                    </division>
                    <division size="1">
                      <components>
                        <mobilefield id="skuid__Max_Auto_Saves__c" showhelp="true"/>
                      </components>
                    </division>
                    <division size="1">
                      <components>
                        <custom name="mobileBuilderPageProperty_Theme"/>
                      </components>
                    </division>
                    <division size="1">
                      <components>
                        <custom name="mobileBuilderPageProperty_UnsavedChangesWarning"/>
                      </components>
                    </division>
                  </divisions>
                </mobilegrid>
              </components>
            </mobiledeck>
          </components>
          <interactions>
            <interaction type="swipeleft">
              <actions>
                <action type="toggleLeftPanel" panel="pageproperties"/>
              </actions>
            </interaction>
          </interactions>
        </mobilepanel>
        <mobilepanel minwidth="200" uniqueid="MorePageActions">
          <components>
            <mobilegrid precision="4" minwidth="200">
              <divisions>
                <division size="1">
                  <components>
                    <mobilebutton label="Clone this page" style="nav" icon="fa-copy">
                      <actions>
                        <action type="setCondition" model="ClonedPage" condition="Name" value="{{{$Model.page.data.0.Name}}}_clone"/>
                        <action type="setCondition" model="ClonedPage" condition="skuid__Layout__c" value="{{{$Model.page.data.0.skuid__Layout__c}}}"/>
                        <action type="setCondition" model="ClonedPage" condition="skuid__Layout2__c" value="{{{$Model.page.data.0.skuid__Layout2__c}}}"/>
                        <action type="setCondition" model="ClonedPage" condition="skuid__Layout3__c" value="{{{$Model.page.data.0.skuid__Layout3__c}}}"/>
                        <action type="setCondition" model="ClonedPage" condition="skuid__Layout4__c" value="{{{$Model.page.data.0.skuid__Layout4__c}}}"/>
                        <action type="setCondition" model="ClonedPage" condition="skuid__Layout5__c" value="{{{$Model.page.data.0.skuid__Layout5__c}}}"/>
                        <action type="createRow" model="ClonedPage" appendorprepend="prepend" defaultmodefornewitems="edit"/>
                        <action type="setPopupPanel" panel="ClonePage" title="Clone Page: {{$Model.page.data.0.Name}}"/>
                      </actions>
                      <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                      <enableconditions logictype="and"/>
                    </mobilebutton>
                  </components>
                </division>
                <division size="1">
                  <components>
                    <mobilebutton label="Delete this page" style="nav" icon="fa-minus-circle">
                      <actions>
                        <action type="custom" snippet="deleteThisPage"/>
                      </actions>
                    </mobilebutton>
                  </components>
                </division>
                <division size="1">
                  <components>
                    <custom name="mobileBuilderXMLEditLink">
                      <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                    </custom>
                  </components>
                </division>
              </divisions>
            </mobilegrid>
          </components>
        </mobilepanel>
        <mobilepanel minwidth="200" uniqueid="ClonePage">
          <components>
            <mobiledeck showsavecancel="false" searchmethod="server" searchbox="true" tokenizesearch="true" createrecords="false" precision="1" minwidth="400" model="ClonedPage" mode="edit">
              <components>
                <mobilefield id="Name" required="true">Cloned page name</mobilefield>
                <mobilebutton label="Finish cloning page and go to Composer" style="nav" icon="fa-check">
                  <actions>
                    <action type="save">
                      <models>
                        <model>ClonedPage</model>
                      </models>
                    </action>
                    <action type="redirect" url="/{{Id}}"/>
                  </actions>
                </mobilebutton>
              </components>
              <title>Cloning Page</title>
            </mobiledeck>
          </components>
        </mobilepanel>
      </mobilepanels>
    </skuidmobile>
    <skuidheaderincludes/>
    <pagebuilder/>
  </components>
</skuidpage>

name: MobilePageList
content:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="" theme="" globalfeedbackenabled="false">
  <models>
    <model id="MobilePages" limit="100" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c" orderby="LastModifiedDate DESC">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="CreatedDate"/>
        <field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
        <field id="CreatedById"/>
        <field id="CreatedBy.Name"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedById"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedBy.Name"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="Mobile" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" field="skuid__Type__c"/>
      </conditions>
    </model>
    <model id="SelectedPage" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <field id="OwnerId"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" field="Id" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="PageId"/>
      </conditions>
    </model>
    <model id="NewPage" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="true" sobject="skuid__Page__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="Mobile" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" field="skuid__Type__c"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="<skuidpage><models/><components><skuidmobile><mobilepanels/><mobilenavs/></skuidmobile></components><resources><labels/><javascript/><css/></resources></skuidpage>" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" field="skuid__Layout__c"/>
      </conditions>
    </model>
    <model id="ClonedPage" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" field="Name" name="Name"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" field="skuid__Layout__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" field="skuid__Layout2__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" field="skuid__Layout3__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" field="skuid__Layout4__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" field="skuid__Layout5__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="Mobile" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" field="skuid__Type__c"/>
      </conditions>
    </model>
  </models>
  <components>
    <skuidmobile>
      <mobilepanels>
        <mobilepanel uniqueid="main" minwidth="400">
          <components>
            <mobiledeck showsavecancel="true" searchmethod="server" searchbox="true" tokenizesearch="true" createrecords="false" precision="2" minwidth="400" model="MobilePages" mode="readonly" emptysearchbehavior="query">
              <components>
                <template cssclass="fs-block">Last Modified By: {{{LastModifiedBy.Name}}}<br/>{{LastModifiedDate}}</template>
              </components>
              <title>{{Model.labelPlural}}</title>
              <cardtitle>{{Name}}</cardtitle>
              <cardinteractions>
                <interaction type="doubletap">
                  <actions>
                    <action type="setCondition" model="SelectedPage" value="{{Id}}" condition="PageId"/>
                    <action type="requeryModel" model="SelectedPage" behavior="standard"/>
                    <action type="setPopupPanel" panel="pagedetail" title="Page Details: {{Name}}"/>
                  </actions>
                </interaction>
                <interaction type="hold">
                  <actions>
                    <action type="setCondition" model="SelectedPage" value="{{Id}}" condition="PageId"/>
                    <action type="requeryModel" model="SelectedPage" behavior="standard"/>
                    <action type="setPopupPanel" panel="pagedetail" title="Page Details: {{Name}}"/>
                  </actions>
                </interaction>
              </cardinteractions>
              <aftersaveactions/>
              <searchfields/>
              <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
              <conditions/>
            </mobiledeck>
          </components>
        </mobilepanel>
        <mobilepanel minwidth="200" uniqueid="pagedetail">
          <components>
            <mobiledeck showsavecancel="true" searchmethod="server" searchbox="false" tokenizesearch="true" createrecords="false" precision="1" minwidth="400" model="SelectedPage" mode="edit" emptysearchbehavior="query">
              <components>
                <mobilefield id="Name"/>
                <mobilegrid precision="1" minwidth="200">
                  <divisions>
                    <division size="1">
                      <components>
                        <mobilebutton label="Compose" style="nav" icon="fa-wrench">
                          <actions>
                            <action type="redirect" url="/apex/skuid__PageBuilder?id={{{Id}}}" window="self"/>
                          </actions>
                          <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                          <enableconditions logictype="and"/>
                        </mobilebutton>
                        <mobilebutton label="Preview" style="nav" icon="fa-flask">
                          <actions>
                            <action type="custom" url="" snippet="previewPage" event="skuidMobilePreviewPage"/>
                          </actions>
                        </mobilebutton>
                        <mobilebutton label="Clone" style="nav" icon="fa-copy">
                          <actions>
                            <action type="setCondition" model="ClonedPage" condition="Name" value="{{Name}}_clone"/>
                            <action type="setCondition" model="ClonedPage" condition="skuid__Layout__c" value="{{{skuid__Layout__c}}}"/>
                            <action type="setCondition" model="ClonedPage" condition="skuid__Layout2__c" value="{{{skuid__Layout2__c}}}"/>
                            <action type="setCondition" model="ClonedPage" condition="skuid__Layout3__c" value="{{{skuid__Layout3__c}}}"/>
                            <action type="setCondition" model="ClonedPage" condition="skuid__Layout4__c" value="{{{skuid__Layout4__c}}}"/>
                            <action type="setCondition" model="ClonedPage" condition="skuid__Layout5__c" value="{{{skuid__Layout5__c}}}"/>
                            <action type="createRow" model="ClonedPage"/>
                            <action type="setPopupPanel" panel="ClonePage" title="Clone Page: {{Name}}"/>
                          </actions>
                        </mobilebutton>
                        <mobilebutton label="Delete" style="nav" icon="fa-minus-circle">
                          <actions>
                            <action type="custom" snippet="deleteSelectedPage"/>
                          </actions>
                        </mobilebutton>
                      </components>
                    </division>
                  </divisions>
                </mobilegrid>
              </components>
              <aftersaveactions>
                <action type="requeryModel" model="MobilePages" behavior="standard"/>
              </aftersaveactions>
              <searchfields/>
              <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
              <conditions/>
            </mobiledeck>
          </components>
        </mobilepanel>
        <mobilepanel minwidth="200" uniqueid="NewPage">
          <components>
            <mobiledeck showsavecancel="false" searchmethod="server" searchbox="false" tokenizesearch="true" createrecords="false" precision="1" minwidth="400" model="NewPage" mode="edit">
              <components>
                <mobilefield id="Name"/>
                <mobilebutton label="Save and edit in Mobile Composer" style="nav" icon="fa-check">
                  <actions>
                    <action type="save">
                      <models>
                        <model>NewPage</model>
                      </models>
                    </action>
                    <action type="redirect" url="/apex/skuid__PageBuilder?id={{Id}}"/>
                  </actions>
                </mobilebutton>
              </components>
              <title>Creating new Page</title>
            </mobiledeck>
          </components>
        </mobilepanel>
        <mobilepanel minwidth="120" uniqueid="LeftNav">
          <components>
            <mobilebutton label="All Pages" style="list" icon="fa-list">
              <actions>
                <action type="setMainPanel" panel="main"/>
                <action type="hideLeftPanel"/>
              </actions>
            </mobilebutton>
            <mobilebutton label="Create new Page" style="list" icon="fa-plus">
              <actions>
                <action type="setMainPanel" panel="NewPage"/>
                <action type="hideLeftPanel"/>
              </actions>
              <hotkeys>
                <hotkey modifiers="shift" key="n"/>
              </hotkeys>
            </mobilebutton>
          </components>
        </mobilepanel>
        <mobilepanel minwidth="200" uniqueid="ClonePage">
          <components>
            <mobiledeck showsavecancel="false" searchmethod="server" searchbox="true" tokenizesearch="true" createrecords="false" precision="1" minwidth="400" model="ClonedPage" mode="edit">
              <components>
                <mobilefield id="Name" required="true">Cloned page name</mobilefield>
                <mobilebutton label="Finish cloning page and go to Composer" style="nav" icon="fa-check">
                  <actions>
                    <action type="save">
                      <models>
                        <model>ClonedPage</model>
                      </models>
                    </action>
                    <action type="redirect" url="/apex/skuid__PageBuilder?id={{Id}}"/>
                  </actions>
                </mobilebutton>
              </components>
              <title>Cloning Page</title>
            </mobiledeck>
          </components>
        </mobilepanel>
      </mobilepanels>
      <mobilenavs>
        <mobilenav uniqueid="header">
          <components>
            <mobilegrid precision="6" minwidth="50">
              <divisions>
                <division size="1">
                  <components>
                    <mobilebutton label="Menu" style="nav" icon="fa-bars">
                      <interactions>
                        <interaction type="tap">
                          <actions>
                            <action type="toggleLeftPanel" panel="LeftNav"/>
                          </actions>
                        </interaction>
                      </interactions>
                    </mobilebutton>
                  </components>
                </division>
                <division size="4">
                  <components>
                    <mobiletitle>
                      <contents>Skuid Mobile Pages</contents>
                    </mobiletitle>
                  </components>
                </division>
                <division size="1">
                  <components>
                    <mobilebutton label="View all Pages" style="nav" icon="fa-th">
                      <interactions>
                        <interaction type="tap">
                          <actions>
                            <action type="redirect" url="/apex/skuid__PageList"/>
                          </actions>
                        </interaction>
                      </interactions>
                    </mobilebutton>
                  </components>
                </division>
              </divisions>
            </mobilegrid>
          </components>
          <interactions>
            <interaction type="doubletap">
              <actions>
                <action type="toggleSetupMenu"/>
              </actions>
            </interaction>
            <interaction type="swipedown">
              <actions>
                <action type="toggleSetupMenu"/>
              </actions>
            </interaction>
          </interactions>
        </mobilenav>
      </mobilenavs>
    </skuidmobile>
  </components>
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <css/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="v1" filepath="js/builderReqs.js" cachelocation="false" namespace="skuid"/>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="v1" filepath="js/skuidMobilePageComposer.js" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="skuid"/>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="previewPage" cachelocation="false">var pageModel = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedPage'),
   pagePreview = skuid.snippet.getSnippet('skuid.builder.page.preview');			    
pagePreview && pagePreview({
   model: pageModel
});</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="deleteSelectedPage" cachelocation="false">var pageModel = skuid.$M('SelectedPage'),
   pageRow = pageModel.getFirstRow(),
   pageRowId = pageRow.Id,
   $ = skuid.$;
if (confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this Page?')) {
   pageModel.deleteRow(pageRow);
   pageModel.save({callback:function(result){
      if (result.totalsuccess){
         // Hide the popup panel
          skuid.mobile.hidePopupPanel();
          // Remove the corresponding row from our PageList model
          // then re-render corresponding lists, rather than doing an updateData,
          // to save a server call
          var pagesModel = skuid.$M('MobilePages');
          pagesModel.removeRowById(pageRowId);
          $.each(pagesModel.registeredLists,function(){
              this.render({doNotCache: true});
          });
      } else {
         alert('There was a problem deleting this Page:\n\n' + result.deleteResults[0].message);
      }
   }});
}
</jsitem>
    </javascript>
  </resources>
</skuidpage>

name: NewPage
content:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" globalfeedbackenabled="false">
  <models/>
  <pageregioncontents>
    <pageregioncontent regionid="sk-1uFo3V-67" uniqueid="sk-34TxSj-106">
      <components>
        <wizard deferstepcontentsrendering="true" buttonslocation="bottom" uniqueid="sk-10set8-247">
          <steps>
            <step stepid="step0" steplabel="Step 1: Name your page">
              <components>
                <basicfieldeditor showsavecancel="false" showheader="true" model="pgs__NewPage" mode="edit" uniqueid="NewPageEditor" layout="" buttonposition="" showerrorsinline="true">
                  <columns layoutmode="responsive" columngutter="4px" rowgutter="4px">
                    <column behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" ratio="1" minwidth="300px">
                      <sections>
                        <section title="Page setup" collapsible="no">
                          <fields>
                            <field id="Name" required="true"/>
                          </fields>
                          <renderconditions/>
                        </section>
                      </sections>
                    </column>
                  </columns>
                  <conditions/>
                  <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                </basicfieldeditor>
              </components>
              <actions>
                <action uniqueid="sk-10set7-245"  type="multi" stepid="step1" label="Next Step" icon="sk-icon-arrow-right">
                  <actions>
                    <action type="navigateToStep" stepid="step1"  window="self"/>
                  </actions>
                  <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                  <enableconditions logictype="and" message="Please enter a Name for this Page.">
                    <condition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="Name" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
                  </enableconditions>
                </action>
              </actions>
            </step>
            <step stepid="step1" steplabel="Step 2: Pick your starting point">
              <components>
                <basicfieldeditor showsavecancel="false" showheader="true" model="pgs__NewPage" mode="edit" uniqueid="NewPageEditor" layout="above" buttonposition="" showerrorsinline="true">
                  <columns layoutmode="responsive" columngutter="4px" rowgutter="4px">
                    <column behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" ratio="1" minwidth="300px">
                      <sections>
                        <section title="Page setup" collapsible="no">
                          <fields>
                            <field id="skuid__Initial_State__c" type="CUSTOM" required="true" addnoneoption="false" valuehalign="" cssclass="" snippet="skuid.core.snippets.newPageStartingPoint">
                              <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep"/>
                              <enableconditions/>
                            </field>
                            <field id="skuid__Type__c" required="true" type="RADIO_BUTTONS" valuehalign="">
                              <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep">
                                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="master__LegacyMobileVars" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="orgHasLegacyMobilePages" value="true"/>
                                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="none"/>
                              </renderconditions>
                              <enableconditions/>
                              <label>Page Type</label>
                            </field>
                          </fields>
                          <renderconditions/>
                        </section>
                        <section title="Use a Master Page" collapsible="no">
                          <fields>
                            <field id="skuid__MasterPage__c" valuehalign="" type="" required="true" optionsource="">
                              <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="cancel">
                                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="masterpage"/>
                              </renderconditions>
                              <enableconditions/>
                              <filters>
                                <filter type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" field="skuid__IsMaster__c" value="true"/>
                              </filters>
                              <searchfields/>
                            </field>
                          </fields>
                          <renderconditions logictype="and">
                            <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="masterpage"/>
                          </renderconditions>
                        </section>
                      </sections>
                    </column>
                  </columns>
                </basicfieldeditor>
              </components>
              <actions>
                <action type="navigate" label="Previous Step" stepid="step0" window="self" icon="sk-icon-arrow-left">
                  <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                  <enableconditions/>
                  <hotkeys/>
                </action>
                <action uniqueid="sk-10set7-244" type="navigate" stepid="step2_enterPageXML" label="Paste XML" icon="sk-icon-arrow-right" window="self">
                  <renderconditions logictype="and">
                    <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="from-xml"/>
                  </renderconditions>
                  <enableconditions/>
                </action>
                <action type="navigate" label="Select Page Template" stepid="step2_selectTemplate" window="self" icon="sk-icon-arrow-right">
                  <renderconditions logictype="and">
                    <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="template"/>
                  </renderconditions>
                  <enableconditions/>
                </action>
                <action type="save" label="Create Page" stepid="" window="self" icon="sk-icon-save" url="/apex/skuid__PageBuilder?id={{{$Model.pgs__NewPage.data.0.Id}}}">
                  <renderconditions logictype="and">
                    <rendercondition type="multiple" operator="in" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
                      <values>
                        <value>none</value>
                        <value>masterpage</value>
                      </values>
                    </rendercondition>
                  </renderconditions>
                  <enableconditions/>
                  <models>
                    <model>pgs__NewPage</model>
                  </models>
                  <hotkeys>
                    <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="s"/>
                  </hotkeys>
                </action>
              </actions>
            </step>
            <step stepid="step2_enterPageXML" steplabel="Step 3: Paste XML from pre-built Page">
              <components>
                <basicfieldeditor showheader="true" showsavecancel="false" showerrorsinline="true" model="pgs__NewPage" buttonposition="" uniqueid="sk-10tlgt-331" mode="edit" layout="above">
                  <columns>
                    <column width="100%">
                      <sections>
                        <section title="Paste in XML from prebuilt page" collapsible="no" showheader="false">
                          <fields>
                            <field id="skuid__Page_XML__c" required="true" valuehalign="" type="" displayrows="11">
                              <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="cancel">
                                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="from-xml" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue"/>
                              </renderconditions>
                              <enableconditions/>
                            </field>
                            <field type="COMBO" allowhtml="true" readonly="true" valuehalign="">
                              <label><a class="field-label-link" href="https://github.com/skuid/SamplePages" target="blank"><div class="nx-editor ui-widget ui-button ui-state-default ui-corner-all ui-button-text-icon-primary" role="button" style="margin-right: 4px;"><span class="ui-button-icon-primary ui-icon sk-icon-popup sk-icon inline"></span><span class="ui-button-text">Find Sample Pages</span></div></a></label>
                            </field>
                          </fields>
                          <renderconditions logictype="and">
                            <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="from-xml"/>
                          </renderconditions>
                        </section>
                      </sections>
                    </column>
                  </columns>
                </basicfieldeditor>
              </components>
              <actions>
                <action uniqueid="sk-10set7-245" type="navigate" stepid="step1" label="Previous Step" icon="sk-icon-arrow-left" window="self"/>
                <action uniqueid="sk-10set7-246" type="save" label="Create Page" icon="sk-icon-save" window="self" url="/apex/skuid__PageBuilder?id={{{$Model.pgs__NewPage.data.0.Id}}}">
                  <hotkeys>
                    <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="s"/>
                  </hotkeys>
                  <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                  <enableconditions logictype="and" message="You must enter valid XML from a sample page to proceed.">
                    <condition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="skuid__Page_XML__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
                  </enableconditions>
                  <models>
                    <model>pgs__NewPage</model>
                  </models>
                </action>
              </actions>
            </step>
            <step stepid="step2_selectTemplate" steplabel="Step 3: Select Page Template">
              <components>
                <basicfieldeditor showheader="true" showsavecancel="false" showerrorsinline="true" model="pgs__NewPage" buttonposition="" uniqueid="sk-10tpT_-360" mode="edit">
                  <columns>
                    <column width="100%">
                      <sections>
                        <section title="Select Page Template" collapsible="no">
                          <fields>
                            <field id="skuid__Page_Template__c" type="RADIO_BUTTONS" required="true" addnoneoption="false" valuehalign="">
                              <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="cancel">
                                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="template"/>
                              </renderconditions>
                              <label>Template</label>
                              <enableconditions/>
                            </field>
                          </fields>
                          <renderconditions logictype="and">
                            <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="template" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue"/>
                          </renderconditions>
                        </section>
                        <section title="Data Source" collapsible="no">
                          <fields>
                            <field id="skuid__DataSourceType__ui" valuehalign="" type="" required="true">
                              <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep">
                                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="snippet" sourcesnippet="skuid.core.haveMultipleActiveDataSources"/>
                              </renderconditions>
                              <enableconditions/>
                            </field>
                            <field id="skuid__DataSource__ui" valuehalign="" type="CUSTOM" snippet="skuid.core.renderers.dataSource" required="true">
                              <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep">
                                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="snippet" sourcesnippet="skuid.core.haveMultipleActiveDataSources"/>
                              </renderconditions>
                              <enableconditions/>
                            </field>
                            <field id="skuid__Primary_Object__c" type="CUSTOM" snippet="PrimaryObjectField" required="true" valuehalign="">
                              <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep">
                                <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="template"/>
                              </renderconditions>
                              <enableconditions/>
                            </field>
                          </fields>
                        </section>
                      </sections>
                    </column>
                  </columns>
                </basicfieldeditor>
              </components>
              <actions>
                <action uniqueid="sk-10tKHr-280" type="navigate" stepid="step1" label="Previous Step" icon="sk-icon-arrow-left" window="self"/>
                <action uniqueid="sk-10set7-246" type="save" label="Create Page" icon="sk-icon-save" window="self" url="/apex/skuid__PageBuilder?id={{{$Model.pgs__NewPage.data.0.Id}}}">
                  <hotkeys>
                    <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="s"/>
                  </hotkeys>
                  <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                  <enableconditions logictype="and" message="You must enter valid XML from a sample page to proceed.">
                    <condition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="skuid__Primary_Object__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
                  </enableconditions>
                  <models>
                    <model>pgs__NewPage</model>
                  </models>
                </action>
              </actions>
            </step>
          </steps>
          <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
        </wizard>
      </components>
    </pageregioncontent>
  </pageregioncontents>
  <components/>
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <css/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="createDefaultRow" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	skuid.$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
		var m = skuid.$M('pgs__NewPage');
		// Create a default row
		m.createRow();
		// Prevent leaving this page if our Model has unsaved changes
		m.preventUnloadIfUnsavedChanges = true;
	});
})(skuid);</jsitem>
    </javascript>
  </resources>
</skuidpage>

name: PageAssignments
content:
<skuid__page unsavedchangeswarning="yes" globalfeedbackenabled="false" theme="Skuid App">
	<models>
		<model id="RecordTypes" limit="50000" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="RecordType" datasourcetype="" type="" doclone="" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false">
			<fields>
				<field id="DeveloperName"/>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="SobjectType"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="SobjectType" clientorserver="server" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="SobjectType" operator="="/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="Profiles" limit="50000" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="Profile" datasourcetype="" type="" doclone="" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false">
			<fields>
				<field id="Name"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions/>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="assign__UniqueObjectTypesUsed_Filter" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page_Assignment__c" doclone="" type="aggregate" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false" datasource="salesforce">
			<fields/>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Environment_Type__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="EnvironmentType" operator="="/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
			<groupby method="simple">
				<field id="skuid__SObject_Type__c" name="objectType"/>
			</groupby>
		</model>
		<model id="assign__UniqueObjectTypesUsed_Packaging" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page_Assignment__c" doclone="" type="aggregate" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false" datasource="salesforce">
			<fields/>
			<conditions/>
			<actions/>
			<groupby method="simple">
				<field id="skuid__SObject_Type__c" name="objectType"/>

				<field id="skuid__Context__c"/>

				<field id="skuid__Use_Standard_Layouts__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="BOOLEAN" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Use standard layouts"/>

				<field id="skuid__Assigned_To_User__r.Name"/>
				<field id="skuid__Assigned_To_User__r.Username"/>

				<field id="situation_UI" uionly="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT" label="Assignment type" defaultValue="object_type">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="object_type" label="Object"/>
						<entry value="arbitrary" label="Other Situation"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="Specify_Record_Type" uionly="true" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Specify record type?" defaultValue="false" helptext="If enabled, builders can select which record type is affected by the assignment."/>
				<field id="Assigned_To_Type_UI" uionly="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT" label="Apply assignment to" defaultValue="org">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="org" label="Organization Default"/>
						<entry value="profile" label="Profile"/>
						<entry value="user" label="User"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="Assigned_To_Profile_UI" uionly="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" picklistsource="rowsinmodel" returntype="TEXT" picklistmodel="Profiles" entryvalue="{{Id}}" entrylabel="{{Name}}" label="Profile"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Id" clientorserver="server" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="Id" operator="="/>
			</conditions>
			<actions>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" affectedrows="context">
							<updates>
								<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="skuid__SObject_Type__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{SObject_Type_Source_UI}}"/>
							</updates>
						</action>
						<action type="setCondition" model="RecordTypes" condition="SobjectType" value="{{SObject_Type_Source_UI}}"/>
						<action type="requeryModel" model="RecordTypes" behavior="standard">
							<onerroractions>
								<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000"/>
							</onerroractions>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>SObject_Type_Source_UI</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" label="clear page value if standard layouts is used">
							<formula>{{skuid__Use_Standard_Layouts__c}}</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" affectedrows="context">
									<updates>
										<update valuesource="blank" field="skuid__Page__c" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Page__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
									</updates>
								</action>
							</iftrueactions>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>skuid__Use_Standard_Layouts__c</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" label="if situation is arbitrary, clear record type value and set use_standard_layout to false">
							<formula>{{situation_UI}} === "arbitrary"</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" affectedrows="context">
									<updates>
										<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Specify_Record_Type" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="false"/>
										<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Use_Standard_Layouts__c" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="false"/>
									</updates>
								</action>
							</iftrueactions>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>situation_UI</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit">
							<formula>{{Specify_Record_Type}} === false</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" affectedrows="context">
									<updates>
										<update valuesource="blank" field="skuid__RecordTypeDeveloperName__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
									</updates>
								</action>
							</iftrueactions>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>Specify_Record_Type</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit">
							<formula>{{skuid__Action_Type__c}} === "Tab" || {{skuid__Action_Type__c}} === "List"</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" affectedrows="context">
									<updates>
										<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Specify_Record_Type" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="false"/>
									</updates>
								</action>
							</iftrueactions>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>skuid__Action_Type__c</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" affectedrows="context">
							<updates>
								<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Context__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{Assigned_To_Profile_UI}}"/>
							</updates>
						</action>

					</events>
					<fields>

					<actions>

			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="checkIfSituationIsObjectType" cachelocation="false">
				var $ = skuid.$;
				
				var model = skuid.$M('assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit'),
				    fields = model.fields,
				    row = model.getFirstRow(),
				    sObjectType = row.skuid__SObject_Type__c,
				    field = fields.find(field => field.id === "SObject_Type_Source_UI");
				    sObjectList = field.picklistEntries;
				
				if (sObjectList.find(sObject => sObject.value === sObjectType)) {
				    model.updateRow(row, {situation_UI: "object_type"});
						model.updateRow(row, {SObject_Type_Source_UI: row.skuid__SObject_Type__c});
				}
				else {
				     model.updateRow(row, {situation_UI: "arbitrary"});
				}
			</jsitem>
		</javascript>

										<condition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="skuid__SObject_Type__c" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Page_Assignment__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>

										<condition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="skuid__Page__c" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Page__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>

											<models>
												<model>assign__Assignments_Classic</model>
												<model>assign__Assignments_Lightning</model>
											</models>

									<actions>

												<model>assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit</model>
											</models>
											<onerroractions>
												<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000"/>
											</onerroractions>
										</action>
										<action type="requeryModels" behavior="standard">
											<models>
												<model>assign__Assignments_Classic</model>
												<model>assign__Assignments_Lightning</model>
											</models>

									</renderConditions>
									<enableConditions logictype="custom" logic="1 AND (2 OR 3)" message="Check 2 things: 1. Object Type can't be blank. 2. Skuid Page can't be blank or Use Standard Layout is selected">
										<condition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="skuid__SObject_Type__c" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Page_Assignment__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
										<condition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="skuid__Use_Standard_Layouts__c" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Page_Assignment__c" value="true"/>
										<condition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="skuid__Page__c" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Page__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
									</enableConditions>

									<styleVariantConditions/>

			<actionsequence id="7f2734f6-ba69-454e-9f62-4bb7b268e4b7" label="Populate Ui Only fields " type="reusable">
				<description>before opening Page Assignments edit modal</description>
				<actions>
					<action type="branch" whenfinished="continue" model="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" label="if applies to User">
						<formula>NOT(ISBLANK({{skuid__Assigned_To_User__c}}))</formula>
						<iftrueactions>
							<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" affectedrows="context">
								<updates>
									<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Assigned_To_Type_UI" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="user"/>
								</updates>
							</action>
						</iftrueactions>
					</action>
					<action type="branch" whenfinished="continue" model="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" label="if applies to Profile">
						<formula>ISBLANK({{skuid__Assigned_To_User__c}}) && NOT(ISBLANK({{skuid__Context__c}}))</formula>
						<iftrueactions>
							<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" affectedrows="context">
								<updates>
									<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Assigned_To_Type_UI" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="profile"/>
								</updates>
							</action>
							<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" affectedrows="context">
								<updates>
									<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Assigned_To_Profile_UI" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{skuid__Context__c}}"/>
								</updates>
							</action>
						</iftrueactions>
					</action>
					<action type="branch" whenfinished="continue" model="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" label="if applies to Org Default">
						<formula>ISBLANK({{skuid__Context__c}})</formula>
						<iftrueactions>
							<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" affectedrows="context">
								<updates>
									<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Assigned_To_Type_UI" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="org"/>
								</updates>
							</action>
						</iftrueactions>
					</action>
					<action type="branch" whenfinished="continue" label="if Record Type has value" model="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit">
						<formula>NOT(ISBLANK({{skuid__RecordTypeDeveloperName__c}}))</formula>
						<iftrueactions>
							<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" affectedrows="context">
								<updates>
									<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Specify_Record_Type" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="true"/>
								</updates>
							</action>
						</iftrueactions>
					</action>
					<action type="branch" whenfinished="continue" model="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" label="if Record Type is blank">
						<formula>ISBLANK({{skuid__RecordTypeDeveloperName__c}})</formula>
						<iftrueactions>
							<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit" affectedrows="context">
								<updates>
									<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Specify_Record_Type" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="false"/>
								</updates>
							</action>
						</iftrueactions>
					</action>
					<action type="custom" snippet="checkIfSituationIsObjectType">
						<onerroractions>
							<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000"/>
						</onerroractions>
					</action>
					<action type="save">
						<models>
							<model>assign__Assignments_New_Or_Edit</model>
						</models>
					</action>
				</actions>
			</actionsequence>
