											<formula>{{pack_options}} === "create_new"</formula>
											<iftrueactions>
												<action type="runComponentAction" componentid="wizard-selected-page-assignment-pack" action="navigateToStep" stepId="step2"/>
												<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="page_assignment_ui_only" affectedrows="context">
													<updates>
														<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="not_on_step_1" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="true"/>
													</updates>
												</action>
											</iftrueactions>
										</action>
										<action type="runComponentAction" componentid="wizard-selected-page-assignment-pack" action="navigateToStep" stepId="step3"/>
										<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="page_assignment_ui_only" affectedrows="context">
											<updates>
												<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="not_on_step_1" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="true"/>
											</updates>
										</action>
									</actions>
								</skuid__button>
								<skuid__button label="Build Pack" uniqueid="button-build-pack-selected" styleSettingsVariant="primary">
									<actions>
										<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.pageAssignments.pack">
											<onerroractions>
												<action type="blockUI" message="Error building page assignment pack" timeout="3000" styleSettingsVariant="dark"/>
											</onerroractions>
										</action>
									</actions>
									<renderConditions logictype="and">
										<renderCondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="page_assignment_ui_only" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="not_on_step_1" value="true"/>
									</renderConditions>
									<enableConditions logictype="and">
										<condition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="assign__StaticResourceInfoForPackaging" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="skipandnorender" field="Name" fieldtargetobjects="StaticResource" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
									</enableConditions>
									<styleVariantConditions/>
								</skuid__button>
							</buttons>
							<afterCloseActions>
								<action type="cancel">
									<models>
										<model>page_assignment_ui_only</model>
									</models>
								</action>
								<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="assign__StaticResourceInfoForPackaging_UI" affectedrows="context">
									<updates>
										<update valuesource="blank" field="Name" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
										<update valuesource="blank" field="Description" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
									</updates>
								</action>
							</afterCloseActions>
						</skuid__modal>
					</action>
				</actions>
			</actionsequence>
			<actionsequence id="493e03ba-3fbf-4dcf-bee7-f7924a754a99" label="SelectedNav" type="event-triggered" event-scope="component" event-name="page.rendered">
				<description/>
				<actions>
					<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="uiControl" affectedrows="context">
						<updates>
							<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Selected_Global_Nav" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="DEPLOYMENT"/>
						</updates>
					</action>
				</actions>
			</actionsequence>
		</actionsequences>
	</resources>
</skuid__page>

name: PageBuilder
content:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" hideeditbutton="true" globalfeedbackenabled="false">
  <models>
    <model id="page" sobject="skuid__Page__c" createrowifnonefound="true" query="true" limit="1" orderby="skuid__Module__c NULLS FIRST" datasourcetype="salesforce" type="">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__API_Version__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
        <field id="OwnerId"/>
        <field id="Owner.Name" targetobjects="User"/>
        <field id="skuid__Max_Auto_Saves__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Count_Auto_Saved_Versions__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__IsMaster__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Pages__r" type="childRelationship" limit="">
          <conditions/>
          <fields>
            <field id="Id"/>
          </fields>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Module__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Type__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Composer_Settings__c"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="skuid__Last_Modified_Date_Check__c"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
        <field id="SaveConflictOption" uionly="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" label="Please Choose an Option:" helptext="Choose one of the following options to resolve the page revision conflict." readonly="false">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="Reload" label="Cancel my changes and reload the page. (You will lose your changes.)"/>
            <entry value="NewPage" label="Save my changes as a new page."/>
            <entry value="NewVersion" label="Save my changes as a separate revision. (The server's revision will remain as the current revision.)"/>
            <entry value="Overwrite" label="Save my changes as the current revision. (The server's revision will be stored as an older page revision.)"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" field="Id" value="id" novaluebehavior="deactivate"/>
        <condition type="param" value="pagename" field="Name" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" novaluebehavior="deactivate"/>
        <condition type="param" value="pagemodule" field="skuid__Module__c" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" novaluebehavior="deactivate"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.builder.page.triggerVersionCheck"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>Name</field>
            <field>OwnerId</field>
            <field>skuid__API_Version__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Composer_Settings__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Count_Auto_Saved_Versions__c</field>
            <field>skuid__IsMaster__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Layout2__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Layout3__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Layout4__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Layout5__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Layout__c</field>
            <field>skuid__MasterPage__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Max_Auto_Saves__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Module__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="versions" limit="10" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page_Version__c" orderby="CreatedDate DESC">
      <fields>
        <field id="CreatedDate"/>
        <field id="skuid__API_Version__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__IsAutoSave__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Description__c"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="CreatedById"/>
        <field id="CreatedBy.Name"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="" field="skuid__Page__c" operator="=" model="page" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="Id"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="false" enclosevalueinquotes="false" field="skuid__IsAutoSave__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="IsNotAutoSave"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="pageBuilder_SelectedVersion" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page_Version__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__API_Version__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Id" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="selectedversionid"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="pagebuilder_ChildPages" limit="25" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="" type="" sobject="skuid__Page__c" orderby="LastModifiedDate DESC">
      <fields>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedById"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedBy.Name"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
        <field id="skuid__API_Version__c"/>
        <field id="CreatedById"/>
        <field id="CreatedBy.Name"/>
        <field id="CreatedDate"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="" field="skuid__MasterPage__c" operator="=" model="page" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="Id" novaluebehavior="noquery" state=""/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="pagebuilder_TemplateSelector" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="id" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="previewurl" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="name" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="description" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="def" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="templateprops" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="pagebuilder_SelectedTemplate" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="id" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="previewurl" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="name" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="description" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="def" displaytype="TEXT"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="pagebuilder_TemplateProps" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="id" displaytype="TEXT" readonly="true"/>
        <field id="type" displaytype="TEXT" readonly="true"/>
        <field id="defaultvalue" displaytype="TEXT" readonly="true"/>
        <field id="description" displaytype="TEXT" readonly="true"/>
        <field id="value" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="modelprop" displaytype="TEXT"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="themes" limit="999" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="" type="" sobject="skuid__Theme__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Resource_Name__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="ClonePageData" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c" doclone="yes" datasourcetype="" type="" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
        <field id="OwnerId"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="Owner.Name" targetobjects="User"/>
        <field id="skuid__API_Version__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__IsMaster__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Max_Auto_Saves__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Composer_Settings__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="modelmerge" operator="=" value="" field="Id" novaluebehavior="noquery" model="page" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="Id"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="OrgPreferences" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" sobject="skuid__Preferences__c" datasourcetype="" type="" datasource="salesforce">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Offline_Mode__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="userinfo" value="" field="SetupOwnerId" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" userinfotype="organizationid"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <pageregioncontents>
    <pageregioncontent regionid="sk-1uFo3V-67" uniqueid="sk-1uLo4g-22" defaultcontent="true">
      <components>
        <wrapper uniqueid="sk-1p24Mu-118" cssclass="nx-pagebuilder">
          <components>
            <wrapper uniqueid="sk-RnHRF-256" cssclass="nx-pagebuilder-title-main">
              <components>
                <grid uniqueid="sk-3EusX4-1267" cssclass="">
                  <divisions>
                    <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1" verticalalign="top">
                      <components>
                        <pagetitle model="page" id="pageheader" cssclass="" uniqueid="sk-3x7HAP-407">
                          <maintitle>{{$Label.Building_Page}} - {{Name}}</maintitle>
                          <subtitle>{{#skuid__Module__c}}{{$Label.Module}} {{skuid__Module__c}}{{/skuid__Module__c}}{{^skuid__Module__c}}{{$Label.No_module}}{{/skuid__Module__c}}</subtitle>
                        </pagetitle>
                      </components>
                    </division>
                    <division behavior="fit" verticalalign="top">
                      <components>
                        <custom name="CollaborationUI" uniqueid="sk-3EmSZ_-235" cssclass="fs-block"/>
                      </components>
                    </division>
                    <division behavior="fit" verticalalign="top">
                      <components>
                        <pagetitle model="page" id="pageheader" cssclass="" uniqueid="sk-3x7HAP-408" msgcontainerid="messages-ui">
                          <actions>
                            <action type="custom" label="{{$Label.Preview}}" snippet="pagepreview" uniqueid="sk-8AijA-290">
                              <hotkeys>
                                <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="p"/>
                                <hotkey modifiers="meta" key="p"/>
                              </hotkeys>
                            </action>
                            <action type="group" label="More Page Actions" usefirstitemasdefault="false" openonhover="false" uniqueid="sk-8AijC-293" cssclass="nx-button-more-actions" secondary="true">
                              <actions>
                                <action type="multi" label="Child Pages" icon="sk-icon-hierarchy">
                                  <actions>
                                    <action type="requeryModel" model="pagebuilder_ChildPages" behavior="standard"/>
                                    <action type="showPopup">
                                      <popup title="Child Pages" width="90%">
                                        <components>
                                          <skootable showconditions="true" showsavecancel="false" showerrorsinline="true" searchmethod="server" searchbox="true" showexportbuttons="false" pagesize="10" createrecords="false" model="pagebuilder_ChildPages" buttonposition="" mode="readonly" uniqueid="sk-2riMDg-198">
                                            <fields>
                                              <field id="Name"/>
                                              <field id="skuid__API_Version__c" readonly="true"/>
                                              <field type="COMBO" valuehalign="" allowordering="true" orderfield="LastModifiedDate" cssclass="fs-block">
                                                <label>Last Modified</label>
                                                <template>{{LastModifiedDate}} ({{LastModifiedById}})</template>
                                              </field>
                                              <field type="COMBO" valuehalign="" allowordering="true" orderfield="CreatedDate" cssclass="fs-block">
                                                <label>Created</label>
                                                <template>{{CreatedDate}} ({{CreatedById}})</template>
                                              </field>
                                            </fields>
                                            <rowactions>
                                              <action type="redirect" label="Edit Page" icon="sk-icon-page-edit" window="blank" url="/apex/skuid__PageBuilder?id={{{Id}}}"/>
                                              <action type="custom" label="Preview" icon="sk-icon-preview" snippet="skuid.pageBuilder.preview"/>
                                            </rowactions>
                                            <massactions usefirstitemasdefault="true"/>
                                            <views>
                                              <view type="standard"/>
                                            </views>
                                            <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                                            <actions defaultlabel="Global Actions" defaulticon="sk-icon-magic" usefirstitemasdefault="true">
                                              <action type="multi" label="Create New Child Page" icon="sk-icon-add">
                                                <actions>
                                                  <action type="cancel">
                                                    <models>
                                                      <model>pagebuilder_ChildPages</model>
                                                    </models>
                                                  </action>
                                                  <action type="createRow" model="pagebuilder_ChildPages" appendorprepend="prepend" defaultmodefornewitems="edit">
                                                    <defaults>
                                                      <default type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__MasterPage__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{$Model.page.data.0.Id}}"/>
                                                    </defaults>
                                                  </action>
                                                  <action type="showPopup">
                                                    <popup title="New Child Page" width="90%">
                                                      <components>
                                                        <pagetitle uniqueid="sk-2xJssN-219" model="pagebuilder_ChildPages">
                                                          <maintitle>Create New Child Page</maintitle>
                                                          <actions>
                                                            <action type="multi" label="Create" window="self" rollbackonanyerror="false" icon="sk-icon-save">
                                                              <actions>
                                                                <action type="custom" rollbackonanyerror="false" snippet="skuid.pagebuilder.setChildPageXML">
                                                                  <models>
                                                                    <model>pagebuilder_ChildPages</model>
                                                                  </models>
                                                                  <onerroractions/>
                                                                </action>
                                                                <action type="save">
                                                                  <onerroractions>
                                                                    <action type="blockUI" message="There was an error saving the new Child Page" timeout="3000"/>
                                                                  </onerroractions>
                                                                  <models>
                                                                    <model>pagebuilder_ChildPages</model>
                                                                  </models>
                                                                </action>
                                                                <action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
                                                                <action type="redirect" window="blank" url="/apex/skuid__PageBuilder?id={{{Id}}}"/>
                                                              </actions>
                                                            </action>
                                                            <action type="multi" label="Cancel" icon="sk-icon-cancel">
                                                              <actions>
                                                                <action type="cancel">
                                                                  <models>
                                                                    <model>pagebuilder_ChildPages</model>
                                                                  </models>
                                                                </action>
                                                                <action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
                                                              </actions>
                                                            </action>
                                                          </actions>
                                                        </pagetitle>
                                                        <basicfieldeditor showheader="true" showsavecancel="false" showerrorsinline="true" model="pagebuilder_ChildPages" buttonposition="" uniqueid="sk-2xJoRw-208" mode="edit" layout="above">
                                                          <columns layoutmode="responsive" columngutter="4px" rowgutter="4px">
                                                            <column behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" ratio="1" minwidth="300px">
                                                              <sections>
                                                                <section title="Section A" collapsible="no" showheader="false">
                                                                  <fields>
                                                                    <field id="Name" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"/>
                                                                  </fields>
                                                                </section>
                                                              </sections>
                                                            </column>
                                                          </columns>
                                                          <conditions>
                                                            <condition type="contextrow" field="Id" mergefield="Id" operator="="/>
                                                          </conditions>
                                                          <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                                                        </basicfieldeditor>
                                                      </components>
                                                    </popup>
                                                  </action>
                                                </actions>
                                              </action>
                                            </actions>
                                          </skootable>
                                        </components>
                                      </popup>
                                    </action>
                                  </actions>
                                  <renderconditions logictype="and">
                                    <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="page" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__IsMaster__c" value="true"/>
                                  </renderconditions>
                                  <enableconditions/>
                                </action>
                                <action type="multi" label="{{$Label.Clone}}" icon="sk-icon-clone">
                                  <actions>
                                    <action type="blockUI" message="Cloning from last saved page revision..."/>
                                    <action type="requeryModel" model="ClonePageData" behavior="standard">
                                      <onerroractions>
                                        <action type="blockUI" message="There was an error, and this page could not be cloned." timeout="3000"/>
                                      </onerroractions>
                                    </action>
                                    <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="ClonePageData" field="Name" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{$Model.page.data.0.Name}}__clone"/>
                                    <action type="unblockUI"/>
                                    <action type="showPopup">
                                      <popup title="{{$Label.Clone}}" width="50%">
                                        <components>
                                          <pagetitle model="ClonePageData">
                                            <maintitle>{{$Label.Clone}} {{Model.Label}}</maintitle>
                                            <subtitle>
                                              <template>{{Model.Label}}</template>
                                            </subtitle>
                                            <actions>
                                              <action type="multi" label="Create Cloned Page" icon="sk-icon-save">
                                                <actions>
                                                  <action type="blockUI" message="Creating page clone..."/>
                                                  <action type="save">
                                                    <models>
                                                      <model>ClonePageData</model>
                                                    </models>
                                                    <onerroractions>
                                                      <action type="blockUI" message="There was an error creating the page clone." timeout="2000"/>
                                                    </onerroractions>
                                                  </action>
                                                  <action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
                                                  <action type="unblockUI" timeout="1500" message="Page cloned successfully! Opening Page Composer in separate window..."/>
                                                  <action type="showPopup" window="blank">
                                                    <popup title="{{$Label.Clone}}" width="50%">
                                                      <components>
                                                        <pagetitle uniqueid="sk-1rf6y--614" model="pgs__NewPage">
                                                          <maintitle>Cloning Finished</maintitle>
                                                          <actions/>
                                                        </pagetitle>
                                                        <pagetitle uniqueid="sk-1rdadh-260" model="ClonePageData">
                                                          <actions>
                                                            <action type="multi" label="Open Cloned Page" icon="sk-icon-table-edit">
                                                              <actions>
                                                                <action type="redirect" window="blank" url="/apex/skuid__PageBuilder?id={{{Id}}}"/>
                                                                <action type="closeAllPopups"/>
                                                              </actions>
                                                            </action>
                                                            <action type="multi" label="Stay Here" secondary="true">
                                                              <actions>
                                                                <action type="closeAllPopups"/>
                                                              </actions>
                                                            </action>
                                                          </actions>
                                                        </pagetitle>
                                                      </components>
                                                    </popup>
                                                  </action>
                                                </actions>
                                              </action>
                                              <action type="multi" label="{{$Label.Cancel}}" icon="sk-icon-cancel" secondary="true">
                                                <actions>
                                                  <action type="emptyModelData">
                                                    <models>
                                                      <model>ClonePageData</model>
                                                    </models>
                                                  </action>
                                                  <action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
                                                </actions>
                                              </action>
                                            </actions>
                                          </pagetitle>
                                          <basicfieldeditor showsavecancel="false" showheader="true" model="ClonePageData" mode="edit" buttonposition="" layout="">
                                            <columns>
                                              <column width="100%">
                                                <sections>
                                                  <section title="New Page Information" collapsible="no">
                                                    <fields>
                                                      <field id="Name" required="true" valuehalign="" type=""/>
                                                      <field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
                                                      <field id="OwnerId">
                                                        <label>Page Owner</label>
                                                        <filters/>
                                                      </field>
                                                    </fields>
                                                  </section>
                                                </sections>
                                              </column>
                                            </columns>
                                          </basicfieldeditor>
                                        </components>
                                      </popup>
                                    </action>
                                  </actions>
                                </action>
                                <action type="multi" label="Download as XML file" icon="fa-arrow-down">
                                  <actions>
                                    <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.builder.downloadAsXMLFile"/>
                                  </actions>
                                </action>
                                <action type="share" icon="sk-icon-share"/>
                                <action type="multi" label="Delete" icon="sk-icon-delete">
                                  <actions>
                                    <action type="markRowsForDeletion" model="page" affectedrows="context"/>
                                    <action type="showPopup">
                                      <popup title="Delete Page: {{Name}}" width="640px">
                                        <components>
                                          <wrapper uniqueid="sk-11pR-1214">
                                            <components>
                                              <richtext multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-11p3-895">
                                                <contents><p>Are you sure you want to delete this page?</p>
                                                </contents>
                                              </richtext>
                                            </components>
                                            <styles>
                                              <styleitem type="background"/>
                                              <styleitem type="border" padding="bottom,">
                                                <styles>
                                                  <styleitem property="padding-bottom" value="16px"/>
                                                  <styleitem property="padding-top" value="16px"/>
                                                  <styleitem property="padding-left" value="6px"/>
                                                  <styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/>
                                                </styles>
                                              </styleitem>
                                              <styleitem type="size"/>
                                            </styles>
                                          </wrapper>
                                          <buttonset model="page" uniqueid="sk-11p8-971" position="left">
                                            <buttons>
                                              <button type="multi" label="Yes, delete page" uniqueid="sk-11p8-977">
                                                <actions>
                                                  <action type="save" rollbackonanyerror="true">
                                                    <models>
                                                      <model>page</model>
                                                    </models>
                                                    <onerroractions>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="skuid.pageBuilder.preview" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    pagePreview = skuid.snippet.getSnippet('skuid.builder.page.preview');
pagePreview && pagePreview({
    model: params.model,

});</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ShowGrowlNotification_Saving" cachelocation="false">skuid.$.growlUI(skuid.$L('saving'));</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="UtilSnippets" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
    var $ = skuid.$;
    
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    var titles = $('.nx-pagebuilder-title-main'); 
	    // Theres a weird bug where if you're editing the pagebuilder
	    // with the pagebuilder, 2 titles will appear. So we just remove
	    // the second one
	    /*
		if(titles[1]){
		    titles[1].remove();
		}
		*/
		titles.prependTo('.nx-pagebuilder-toolbar-wrapper');
	});
	
	//  Set the new Child Page XML
	skuid.snippet.register('skuid.pagebuilder.setChildPageXML',function(config){
        var model = config.model,
            row = config.row,
            pageXML = '<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes">' +
            	'<models/>' +
            	'<pageregioncontents/>' +
            	'<components/>' + // Shouldn't be needed, but...
            	'<resources>' +
            		'<labels/>' +
            		'<css/>' +
            		'<javascript/>' +
            	'</resources>' +
            	'</skuidpage>';
        
        skuid.utils.writeXmlToPageLayoutFields(pageXML,model,row);
	});
})(skuid);</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="setDefaultsOnClonedRecord" url="">
// When cloning Pages in protected modules,
// we want to set the default Module to be '' instead.
// Also, when the Owner.Name is 'Skuid',
// we want to set the OwnerId to be the running user.
$j().ready(function(){
    var model = skuid.model.getModel('PageData');

    if (model && model.data.length) {
        var row = model.getFirstRow(),
            needToRedraw = false;
        if (model.getFieldValue(row,'Owner.Name') == 'Skuid') {
            model.updateRow(row,'OwnerId',skuid.utils.userInfo.userId);
            model.updateRow(row,'Owner',{Name:skuid.utils.userInfo.name});
            needToRedraw = true;
        }
        
        if (model.getFieldValue(row,'skuid__Module__c') == 'Skuid') {
            model.updateRow(row,'skuid__Module__c',null);
            needToRedraw = true;
        }

        // Now redraw our list, if necessary
        if (needToRedraw) {
            $j.each(model.registeredLists,function(listId,list){
                list.render({doNotCache:true});
            });
        }

    }
});
</jsitem>
    </javascript>

      <cssitem location="inline" name="pageCollaboration" cachelocation="false">.interaction-container {
    margin-top: 3px;
    float: right;
    margin-right: 10px;
}

.interaction-container.hibernating {
    opacity: 0.3;
}

.interaction-avatar {
    display: none;
    position: relative;
    margin-left: 3px;
}

.interaction-avatar IMG {
    background-color: white;
    height: 25px;
}

.interaction-avatar.composerOpened IMG {
    border: solid 1px #212324;
}

.interaction-avatar.composerUnsavedChanges IMG {
    border: solid 1px red;
}

.interaction-avatar.stale IMG {
    opacity: 0.3;
}

.interaction-avatar .unsaved-changes-warning {
    display: none;
    /* Prevent the warning icon from grabbing the focus and preventing the tooltip from showing */
    pointer-events: none;
}

.interaction-avatar.composerUnsavedChanges .unsaved-changes-warning {
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
	left: 0;
	bottom: 0;
	color: red;
	text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px black;
}</cssitem>
      <cssitem location="inline" name="message-container" cachelocation="false">.message-container > .nx-editor-header {
    display: none;
}

.message-container > .nx-messages:empty {
    display: none;
}</cssitem>

                        <action type="multi" label="Choose Another Template" secondary="true" icon="sk-icon-arrow-left" uniqueid="sk-Rtgb4-466">
                          <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                          <actions>
                            <action type="navigateToStep" stepid="ChooseTemplate"/>
                          </actions>
                          <enableconditions/>
                        </action>
                        <action type="multi" label="Apply Selected Template" uniqueid="sk-Rjiel-1069" icon="sk-icon-save">
                          <actions>
                            <action type="custom" snippet="ComponentAcceptor.applySelectedTemplate"/>
                            <action type="action-sequence" action-sequence-id="d51c76ac-3021-4d84-9d4d-66d6df3885e2"/>
                          </actions>
                          <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                          <enableconditions/>
                        </action>
                      </actions>
                    </step>
                  </steps>
                </wizard>
              </components>
            </popup>
          </action>
        </actions>
      </actionsequence>
      <actionsequence id="d51c76ac-3021-4d84-9d4d-66d6df3885e2" label="CloseChildTemplateSelector" type="reusable" uniqueid="sk-T-YSD-522">
        <description/>
        <actions>
          <action type="emptyModelData">
            <models>
              <model>pagebuilder_TemplateSelector</model>
              <model>pagebuilder_TemplateProps</model>
            </models>
          </action>
          <action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
        </actions>
      </actionsequence>
      <actionsequence id="3cc5e284-9985-4ace-9cc9-a579b02390c8" label="Migrate API Version" type="reusable">
        <description>Migrates this Page to a later API Version</description>
        <actions>
          <action type="showPopup">
            <popup title="Migrate to API v2" width="50%">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2f_w-1338" allowhtml="true">
                  <contents><p>Click "Migrate" to begin the process of converting this page from Skuid API Version v1 to v2.</p>
<p><b>NOTE: Any JavaScript or CSS customizations will need to be manually evaluated to see whether the functionality is still appropriate. The Migrate wizard will not make ANY changes to existing JavaScript or CSS resources in this page.</b></p>
<p>If, after the migration is complete, you would like to revert to the previous API version, go to the "Revisions" area and click "Restore" next to the page revision that you would like to revert to.</p></contents>
                </template>
                <buttonset uniqueid="sk-2f_s-1327" position="left">
                  <buttons>
                    <button type="multi" label="Migrate" uniqueid="sk-2g00-2436">
                      <actions>
                        <action type="blockUI" message="Migrating to API v2..."/>
                        <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.page.migrateAPIVersion">
                          <onerroractions>
                            <action type="blockUI" message="There was an error migrating this page to API v2" timeout="3000"/>
                          </onerroractions>
                        </action>
                        <action type="blockUI" message="Migration complete! Reloading Page Composer..."/>
                        <action type="redirect" window="self" url="/apex/skuid__PageBuilder?id={{{$Model.page.data.0.Id}}}"/>
                      </actions>
                    </button>
                    <button type="multi" label="{{$Label.Cancel}}" uniqueid="sk-2f_g-1228" secondary="true">
                      <actions>
                        <action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
                      </actions>
                    </button>
                  </buttons>
                </buttonset>
              </components>
            </popup>
          </action>
        </actions>
      </actionsequence>
    </actionsequences>
  </resources>
</skuidpage>

name: PageBuilderV2
content:
<skuid__page unsavedchangeswarning="yes" hideeditbutton="true" globalfeedbackenabled="false">
  <models>
    <model id="page" sobject="skuid__Page__c" createrowifnonefound="true" query="true" limit="1" orderby="skuid__Module__c NULLS FIRST" datasourcetype="salesforce" type="">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__API_Version__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
        <field id="OwnerId"/>
        <field id="Owner.Name" targetobjects="User"/>
        <field id="skuid__Max_Auto_Saves__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Count_Auto_Saved_Versions__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__IsMaster__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Pages__r" type="childRelationship" limit="">
          <conditions/>
          <fields>
            <field id="Id"/>
          </fields>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Module__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__Type__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Composer_Settings__c"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="skuid__Last_Modified_Date_Check__c"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
        <field id="SaveConflictOption" uionly="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" label="Please Choose an Option:" helptext="Choose one of the following options to resolve the page revision conflict." readonly="false">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="Reload" label="Cancel my changes and reload the page. (You will lose your changes.)"/>
            <entry value="NewPage" label="Save my changes as a new page."/>
            <entry value="NewVersion" label="Save my changes as a separate revision. (The server's revision will remain as the current revision.)"/>
            <entry value="Overwrite" label="Save my changes as the current revision. (The server's revision will be stored as an older page revision.)"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" field="Id" value="id" novaluebehavior="deactivate"/>
        <condition type="param" value="pagename" field="Name" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" novaluebehavior="deactivate"/>
        <condition type="param" value="pagemodule" field="skuid__Module__c" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" novaluebehavior="deactivate"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.builder.page.triggerVersionCheck"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>Name</field>
            <field>OwnerId</field>
            <field>skuid__API_Version__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Composer_Settings__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Count_Auto_Saved_Versions__c</field>
            <field>skuid__IsMaster__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Layout2__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Layout3__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Layout4__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Layout5__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Layout__c</field>
            <field>skuid__MasterPage__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Max_Auto_Saves__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Module__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="versions" limit="10" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page_Version__c" orderby="CreatedDate DESC">
      <fields>
        <field id="CreatedDate"/>
        <field id="skuid__API_Version__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__IsAutoSave__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Description__c"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="CreatedById"/>
        <field id="CreatedBy.Name"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="" field="skuid__Page__c" operator="=" model="page" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="Id"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="false" enclosevalueinquotes="false" field="skuid__IsAutoSave__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="IsNotAutoSave"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="pageBuilder_SelectedVersion" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page_Version__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__API_Version__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Id" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="selectedversionid"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="pagebuilder_ChildPages" limit="25" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c" orderby="LastModifiedDate DESC" datasource="salesforce">
      <fields>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedById"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedBy.Name"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
        <field id="skuid__API_Version__c"/>
        <field id="CreatedById"/>
        <field id="CreatedBy.Name"/>
        <field id="CreatedDate"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="" field="skuid__MasterPage__c" operator="=" model="page" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="Id" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="pagebuilder_TemplateSelector" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="id" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="previewurl" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="name" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="description" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="def" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="templateprops" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="pagebuilder_SelectedTemplate" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="id" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="previewurl" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="name" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="description" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="def" displaytype="TEXT"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="pagebuilder_TemplateProps" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="id" displaytype="TEXT" readonly="true"/>
        <field id="type" displaytype="TEXT" readonly="true"/>
        <field id="defaultvalue" displaytype="TEXT" readonly="true"/>
        <field id="description" displaytype="TEXT" readonly="true"/>
        <field id="value" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="modelprop" displaytype="TEXT"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="themes" limit="999" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="" type="" sobject="skuid__Theme__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Resource_Name__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="undo_redo_controller" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true">
			<fields>
				<field id="enable_undo" displaytype="BOOLEAN" readonly="false"/>
				<field id="enable_redo" displaytype="BOOLEAN" readonly="false"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions/>
			<actions/>
		</model>
    <model id="ClonePageData" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c" doclone="yes" datasourcetype="" type="" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
        <field id="OwnerId"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="Owner.Name" targetobjects="User"/>
        <field id="skuid__API_Version__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__IsMaster__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Max_Auto_Saves__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Composer_Settings__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="modelmerge" operator="=" value="" field="Id" novaluebehavior="noquery" model="page" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="Id"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="OrgPreferences" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" sobject="skuid__Preferences__c" datasourcetype="" type="" datasource="salesforce">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Offline_Mode__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="userinfo" value="" field="SetupOwnerId" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" userinfotype="organizationid"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="pgs__NewPage" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c" datasource="salesforce" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false" doclone="">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.Name"/>
        <field id="CreatedDate"/>
        <field id="skuid__API_Version__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Composer_Settings__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__IsMaster__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Max_Auto_Saves__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="setCondition" model="pgs__NewPage_DuplicateCheck" condition="searchname" value="{{{Name}}}"/>
            <action type="requeryModel" model="pgs__NewPage_DuplicateCheck" behavior="standard"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>Name</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="pgs__NewPage_DuplicateCheck" limit="" query="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c" datasource="salesforce">
			<fields>
				<field id="Id"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Name" clientorserver="server" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="searchname" operator="="/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
  </models>
  <components/>
  <pageregioncontents>
    <pageregioncontent regionid="sk-1uFo3V-67" uniqueid="sk-1uLo4g-22" defaultcontent="true">
      <components>
        <skuid__wrapper uniqueid="pagebuilder-wrapper">
          <components>
            <skuid__wrapper uniqueid="toolbar-and-buttons">
              <components>
                <skuid__header uniqueid="sk-11WwZS-301" model="page" title="{{$Label.Building_Page}} - {{{Name}}}">
                  <skuid__buttonSet uniqueid="sk-3tEb-532">
                    <groups>
                      <skuid__avatarGroup uniqueId="collaboration-avatars" />
                      <skuid__buttonGroup>
                        <buttons>
                          <skuid__button uniqueId="undo-btn" icon="sk-webicon-ink:undo" key="icon" value="sk-webicon-ink:undo" ariaLabel="{{$Label.Undo}}">
														<actions>
															<action type="custom" duration="0" snippet="skuid.pagebuilder.undo"/>
														</actions>
														<tooltip position="top" text="{{$Label.Undo}}" compact="true"/>
                            <renderConditions logictype="and"/>
														<enableConditions logictype="and">
															<condition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="undo_redo_controller" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="enable_undo" value="true"/>
														</enableConditions>
														<hotkeys>
															<hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="z"/>
															<hotkey modifiers="meta" key="z"/>
														</hotkeys>
													</skuid__button>
													<skuid__button uniqueId="redo-btn" icon="sk-webicon-ink:redo" key="icon" value="sk-webicon-ink:redo" ariaLabel="{{$Label.Redo}}">
														<actions>
															<action type="custom" duration="0" snippet="skuid.pagebuilder.redo"/>
														</actions>
														<tooltip position="top" text="{{$Label.Redo}}" compact="true"/>
                            <renderConditions logictype="and"/>
														<enableConditions logictype="and">
															<condition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="undo_redo_controller" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="enable_redo" value="true"/>
														</enableConditions>
														<hotkeys>
															<hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="y"/>
															<hotkey modifiers="meta" key="y"/>
															<hotkey modifiers="meta,shift" key="z"/>
														</hotkeys>
													</skuid__button>
                        </buttons>
                      </skuid__buttonGroup>
                      <skuid__buttonGroup>
                        <buttons>
                          <skuid__button uniqueid="preview-btn" label="{{$Label.Preview}}">
                            <actions>
                              <action type="custom" snippet="pagepreview"/>
                            </actions>
                            <hotkeys>
                              <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="p"/>
                              <hotkey modifiers="meta" key="p"/>
                            </hotkeys>
                            <tooltip position="top" text="Preview this Page (in a new tab)" compact="true"/>
                          </skuid__button>
                        </buttons>
                      </skuid__buttonGroup>
                      <skuid__buttonGroup displayType="attached">
                        <buttons>
                          <skuid__button uniqueid="childpages-btn" label="Child Pages" icon="sk-webicon-ink:add-user" ariaLabel="Child Pages">
                            <actions>
                              <action type="blockUI" message="Loading Child Pages..." showPlaceholder="true" styleSettingsVariant="dark"/>
                              <action type="requeryModel" model="pagebuilder_ChildPages" behavior="standard"/>
                              <action type="unblockUI"/>
                              <action type="showModal">
                                <skuid__modal title="Child Pages" width="100em">
                                  <components>
                                    <skuid__table uniqueid="sk-2riMDg-198" mode="readonly" model="pagebuilder_ChildPages" pageSize="10" enableExport="false" showSaveCancel="false">
                                      <fields>
                                        <field id="Name" uniqueid="sk-2bHy-711"/>
                                        <field id="skuid__API_Version__c" readOnly="true" uniqueid="sk-2bHy-714"/>
                                        <field type="COMBO" horizontalAlignment="" label="Last Modified" template="{{LastModifiedDate}} ({{LastModifiedBy.Name}})" uniqueid="sk-2bHy-717" fsBlock="true"/>
                                        <field type="COMBO" horizontalAlignment="" label="Created" template="{{CreatedDate}} ({{CreatedBy.Name}})" uniqueid="sk-2bHy-720" fsBlock="true"/>
                                      </fields>
                                      <actions>
                                        <action type="multi" label="Create New Child Page" icon="sk-webicon-ink:add">
                                          <actions>
                                            <action type="cancel">
                                              <models>
                                                <model>pagebuilder_ChildPages</model>
                                              </models>
                                            </action>
                                            <action type="createRow" model="pagebuilder_ChildPages" appendorprepend="prepend" defaultmodefornewitems="edit" affectedrows="context">
                                              <defaults>
                                                <default type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__MasterPage__c" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="{{{$Model.page.data.0.Id}}}"/>
                                                <default type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__API_Version__c" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="{{{$Model.page.data.0.skuid__API_Version__c}}}"/>
                                              </defaults>
                                            </action>
                                            <action type="showModal">
                                              <skuid__modal title="Create New Child Page" width="50em">
                                                <components>
                                                  <skuid__form showErrorsInline="true" model="pagebuilder_ChildPages" uniqueid="sk-2bIG-769" mode="edit" showSaveCancel="false">
                                                    <sections>
                                                      <section title="New Section" showHeading="false">
                                                        <rows>
                                                          <row uniqueid="sk-2bIM-800">
                                                            <fields>
                                                              <skuid__field id="Name" uniqueid="sk-2bIM-798" required="true"/>
                                                            </fields>
                                                          </row>
                                                        </rows>
                                                      </section>
                                                    </sections>
                                                  </skuid__form>
                                                </components>
                                                <buttons>
                                                  <skuid__button label="Create" uniqueid="sk-2ip5-756" styleSettingsVariant="primary" icon="sk-webicon-ink:check">
                                                    <actions>
                                                      <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.pagebuilder.setChildPageXML"/>
                                                      <action type="save">
                                                        <models>
                                                          <model>pagebuilder_ChildPages</model>
                                                        </models>
                                                      </action>
                                                      <action type="requeryModel" model="pagebuilder_ChildPages"/>
                                                      <action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
                                                    </actions>
                                                    <enableConditions logictype="and" message="Please enter a valid name for the new child page.">
                                                      <condition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="pagebuilder_ChildPages" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="Name" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate"/>
                                                    </enableConditions>
                                                  </skuid__button>
                                                  <skuid__button label="{{$Label.Cancel}}" uniqueid="sk-2ip5-759" icon="sk-webicon-ink:close">
                                                    <actions>
                                                      <action type="cancel">
                                                        <models>
                                                          <model>pagebuilder_ChildPages</model>
                                                        </models>
                                                      </action>
                                                      <action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
                                                    </actions>
                                                  </skuid__button>
                                                </buttons>
                                              </skuid__modal>
                                            </action>
                                          </actions>
                                        </action>
                                      </actions>
                                      <massActions/>
                                      <rowActions>
                                        <action type="multi" label="Edit Page" icon="sk-webicon-ink:edit-page">
                                          <actions>
                                            <action type="redirect" window="blank" url="/apex/skuid__PageBuilder?id={{{Id}}}"/>
                                          </actions>
                                        </action>
                                        <action type="multi" label="{{$Label.Preview}}" icon="sk-webicon-ink:preview">
                                          <actions>
                                            <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.pageBuilder.preview"/>
                                          </actions>
                                        </action>
                                      </rowActions>
                                      <renderConditions logictype="and"/>
                                      <filtering enableSearch="true" searchMethod="client" instantSearch="false"/>
                                    </skuid__table>
                                  </components>
                                  <afterCloseActions/>
                                </skuid__modal>
                              </action>
                            </actions>
                            <renderConditions logictype="and">
                              <renderCondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="page" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__IsMaster__c" value="true"/>
                            </renderConditions>
                            <tooltip position="top" text="Show child pages" compact="true"/>
                            <enableConditions/>
                          </skuid__button>
                        </buttons>
                      </skuid__buttonGroup>
                      <skuid__buttonGroup displayType="combo">
                        <buttons>
                          <skuid__button label="Revisions" uniqueid="revisions-btn" ariaLabel="Revisions">
                            <actions>
                              <action type="showModal" title="Page Revisions" width="80%">
                                <skuid__modal title="Page Revisions" width="100em">
                                  <components>
                                    <skuid__table uniqueid="sk-3x7HAP-408" mode="read" model="versions" pageSize="10" enableExport="false" showSaveCancel="true" title="Page Revisions">
                                      <fields>
                                        <field columnWidth="35%" id="skuid__Description__c" uniqueid="sk-2bM3-756"/>
                                        <field id="skuid__API_Version__c" readOnly="true" uniqueid="sk-2bM3-759">
                                          <renderConditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep"/>
                                          <enableConditions/>
                                        </field>
                                        <field readOnly="true" type="COMBO" horizontalAlignment="" label="Created By" template="{{CreatedBy.Name}}, {{CreatedDate}}" uniqueid="sk-2bM3-762" fsBlock="true"/>
                                      </fields>
                                      <filters>
                                        <skuid__filter type="toggle" label="Hide Auto-Saves" createFilterOffOption="true" filterOffOptionLabel="New Filter" conditionsToToggle="IsNotAutoSave" labelMode="manual" filterMethod="server" conditionSource="manual"/>
                                      </filters>
                                      <actions>
                                        <action type="multi" label="Add new Revision" icon="sk-webicon-ink:add">
                                          <actions>
                                            <action type="custom" snippet="addSavedPageVersion"/>
                                          </actions>
                                        </action>
                                      </actions>
                                      <massActions>
                                        <action type="multi" label="Mark selected revisions for deletion" icon="sk-webicon-ink:delete">
                                          <actions>
                                            <action type="markRowsForDeletion" model="version"/>
                                          </actions>
                                        </action>
                                      </massActions>
                                      <rowActions>
                                        <action type="multi" label="Restore this Revision" icon="sk-webicon-ink:import-page">
                                          <action type="custom" snippet="restoreFromSavedVersion"/>
                                          <actions>
