name: PageList
content:
<skuid__page unsavedchangeswarning="yes" theme="Skuid App">
	<models>
		<model id="ui_control" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="Ui-Only">
			<fields>
				<field id="sortby" displaytype="PICKLIST" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="-updated_at">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="name" label="Name A-Z"/>
						<entry value="-updated_at" label="Last Updated"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="page_pack_options" displaytype="PICKLIST" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT" label="Select an action for Page Assignments" defaultValue="create_new">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="create_new" label="Create new pack"/>
						<entry value="update_existing" label="Update existing pack"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="page_pack_current_step" displaytype="DOUBLE" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" precision="1" scale="0" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="0"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions/>
			<actions>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="ui_control">
							<formula>{{sortby}} === "name"</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="sortModel" client-side="true" model="pgs__pagedata" method="asc" field="Name"/>
							</iftrueactions>
						</action>
						<action type="sortModel" client-side="true" model="pgs__pagedata" method="desc" field="LastModifiedDate"/>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>sortby</field>
						<field>sortorder</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
			</actions>
		</model>
		<model id="pgs_Ui_Control" sobject="skuid__Page__c" query="true" limit="2" doclone="" datasource="salesforce">
			<fields>
				<field id="Id"/>
				<field id="Name"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions/>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="pgs__MasterPages" sobject="skuid__Page__c" query="true" limit="100" datasource="salesforce" async="true" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false">
			<fields>
				<field id="Id"/>
				<field id="skuid__API_Version__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="v1" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="v1" label="v1"/>
						<entry value="v2" label="v2"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="skuid__IsMaster__c"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="true" enclosevalueinquotes="false" field="skuid__IsMaster__c" clientorserver="server" operator="="/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="pgs__DataSources" limit="100" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" doclone="" sobject="skuid__Model_Service__c" orderby="Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true" async="false">
			<fields>
				<field id="skuid__Adapter_Name__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Active__c"/>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="skuid__URL__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__External_Id__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Authentication_URL__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Use_Apex_Proxy__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Access__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Access_Permission_Name__c"/>
				<field id="Id"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions/>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="pgs__NewPage_DuplicateCheck" limit="" query="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c" datasource="salesforce">
			<fields>
				<field id="Id"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Name" clientorserver="server" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="searchname" operator="="/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="pgs__PageGroupedByModule" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" sobject="skuid__Page__c" type="aggregate">
			<fields>
				<field id="Id" name="countId" function="COUNT"/>
				<field id="is_selected" uionly="true" displaytype="BOOLEAN" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="false"/>
			</fields>
			<actions/>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="blank" value="null" field="skuid__Module__c" operator="!=" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="Skuid" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Module__c" operator="!="/>
			</conditions>
			<groupby method="simple">
				<field id="skuid__Module__c" name="skuidModulec"/>
			</groupby>
		</model>
		<model id="pgs_Mobile_Pages_Check" sobject="skuid__Page__c" query="true" limit="1" doclone="" datasource="salesforce">
			<fields>
				<field id="Id"/>
				<field id="Name"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="Skuid" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Module__c" operator="!="/>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="Mobile" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Type__c"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="pgs__pagedata" sobject="skuid__Page__c" order="name" orderby="LastModifiedDate DESC, Id" query="true" limit="25" doclone="" datasource="salesforce">
			<fields>
				<field id="Id"/>
				<field id="skuid__API_Version__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="v1" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="v1" label="v1"/>
						<entry value="v2" label="v2"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedById"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedBy.Name"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedBy.SmallPhotoUrl"/>
				<field id="CreatedById"/>
				<field id="CreatedBy.Name"/>
				<field id="CreatedDate"/>
				<field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__IsMaster__c"/>
				<field displaytype="FORMULA" id="pretty_update_date" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT" uionly="true" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue">
					<formula>
						IF({{CreatedDate}}={{LastModifiedDate}},
						JOIN_TEXT( " ","Created", DATE_DIFF({{LastModifiedDate}}) ),
						JOIN_TEXT( " ","Updated", DATE_DIFF({{LastModifiedDate}}) )
						)</formula>
				</field>
			</fields>
			<conditions logic="">
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="Skuid" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="!=" field="skuid__Module__c" allowfiltering="true" name="PagesModuleSkuid" state="filterableon"/>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" field="skuid__Module__c" allowfiltering="true" inactive="true" name="PagesModule" state="filterableoff"/>
				<condition type="userinfo" value="userid" operator="=" field="LastModifiedById" allowfiltering="true" name="LastModByMe" inactive="true"/>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="false" operator="=" field="LastModifiedDate" allowfiltering="true" name="LastModDate" inactive="true"/>
				<condition type="userinfo" value="userid" operator="=" field="CreatedById" allowfiltering="true" inactive="true" name="CreatedByMe"/>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="false" operator="=" field="CreatedDate" allowfiltering="true" name="CreatedDate" inactive="true"/>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="true" enclosevalueinquotes="false" field="skuid__IsMaster__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="isMaster" clientorserver="server"/>
				<condition type="blank" value="null" field="skuid__Module__c" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="NoModule"/>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__API_Version__c" operator="=" inactive="true" enclosevalueinquotes="true" name="__autofilter__skuid__API_Version__c" state="filterableoff" value=""/>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Module__c" operator="=" inactive="true" enclosevalueinquotes="true" name="__autofilter__skuid__Module__c" state="filterableoff" value=""/>
			</conditions>
			<actions>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="requeryModels" behavior="standard">
							<models>
								<model>pgs_Ui_Control</model>
								<model>pgs__pagedata</model>
								<model>pgs__PageGroupedByModule</model>
							</models>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>models.saved</event>
					</events>
				</action>
			</actions>
		</model>
		<model id="pgs__PagesForPagePack" sobject="skuid__Page__c" orderby="LastModifiedDate DESC, Id" query="false" limit="100" doclone="" datasource="salesforce">
			<fields>
				<field id="Id"/>
				<field id="skuid__API_Version__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="v1" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="v1" label="v1"/>
						<entry value="v2" label="v2"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedById"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedBy.Name"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedBy.SmallPhotoUrl"/>
				<field id="CreatedById"/>
				<field id="CreatedBy.Name"/>
				<field id="CreatedDate"/>
				<field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__IsMaster__c"/>
				<field displaytype="FORMULA" id="pretty_update_date" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT" uionly="true" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue">
					<formula>
						IF({{CreatedDate}}={{LastModifiedDate}},
						JOIN_TEXT( " ","Created", DATE_DIFF({{LastModifiedDate}}) ),
						JOIN_TEXT( " ","Updated", DATE_DIFF({{LastModifiedDate}}) )
						)</formula>
				</field>
				<field id="is_selected" uionly="true" displaytype="BOOLEAN" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="false"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions logic="">
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="Skuid" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="!=" field="skuid__Module__c" allowfiltering="true" name="PagesModuleSkuid" state="filterableon"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions>
			</actions>
		</model>
		<model id="pgs__PagesInStaticResources" limit="100" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="StaticResource" doclone="" type="" orderby="LastModifiedDate DESC" datasourcetype="" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false">
				<fields>
					<field id="Name"/>
					<field id="BodyLength"/>
					<field id="Description"/>
					<field id="Id"/>
					<field id="LastModifiedById"/>
					<field id="LastModifiedBy.Name"/>
					<field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
					<field id="NamespacePrefix"/>
					<field id="Size_ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" length="255" label="Size" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
						<formula>ROUND({{BodyLength}}/1000,1) + " KB"</formula>
					</field>
					<field id="is_selected" uionly="true" displaytype="BOOLEAN" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="false"/>
				</fields>
				<conditions>
					<condition type="fieldvalue" value="application/json" field="ContentType" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
					<condition type="fieldvalue" value="skuid" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="NamespacePrefix" operator="!=" inactive="false"/>
				</conditions>
				<actions/>
			</model>
		<model id="pgs__StaticResourceInfoForPackaging" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="true" sobject="StaticResource" type="" datasourcetype="" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false">
				<fields>
					<field id="NamespacePrefix"/>
					<field id="Name"/>
					<field id="Description"/>
				</fields>
				<conditions/>
				<actions/>
			</model>
		<model id="pgs__StaticResourceInfoForPackaging_UI" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="Ui-Only">
			<fields>
				<field id="Name" displaytype="TEXT" length="255" label="Name"/>
				<field id="Description" displaytype="TEXT" length="255" label="Description"/>
			</fields>
			<actions>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__StaticResourceInfoForPackaging" affectedrows="context">
							<updates>
								<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Name" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{Name}}"/>
							</updates>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>Name</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__StaticResourceInfoForPackaging" affectedrows="context">
							<updates>
								<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Description" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{Description}}"/>
							</updates>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>Description</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
			</actions>
		<conditions/>
		</model>
		<model id="pgs__SelectedPage" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c" datasourcetype="" type="" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false">
				<fields>
					<field id="skuid__API_Version__c"/>
					<field id="skuid__Layout__c"/>
					<field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
					<field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
					<field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
					<field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
					<field id="Name"/>
					<field id="CreatedById"/>
					<field id="CreatedBy.Name"/>
					<field id="CreatedDate"/>
					<field id="LastModifiedById"/>
					<field id="LastModifiedBy.Name"/>
					<field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
				</fields>
				<conditions>
					<condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Id" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="Id"/>
				</conditions>
				<actions/>
			</model>
		<model id="pgs__SelectedPageVersions" limit="10" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page_Version__c" orderby="CreatedDate DESC" datasourcetype="" type="">
				<fields>
					<field id="skuid__API_Version__c"/>
					<field id="skuid__Description__c"/>

					<field id="CreatedDate"/>

					<field id="skuid__Initial_State__c" uionly="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" label="Starting point" defaultValue="none" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT">
						<picklistentries>
							<entry value="none" label="Start with a blank page"/>
							<entry value="masterpage" label="Use a Master Page"/>
							<entry value="from-xml" label="Paste XML from a prebuilt page"/>
							<entry value="from-xml-file" label="Upload XML file"/>
						</picklistentries>
					</field>
					<field id="skuid__Page_XML__c" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXTAREA" label="Page XML" length="163840"/>
					<field id="ui_controller_apply_master_page" displaytype="MULTIPICKLIST" uionly="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT">
						<picklistentries>
							<entry value="masterpage" label="Apply master page"/>
						</picklistentries>
					</field>
					<field displaytype="MULTIPICKLIST" id="ui_controller_xml_options" uionly="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT">
						<picklistentries>
							<entry value="show_xml_options" label="XML options"/>
						</picklistentries>
					</field>
					<field id="ui_controller_upload_xml" displaytype="PICKLIST" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT" uionly="true">
						<picklistentries>
							<entry value="import_xml" label="Import XML file"/>
						</picklistentries>
					</field>
					<field id="ui_controller_paste_xml" displaytype="PICKLIST" uionly="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT">
						<picklistentries>
							<entry value="paste_xml" label="Paste XML"/>
						</picklistentries>
					</field>
					<field id="duplicatePageName" displaytype="BOOLEAN" uionly="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="false"/>
				</fields>
				<conditions>
					<condition type="fieldvalue" value="<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" personalizationmode="server" showsidebar="true" useviewportmeta="true" showheader="true"><models/><components/><resources><labels/><javascript/><css/></resources></skuidpage>" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Layout__c"/>
				</conditions>
				<actions>
					<action>
						<actions>
							<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.newPage.writeXMLToPageRecord"/>
						</actions>
						<events>
							<event>row.updated</event>
						</events>
						<fields>
							<field>skuid__API_Version__c</field>
							<field>skuid__Initial_State__c</field>
							<field>skuid__MasterPage__c</field>
							<field>skuid__Page_XML__c</field>
						</fields>
					</action>
					<action>
						<actions>
							<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.newPage.reassignDataSources"/>	
							<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" label="if XML isn't blank" model="pgs__NewPage">
							<formula>!ISBLANK({{skuid__Page_XML__c}})</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" affectedrows="context">
									<updates>
										<update valuesource="formula" field="skuid__API_Version__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
											<formula>IF(STARTS_WITH({{skuid__Page_XML__c}},"<skuid__page"), "v2","v1")</formula>
										</update>
									</updates>
								</action>
							</iftrueactions>
							</action>
						</actions>
						<events>
							<event>row.updated</event>
						</events>
						<fields>
							<field>skuid__Page_XML__c</field>
						</fields>
					</action>
					<action>
						<actions>
							<action type="setCondition" model="pgs__NewPage_DuplicateCheck" condition="searchname" value="{{{Name}}}"/>
							<action type="requeryModel" model="pgs__NewPage_DuplicateCheck" behavior="standard"/>
						</actions>
						<events>
							<event>row.updated</event>
						</events>
						<fields>
							<field>Name</field>
						</fields>
					</action>
					<action>
						<actions>
							<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="pgs__NewPage">
								<formula>{{ui_controller_apply_master_page}} === "masterpage"</formula>
								<iftrueactions>
									<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" affectedrows="context">
										<updates>
											<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="masterpage"/>
										</updates>
									</action>
								</iftrueactions>
							</action>
							<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" affectedrows="context">
								<updates>
									<update valuesource="blank" field="skuid__MasterPage__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
								</updates>
							</action>
						</actions>
						<events>
							<event>row.updated</event>
						</events>
						<fields>
							<field>ui_controller_apply_master_page</field>
						</fields>
					</action>
					<action>
						<actions>
							<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="pgs__NewPage" label="if master page field isn't blank">
							<formula>!ISBLANK({{skuid__MasterPage__c}})</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" affectedrows="context">
									<updates>
										<update valuesource="formula" field="skuid__API_Version__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
											<formula>MODEL_LOOKUP("pgs__MasterPages","skuid__API_Version__c","Id",{{skuid__MasterPage__c}})</formula>
										</update>
									</updates>
								</action>
							</iftrueactions>
							</action>
						</actions>
						<events>
							<event>row.updated</event>
						</events>
						<fields>
							<field>skuid__MasterPage__c</field>
						</fields>
					</action>
					<action>
						<actions>
							<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="pgs__NewPage">
								<formula>{{ui_controller_paste_xml}} === "paste_xml"</formula>
								<iftrueactions>
									<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" affectedrows="context">
										<updates>
											<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="from-xml"/>
											<update valuesource="blank" field="ui_controller_upload_xml" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="import_xml"/>
										</updates>
									</action>
								</iftrueactions>
							</action>
						</actions>
						<events>
							<event>row.updated</event>
						</events>
						<fields>
							<field>ui_controller_paste_xml</field>
						</fields>
					</action>
					<action>
						<actions>
							<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="pgs__NewPage">
								<formula>{{ui_controller_upload_xml}} === "import_xml"</formula>
								<iftrueactions>
									<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" affectedrows="context">
										<updates>
											<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="from-xml-file"/>
											<update valuesource="blank" field="ui_controller_paste_xml" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="paste_xml"/>
										</updates>
									</action>
								</iftrueactions>
							</action>
						</actions>
						<events>
							<event>row.updated</event>
						</events>
						<fields>
							<field>ui_controller_upload_xml</field>
						</fields>
					</action>
					<action>
						<actions>
							<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="pgs__NewPage">
								<formula>{{ui_controller_xml_options}} === "show_xml_options"</formula>
								<iftrueactions>
									<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" affectedrows="context">
										<updates>
											<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="from-xml-file"/>
											<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="ui_controller_upload_xml" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="import_xml"/>
										</updates>
									</action>
								</iftrueactions>
							</action>
							<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" affectedrows="context">
								<updates>
									<update valuesource="blank" field="ui_controller_upload_xml" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="masterpage"/>
									<update valuesource="blank" field="ui_controller_paste_xml" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="import_xml"/>
									<update valuesource="blank" field="skuid__Page_XML__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
								</updates>
							</action>
						</actions>
						<events>
							<event>row.updated</event>
						</events>

						<fields>
							<field>skuid__API_Version__c</field>
							<field>skuid__Type__c</field>
						</fields>
					</action>
				</actions>
			</model>

														<components>
															<skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-3ipJ-18380" styleSettingsVariant="9b0bf5a8-a94c-42e0-8aed-c9aec4ebcc15">
																<components>
																	<skuid__grid uniqueid="sk-3iy3-13131" flexDirection="row" justifyContent="flex-start" alignItems="flex-start" columnGutter="2">
																		<divisions>

																										<renderConditions logictype="and"/>

																								<components>
																									<skuid__text contents="<div style="text-align: right;">{{Size_ui}}</div>
" uniqueid="sk-3iqH-20374" model="pgs__PagesInStaticResources" styleSettingsVariant="4e169d0d-def8-4adb-9bb5-baca37505057">
																									<styles>
																										<spacing/>
																									</styles>
																									</skuid__text>
																								</components>
																							</division>

																					<styles>
																						<spacing right="2"/>
																					</styles>
																					</skuid__grid>
																					<skuid__text contents="{{Description}}" uniqueid="sk-3iqY-21561" model="pgs__PagesInStaticResources" styleSettingsVariant="7c7f8594-184f-4d52-b33c-1f4dc6fb806a">
																						<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
																						<styleVariantConditions/>
																						<styles>
																							<spacing top="0.5" bottom="0.5"/>
																						</styles>
																					</skuid__text>
																					<skuid__text contents="Last modified on {{LastModifiedDate}}&nbsp;by {{{LastModifiedBy.Name}}}" uniqueid="sk-3iqU-21181" model="pgs__PagesInStaticResources" styleSettingsVariant="7c7f8594-184f-4d52-b33c-1f4dc6fb806a">
																						<conditions/>
																					</skuid__text>
																				</components>

																		</divisions>
																	</skuid__grid>

																	<rule logictype="and" styleSettingsVariantOverride="0288cf5a-1429-4c11-9c4f-012bc1c90460">
																		<condition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="pgs__PagesInStaticResources" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="is_selected" fieldtargetobjects="StaticResource" value="true"/>
																	</rule>
																</styleVariantConditions>

																</styles>

														</components>

															<interaction type="tap">
																<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__StaticResourceInfoForPackaging" affectedrows="context">
																	<updates>
																		<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Name" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{Name}}"/>
																		<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Description" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{Description}}"/>
																	</updates>
																</action>
																<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__PagesInStaticResources" affectedrows="all">
																	<updates>
																		<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="is_selected" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="false"/>
																	</updates>
																</action>
																<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__PagesInStaticResources" affectedrows="context">
																	<updates>
																		<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="is_selected" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="true"/>
																	</updates>
																</action>
															</interaction>
														</interactions>
														<styles>
															<spacing bottom="2"/>
														</styles>
													</skuid__deck>
												</components>
											</skuid__wrapper>
										</components>
									</step>
								</steps>
								<styles>
									<spacing bottom="2" styleSettingsVariant="51ff01da-c8a8-430a-923a-d68a5cba725a"/>
								</styles>
							</skuid__wizard>
						</components>
						<buttons>
							<skuid__button label="Cancel" uniqueId="sk-3jVj-20472">
								<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
								<enableConditions/>
								<styleVariantConditions/>
								<actions>
									<action type="closeAllPopups"/>
								</actions>
							</skuid__button>
							<skuid__button label="Back" uniqueId="sk-3jV4-13549">
								<renderConditions logictype="and">
									<renderCondition type="multiple" operator="in" fieldmodel="ui_control" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="page_pack_current_step" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="false">
										<values>
											<value>2</value>
											<value>3</value>
											<value>1</value>
										</values>
									</renderCondition>
								</renderConditions>
								<enableConditions/>
								<styleVariantConditions/>
								<actions>
									<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="ui_control" label="if on step 1, go to step 0">
										<formula>{{page_pack_current_step}} === 1</formula>
										<iftrueactions>
											<action type="runComponentAction" componentid="wizard-page-pack" action="navigateToStep" stepId="step0" scrollStepLabelIntoView="true"/>
											<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="ui_control" affectedrows="context">
												<updates>
													<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="page_pack_current_step" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="0"/>
												</updates>
											</action>
										</iftrueactions>
									</action>
									<action type="runComponentAction" componentid="wizard-page-pack" action="navigateToStep" stepId="step1" scrollStepLabelIntoView="true"/>
									<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="ui_control" affectedrows="context">
										<updates>
											<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="page_pack_current_step" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="1"/>
										</updates>
									</action>
								</actions>
							</skuid__button>
							<skuid__button label="Next" uniqueId="sk-3jXt-19158" styleSettingsVariant="primary">
								<renderConditions logictype="and">
									<renderCondition type="multiple" operator="in" fieldmodel="ui_control" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="page_pack_current_step" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="false">
										<values>
											<value>0</value>
											<value>1</value>
										</values>
									</renderCondition>
								</renderConditions>
								<enableConditions logictype="and"/>
								<styleVariantConditions/>
								<actions>
									<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="ui_control" label="if on step 0, go to step 1">
										<formula>{{page_pack_current_step}} === 0</formula>
										<iftrueactions>
											<action type="runComponentAction" componentid="wizard-page-pack" action="navigateToStep" stepId="step1"/>
											<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="ui_control" affectedrows="context">
												<updates>
													<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="page_pack_current_step" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="1"/>
												</updates>
											</action>
										</iftrueactions>
									</action>
									<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="ui_control" label="check if creating or updating pack">
										<formula>{{page_pack_current_step}} === 1</formula>
										<iftrueactions>
											<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="ui_control" label="if creating new pack, go to step 2">
												<formula>{{page_pack_options}} === "create_new"</formula>
												<iftrueactions>
													<action type="emptyModelData">
														<models>
															<model>pgs__StaticResourceInfoForPackaging_UI</model>
														</models>
													</action>
													<action type="createRow" model="pgs__StaticResourceInfoForPackaging_UI" appendorprepend="prepend" defaultmodefornewitems="edit" affectedrows="context"/>
													<action type="runComponentAction" componentid="wizard-page-pack" action="navigateToStep" stepId="step2"/>
													<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="ui_control" affectedrows="context">
														<updates>
															<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="page_pack_current_step" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="2"/>
														</updates>
													</action>
												</iftrueactions>
											</action>
											<action type="runComponentAction" componentid="wizard-page-pack" action="navigateToStep" stepId="step3"/>
											<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="ui_control" affectedrows="context">
												<updates>
													<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="page_pack_current_step" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="3"/>
												</updates>
											</action>
										</iftrueactions>
									</action>
								</actions>
							</skuid__button>
							<skuid__button label="Build Pack" uniqueid="button-build-pack-from-header" styleSettingsVariant="primary">
								<actions>
									<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.pageList.packagePages"/>
								</actions>
								<renderConditions logictype="and">
									<renderCondition type="multiple" operator="in" fieldmodel="ui_control" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="page_pack_current_step" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="false">
										<values>
											<value>2</value>
											<value>3</value>
										</values>
									</renderCondition>
								</renderConditions>
								<enableConditions logictype="and">
									<condition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="pgs__StaticResourceInfoForPackaging" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="Name" fieldtargetobjects="StaticResource" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
								</enableConditions>
								<styleVariantConditions/>
							</skuid__button>
						</buttons>
						<afterCloseActions>
							<action type="requeryModels" behavior="standard">
								<models>
									<model>pgs__PagesInStaticResources</model>
								</models>
							</action>
							<action type="cancel">
								<models>
									<model>pgs__PagesForPagePack</model>
									<model>pgs__StaticResourceInfoForPackaging</model>
									<model>pgs__StaticResourceInfoForPackaging_UI</model>
								</models>
							</action>
						</afterCloseActions>
					</skuid__modal>
				</action>
				<action type="unblockUI"/>
			</actions>
		</actionsequence>
		<actionsequence id="493e03ba-3fbf-4dcf-bee7-f7924a754a99" label="SelectedNav" type="event-triggered" event-scope="component" event-name="page.rendered">
			<description/>
			<actions>
				<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="uiControl" affectedrows="context">
					<updates>
						<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Selected_Global_Nav" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="PAGES"/>
					</updates>
				</action>
			</actions>
		</actionsequence>
	</actionsequences>
</resources>
</skuid__page>

name: PageQueue
content:
<skuidpage showsidebar="false" showheader="true" tabtooverride="skuid__Page__c" globalfeedbackenabled="false">
  <models>
    <model id="__SkuidPagesForQueue__" limit="50" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c" orderby="Name">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Type__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="__SkuidPageForQueuePageType__c"/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Module__c" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="__SkuidPageForQueuePageModule__c"/>
      </conditions>
    </model>
  </models>
  <components>
    <panelset type="standard" scroll="variable" offset="220">
      <panels>
        <panel type="left" width="225">
          <components>
            <queue tagrendertype="template" querystring="id={{Id}}" defaultitemparameter="skuidpageid" clickactiontype="updatepanel" searchbox="true" model="__SkuidPagesForQueue__" title="Skuid Pages" pagename="PageBuilder" actionpanel="__SkuidPageQueueIncludePanel__" module="Skuid">
              <rendertemplate>{{{Name}}}</rendertemplate>
              <filters>
                <filter type="select" filteroffoptionlabel="Any Page Type" createfilteroffoption="true" affectcookies="true" condition="__SkuidPageForQueuePageType__c">
                  <sources>
                    <source type="metadata" effectsbehavior="justdefault" prefix="Page Type: " model="__SkuidPagesForQueue__"/>
                  </sources>
                </filter>
                <filter type="select" filteroffoptionlabel="Any Module" createfilteroffoption="true" affectcookies="true" condition="__SkuidPageForQueuePageModule__c">
                  <sources>
                    <source type="metadata" effectsbehavior="justdefault" model="__SkuidPagesForQueue__" prefix="Module: "/>
                  </sources>
                </filter>
              </filters>
            </queue>
          </components>
        </panel>
        <panel>
          <components>
            <includepanel type="skuid" lazyload="true" pagename="PageBuilder" uniqueid="__SkuidPageQueueIncludePanel__" querystring="id={{Id}}" module="Skuid"/>
          </components>
        </panel>
      </panels>
    </panelset>
  </components>
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <javascript/>
    <css/>
  </resources>
</skuidpage>

name: PageXMLEdit
content:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" globalfeedbackenabled="false">
  <models>
    <model id="page" limit="100" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" value="id" field="Id"/>
      </conditions>
      <triggers/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <pageregioncontents>
    <pageregioncontent regionid="sk-1uFo3V-67" uniqueid="sk-2nP3cm-32">
      <components>
        <pagetitle model="page" uniqueid="sk-2rE7LK-86">
          <maintitle>Edit Page XML - {{Name}}</maintitle>
          <subtitle>{{#skuid__Module__c}}Module: {{skuid__Module__c}}{{/skuid__Module__c}}{{^skuid__Module__c}}No Module{{/skuid__Module__c}}</subtitle>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" label="Save & Preview" window="self" icon="sk-icon-preview" snippet="saveAndPreview" uniqueid="SaveAndPreviewBtn">
              <hotkeys>
                <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="p"/>
                <hotkey modifiers="meta" key="p"/>
              </hotkeys>
            </action>
            <action type="redirect" label="Edit in Page Builder" url="/apex/skuid__PageBuilder?id={{Id}}" icon="sk-icon-page-edit" window="self" uniqueid="sk-32cReC-100">
              <hotkeys/>
            </action>
            <action type="delete" window="self" label="Delete Page" uniqueid="sk-32cReE-102"/>
            <action type="savecancel" label="New Action" uniqueid="sk-32cReG-104">
              <savehotkeys>
                <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="s"/>
                <hotkey modifiers="meta" key="s"/>
              </savehotkeys>
            </action>
          </actions>
        </pagetitle>
        <custom name="pageXMLEditor" uniqueid="sk-2rE7LK-87">
          <renderconditions/>
        </custom>
      </components>
    </pageregioncontent>
  </pageregioncontents>
  <components/>
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="AceEditor" cachelocation="false" namespace="skuid" filepath="ace.js"/>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="v1" filepath="js/skuidPages/skuidPageXMLEdit.js" cachelocation="false" namespace="skuid"/>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="saveAndPreview" cachelocation="false" url="">
var params = arguments[0],
    pageModel = params.model,
    editor = params.component.editor,
    pagePreview = skuid.snippet.getSnippet('skuid.builder.page.preview');

pagePreview && pagePreview({
    editor: editor,
    model: pageModel,
    saveFirst: true
});


</jsitem>
    </javascript>
    <css>
      <cssitem location="inline" name="AceCSS" cachelocation="false">
			.nx-pagetitle {
            margin: 12px 8px 0 8px;
          }
          .nx-page-content {
            padding-left: 0 !important;
            padding-right: 0 !important;
          }
          .nx-page-region {
            margin: 0 !important;
          }
					.nx-pagebuilder-viewxmllink {
						float: right;
    				margin: 3px;
					}
			.nx-code-editor {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  border: 1px solid #299fc5;
}</cssitem>
    </css>
    <actionsequences/>
  </resources>
</skuidpage>

name: Settings_AboutSkuid
content:
<skuid__page globalfeedbackenabled="false" theme="Skuid App" personalizationmode="server">
	<models>
		<model id="about_uiControl" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="Ui-Only">
			<fields>
				<field id="currentSkuidVersionName" displaytype="TEXT" length="255"/>
				<field id="currentSkuidVersionNumber" displaytype="TEXT" length="255"/>
				<field id="pageAPI" displaytype="TEXT" length="255"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions/>
			<actions/>
		</model>
	</models>
	<components>
		<skuid__grid uniqueid="grid-componentpacks-header" flexDirection="row" justifyContent="flex-start" alignItems="flex-start" columnGutter="0" rowGutter="0">
			<divisions>
				<division minWidth="100px" ratio="1" alignSelf="auto">
					<components>
						<skuid__header title="About Skuid" uniqueid="sk-3qd8-653" model="" styleSettingsVariant="70409424-111e-4b10-8161-83f94804d8c6">
							<styles>
								<spacing/>
							</styles>
						</skuid__header>
					</components>
				</division>
			</divisions>
			<styles>
				<spacing bottom="4"/>
			</styles>
		</skuid__grid>
		<skuid__grid uniqueid="sk-1vjW-10297" flexDirection="row" justifyContent="flex-start" alignItems="flex-start">
			<divisions>
				<division minWidth="100px" ratio="1" alignSelf="auto" maxWidth="600px">
					<components>
						<skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-3su2-1528" styleSettingsVariant="7d5572d7-ec59-43f0-9d03-5259d1980637">
							<components>
								<skuid__text contents="<div>Current Skuid Version</div>
" uniqueid="sk-10eK-24734">
									<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
									<styleVariantConditions/>
								</skuid__text>
								<skuid__text contents="<div>{{currentSkuidVersionName}}</div>
" uniqueid="sk-3GQR-12794" styleSettingsVariant="medium" model="about_uiControl">
									<styles>
										<spacing bottom="2" styleSettingsVariant="medium" top="2"/>
									</styles>
									<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
									<styleVariantConditions/>
								</skuid__text>
								<skuid__buttonSet model="about_uiControl" uniqueid="sk-10fC-32735" position="left">
									<groups>
										<skuid__buttonGroup>
											<buttons>
												<skuid__button label="View Release Notes" uniqueId="button-go-to-release-notes" styleSettingsVariant="ca917c93-4d9c-46c4-81ef-b5400b866203">
													<actions>
														<action type="redirect" window="blank" url="https://docs.skuid.com/v{{{currentSkuidVersionNumber}}}/{{pageAPI}}/en/release-notes.html"/>
													</actions>
													<tooltip position="top"/>
												</skuid__button>
											</buttons>
										</skuid__buttonGroup>
									</groups>
									<styles>
										<spacing/>
									</styles>
								</skuid__buttonSet>
							</components>
							<background/>
							<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
							<styleVariantConditions/>
							<styles>
								<spacing/>
							</styles>
						</skuid__wrapper>
					</components>
				</division>
			</divisions>
		</skuid__grid>
	</components>
	<resources>
		<labels/>
		<javascript>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="getCurrentSkuidVersion" cachelocation="false" url="">
				const model = skuid.$M('about_uiControl'),
					{ id, name, major, minor, patch } = skuid.version,
					releaseNoteVersionNumber = `${major}.${minor}${patch ? "." + patch : ""}`;
				model.updateRow(model.getFirstRow(), {
					'currentSkuidVersionName': name,
					'currentSkuidVersionNumber': releaseNoteVersionNumber,
					'pageAPI': id,
				});
			</jsitem>
		</javascript>
		<actionsequences>
			<actionsequence id="37c6d9e8-a1a0-42ba-a664-03a9d4e31968" label="Get current Skuid version" type="event-triggered" event-scope="component" event-name="page.rendered">
				<description/>
				<actions>
					<action type="custom" snippet="getCurrentSkuidVersion"/>
				</actions>
			</actionsequence>
		</actionsequences>
	</resources>
</skuid__page>

name: Settings_AuthProviderDetail
content:
<skuid__page globalfeedbackenabled="false" theme="Skuid App" title="{{#$Model.stng__AuthProvider.data.0.Name}}Auth Provider - {{{$Model.stng__AuthProvider.data.0.Name}}}{{/$Model.stng__AuthProvider.data.0.Name}}{{^$Model.stng__AuthProvider.data.0.Name}}New Auth Provider{{/$Model.stng__AuthProvider.data.0.Name}}">
	<models>
		<model id="stng__AuthProvider" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" sobject="skuid__Auth_Provider__c" doclone="" orderby="Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
			<fields>
				<field id="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_URL__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Client_Id__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Custom_Callback_URL__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Client_Secret__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Default_Scopes__c"/>
				<field id="Name" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" label="Name" helptext="Must only contain alpha-numeric characters and underscores" required="true"/>
				<field id="SetupOwnerId"/>
				<field id="SetupOwner.Name"/>
				<field id="skuid__Type__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" picklistsource="snippet" snippet="AuthProviderTypesPicklist"/>
				<field id="skuid__Token_Endpoint_URL__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__User_Info_Endpoint_URL__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Request_Headers__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
				<field id="skuid__OAuth_Grant_Type__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="explicit" picklistsource="manual" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry label="Authorization Code" value="explicit"/>
						<entry label="Client Credentials" value="client_credentials"/>
						<entry label="Implicit" value="implicit"/>
						<entry label="Resource Owner Password Credentials" value="password"/>
						<entry label="SAML 2.0 Bearer Assertion" value="saml2-bearer"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="skuid__Apex_Class_Name__c" overridemetadata="false" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT"/>
				<field id="skuid__Auth_Method__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="oauth2">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="apex" label="Custom Apex Authentication"/>
						<entry value="oauth2" label="OAuth 2.0 / OpenID"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="SP_CompanyName" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXT" label="Company Name"/>
				<field id="SP_SiteCollection" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXT" label="Site Collection Path"/>
				<field id="SP_AuthUrlFormula" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Sharepoint Auth URL Formula" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
					<formula>"https://"+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+".sharepoint.com"+{{{SP_SiteCollection}}}+"/_layouts/15/OauthAuthorize.aspx"</formula>
				</field>
				<field id="SP_TokenUrlFormula" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Sharepoint Token URL Formula" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
					<formula>"https://accounts.accesscontrol.windows.net/"+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+".onmicrosoft.com/tokens/OAuth/2"</formula>
				</field>
				<field id="skuid__Client_Certificate__c"/>
				<field id="AuthMethodType__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Auth Method Type" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
					<formula>IF({{skuid__Auth_Method__c}}==="apex","apex",
            IF({{skuid__Auth_Method__c}}==="oauth1" || {{skuid__Auth_Method__c}}==="oauth2","oauth","other"))</formula>
				</field>
				<field id="skuid__Token_Request_Body_Parameters__c" overridemetadata="true" displaytype="OBJECT"/>
				<field id="SP_TokenReqBodyParamsFormula" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Token Req Body Params" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
					<formula>IF({{skuid__Type__c}}==='sharepointonline','{"resource":"00000003-0000-0ff1-ce00-000000000000/'+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+'.sharepoint.com@'+{{{SP_CompanyName}}}+'.onmicrosoft.com"}','')</formula>
				</field>
				<field id="OAuthDefaultScopesFormula__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Default Scopes Formula" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
					<formula>IF(
            (CONTAINS({{skuid__Auth_Method__c}},'oauth')&&({{skuid__Type__c}}=='salesforce')),
               IF({{skuid__OAuth_Grant_Type__c}}=='explicit',
                  'full,refresh_token','api'
               ),
               ''
            )
          </formula>
				</field>
				<field id="skuid__Assertion_Signing_Certificate__c"/>
				<field id="IsValid__ui" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN" label="Is Valid">
					<formula>
						NOT(ISBLANK({{Name}})) &&
						NOT(ISBLANK({{skuid__Auth_Method__c}}))
          </formula>
				</field>
				<field id="CreatedDate"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedById"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedBy.Name"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedBy.SmallPhotoUrl"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
				<field id="name_valid" displaytype="BOOLEAN" uionly="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="true"/>
				<field id="pretty_update_date" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
					<formula>IF({{CreatedDate}}={{LastModifiedDate}},
					JOIN_TEXT( " ","Created", DATE_DIFF({{LastModifiedDate}}) ),
					JOIN_TEXT( " ","Updated", DATE_DIFF({{LastModifiedDate}}) )
					)</formula>
				</field>
				<field id="CreatedById"/>
				<field id="CreatedBy.Name"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="param" value="id" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Id" sourcetype="param" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProvider" field="skuid__Request_Headers__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{}"/>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProvider" field="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProvider" field="skuid__Token_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProvider" field="skuid__Apex_Class_Name__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProvider" field="skuid__Type__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProvider" field="skuid__Client_Id__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProvider" field="skuid__Custom_Callback_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProvider" field="skuid__Client_Secret__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>skuid__Auth_Method__c</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProvider" field="skuid__Authorize_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SP_AuthUrlFormula}}}"/>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>SP_AuthUrlFormula</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProvider" field="skuid__Token_Endpoint_URL__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SP_TokenUrlFormula}}}"/>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>SP_TokenUrlFormula</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProvider" field="skuid__Token_Request_Body_Parameters__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{SP_TokenReqBodyParamsFormula}}}"/>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>SP_TokenReqBodyParamsFormula</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProvider" field="skuid__Default_Scopes__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{{OAuthDefaultScopesFormula__ui}}}"/>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>OAuthDefaultScopesFormula__ui</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.settings.onAuthProviderTypeChange"/>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>skuid__Type__c</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.settings.AuthProviderNameRegExTest">
							<onerroractions>
								<action type="updateRow" message="There was an error" timeout="3000" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProvider" affectedrows="context">
									<updates>
										<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="name_valid" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="false"/>
									</updates>
								</action>
							</onerroractions>
						</action>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProvider" affectedrows="context">
							<updates>
								<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="name_valid" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="true"/>
							</updates>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>Name</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
			</actions>
		</model>
		<model id="stng__DataSources_ReferenceCheck" limit="100" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" doclone="" type="" sobject="skuid__Model_Service__c" orderby="LastModifiedDate DESC,skuid__Adapter_Name__c, Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
			<fields>
				<field id="skuid__Adapter_Name__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Active__c"/>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="Id"/>
				<field id="skuid__Auth_Provider__c"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="modelmerge" value="" field="skuid__Auth_Provider__c" operator="=" model="stng__AuthProvider" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="Name" novaluebehavior="deactivate" clientorserver="server"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="stng__EncryptionSettings" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Encryption_Settings__c" datasource="salesforce">
			<fields>
				<field id="skuid__Key__c"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedById"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedBy.Name"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
				<field id="skuid__JobId__c"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="userinfo" value="" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" userinfotype="organizationid" field="SetupOwnerId"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
	</models>
	<pageregioncontents>
		<pageregioncontent regionid="sk-1uFo3V-67" uniqueid="sk-1uLo4g-22" defaultcontent="true">
			<components>
				<skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-3jR0-1768" styleSettingsVariant="2fa461f9-7738-4ec1-a7e8-c2788439166d">
					<components>
						<skuid__grid uniqueid="sk--nF-13009">
							<divisions>
								<division minWidth="0px" ratio="1">
									<components/>
								</division>
								<division alignSelf="auto" minWidth="100%" ratio="1" maxWidth="1440px">
									<components>
										<skuid__grid uniqueid="sk-2DiY-71335" flexDirection="row" justifyContent="flex-start" alignItems="center" columnGutter="4" rowGutter="0">
											<divisions>
												<division minWidth="100px" ratio="1">
													<components>
														<skuid__header uniqueid="sk-2mZA29-3083" title="New Authentication Provider" subtitle="">
															<skuid__buttonSet>
																<groups/>
															</skuid__buttonSet>
															<renderConditions logictype="and">
																<renderCondition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProvider" sourcetype="rowproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="isNew"/>
															</renderConditions>
															<styles>
																<spacing/>
															</styles>
														</skuid__header>
														<skuid__header uniqueid="sk-nJ0I2-509" title="{{Name}}" subtitle="Authentication Provider" model="stng__AuthProvider">
															<skuid__buttonSet>
																<groups/>
															</skuid__buttonSet>
															<renderConditions logictype="and">
																<renderCondition fieldmodel="stng__AuthProvider" sourcetype="rowproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="skipandnorender" sourceproperty="isSaved" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
															</renderConditions>
														</skuid__header>
													</components>
												</division>
												<division alignSelf="auto" ratio="0">
													<components>
														<skuid__buttonSet uniqueid="sk-2Dif-73435" model="stng__AuthProvider">
															<groups>
																<skuid__buttonGroup>
																	<buttons>
																		<skuid__button label="{{$Label.Save}}" uniqueid="button-header-save" styleSettingsVariant="primary">
																			<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
																			<enableConditions logictype="and" message="Make sure all required fields are correctly entered.">
																				<condition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProvider" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasChanged" value="true" operator="="/>
																				<condition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProvider" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="IsValid__ui" fieldtargetobjects="salesforce" value="true" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
																			</enableConditions>
																			<actions>
																				<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" label="If New, save changes and go to Auth Provider detail view" model="stng__AuthProvider">
																					<formula>{{Record.isNew}}</formula>
																					<iftrueactions>
																						<action type="blockUI" message="Saving new Authentication Provider..." showPlaceholder="true" styleSettingsVariant="dark"/>
																						<action type="save">
																							<models>
																								<model>stng__AuthProvider</model>
																							</models>
																							<onerroractions>
																								<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000" styleSettingsVariant="dark"/>
																							</onerroractions>
																						</action>
																						<action type="branch" whenfinished="continue" model="stng__AuthProvider" label="Check for Remote Sites if Auth Method is OAuth 1 or OAuth 2">
																							<iftrueactions>
																								<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.settings.newAuthProvider.checkForRemoteSites">
																									<onerroractions>
																										<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000" showPlaceholder="false" styleSettingsVariant="dark"/>
																									</onerroractions>
																								</action>
																							</iftrueactions>
																							<formula>{{skuid__Auth_Method__c}} == "oauth1" || {{skuid__Auth_Method__c}} == "oauth2"</formula>
																						</action>
																						<action type="redirect" window="self" url="/apex/skuid__AuthProviderDetail?id={{Id}}"/>
																						<action type="unblockUI"/>
																					</iftrueactions>
																				</action>
																				<action type="save">
																					<models>
																						<model>stng__AuthProvider</model>
																					</models>
																					<onerroractions>
																						<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000"/>
																					</onerroractions>
																				</action>
																				<action type="showToast" duration="4" message="Changes saved"/>
																			</actions>
																			<styleVariantConditions/>
																		</skuid__button>
																		<skuid__button label="{{$Label.Cancel}}" uniqueid="button-header-cancel">
																			<actions>
																				<action type="cancel">
																					<models>
																						<model>stng__AuthProvider</model>
																					</models>
																				</action>
																				<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" label="if record is new, go back when canceled">
																					<formula>{{$Model.stng__AuthProvider.data.length}}==0</formula>
																					<iftrueactions>
																						<action type="redirect" window="self" url="/apex/skuid__DataSources"/>
																					</iftrueactions>
																				</action>
																			</actions>
																			<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
																			<enableConditions logictype="and">
																				<condition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="stng__AuthProvider" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasChanged" value="true" operator="="/>
																			</enableConditions>
																		</skuid__button>
																	</buttons>
																	<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
																</skuid__buttonGroup>
																<skuid__buttonGroup>
																	<buttons>
																		<skuid__button label="Delete" uniqueid="button-delete-auth-provider">
																			<actions>
																				<action type="markRowsForDeletion" model="stng__AuthProvider" affectedrows="context"/>
																				<action type="requeryModel" model="stng__DataSources_ReferenceCheck" behavior="standard"/>
																				<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" label="if AP is being used in Data Sources, do not let users delete it">
																					<formula>{{$Model.stng__DataSources_ReferenceCheck.data.length}} > 0</formula>
																					<iftrueactions>
																						<action type="cancel">
																							<models>
																								<model>stng__AuthProvider</model>
																							</models>
																						</action>
																						<action type="showModal">
																							<skuid__modal title="Authentication Provider in use" width="640px">
																								<components>
																									<skuid__text contents="This authentication provider is being used in one or more data sources. You must remove it from the data sources before continuing to deletion&nbsp;" uniqueid="sk-2RVM-111192"/>
																									<skuid__text contents="Data source(s) using this authentication provider:" uniqueid="sk-2qPN-20055">
																										<styles>
																											<spacing top="3"/>
																										</styles>
																									</skuid__text>
																									<skuid__deck model="stng__DataSources_ReferenceCheck" showSaveCancel="false" verticalAlign="top" minWidth="100%" uniqueid="sk-2qMn-24498" pageSize="Infinity" showPageSizeSelect="false" resetPaginationOnQuery="false" showLoadMore="false" showListHeader="false" showListFooter="false" setMaxWidth="auto" styleSettingsVariant="4b2278fd-5ea7-4353-9f43-6334d402167e">
																										<components>
																											<skuid__text contents="&bull;&nbsp; &nbsp;Data Source: <a href="/apex/skuid__DataSourceDetail{{#skuid__External_Id__c}}V2{{/skuid__External_Id__c}}?id={{{Id}}}" target="_blank"><strong>{{{Name}}}</strong></a>" uniqueid="sk-2qMn-24499">
																												<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
																												<styleVariantConditions/>
																												<styles>
																													<spacing bottom="1.5" left="1"/>
																												</styles>
																											</skuid__text>
																										</components>
																										<filtering enableSearch="false" instantSearch="false"/>
																										<renderConditions logictype="and">
																											<renderCondition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="stng__DataSources_ReferenceCheck" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasRows"/>
																										</renderConditions>
																										<styleVariantConditions/>
																										<styles>
																											<spacing top="1.5" bottom="0"/>
																										</styles>
																									</skuid__deck>
																								</components>
																								<buttons>
																									<skuid__button uniqueid="button-close-modal" label="Okay" styleSettingsVariant="primary">
																										<actions>
																											<action type="closeAllPopups"/>
																										</actions>
																									</skuid__button>
																								</buttons>
																							</skuid__modal>
																						</action>
																					</iftrueactions>
																				</action>
																				<action type="showModal">
																					<skuid__modal title="Delete Authentication Provider" width="640px">
																						<components>
																							<skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-1mud-36047" styleSettingsVariant="cfa0c754-42be-41a9-9c55-4ac58e443fcc">
																								<components>
																									<skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-1mvC-41739">
																										<components>

			<jsitem location="staticresource" name="next" filepath="js/skuidPages/skuidSettings.js" cachelocation="false" namespace="skuid"/>
			<jsitem location="staticresource" name="next" filepath="js/lib/jsonEditor/jsoneditor.min.js" cachelocation="false" namespace="skuid"/>
			<jsitem location="displaymethod" name="jsonEditor" cachelocation="false" url="">var utils = skuid.utils,
	DisplayMethod = skuid.component.DisplayMethod,
	h = skuid.virtualDom.hyperScript,
	fields = {};

return new DisplayMethod({
	editModeStrategy: "element",
	edit: function (fieldComponent, starterDefinition) {
		// contains model, row, value, element, and field
		var context = fieldComponent.getCPI().getContext(),
			element = context.element,
			field = context.field,
			model = context.model,
			row = context.row,
			value = context.value || "{}",
			editor = fields[field.id];

	    if (!editor || element.id !== "field-cdm-" + field.id) {
	        fields[field.id] = new JSONEditor(
    	        element,
    	        {
					// If there's been a change made in the JSON editor, then we update the model's row here.
        	        onChange: function() {
        				model.updateRow(row, field.id, fields[field.id].getText());
    			    }
    	        },
    			utils.parseAsJSONIfString(value)
    	    );
    	    element.id = "field-cdm-" + field.id;

		// If we have an editor and there's been a change on the model's field outside of the
		// JSON editor, then we need to update the value in the editor.
	    } else if (editor && editor.getText() !== value) {
			editor.set(utils.parseAsJSONIfString(value));
		}
		// Make JSON editors a bit taller so they're easier to edit.
		var jsoneditorTrees = document.getElementsByClassName("jsoneditor-outer");
		for (var i = 0; i < jsoneditorTrees.length; i++ ) {
				jsoneditorTrees[i].style.height = "300px";
		}
	},
});</jsitem>
  </javascript>
  <css>
    <cssitem location="staticresource" name="next" filepath="js/lib/jsonEditor/jsoneditor.min.css" cachelocation="false" namespace="skuid"/>
  </css>
  <actionsequences>

	</actionsequence>

name: Settings_ComponentPacks
content:
<skuid__page globalfeedbackenabled="false" theme="Skuid App" personalizationmode="server">
	<models>
		<model id="page_ui_control" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="Ui-Only">
			<fields>
				<field id="sortby" displaytype="PICKLIST" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="-updated_at">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="-updated_at" label="Last Updated"/>
						<entry value="name" label="Name A-Z"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
			</fields>
			<conditions/>
			<actions>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="page_ui_control">
							<formula>{{sortby}} === "name"</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="sortModel" client-side="true" model="stng__ComponentPacks" method="toggle" field="Name"/>
							</iftrueactions>
						</action>
						<action type="sortModel" client-side="true" model="stng__ComponentPacks" method="toggle" field="LastModifiedDate"/>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>sortby</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
			</actions>
		</model>
		<model id="stng__ComponentPacks_ui_control" limit="2" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Component_Pack__c" orderby="skuid__Load_Order__c, skuid__Type__c" doclone="" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true" async="false" label="Component Pack" labelplural="Component Packs">
			<fields>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="Id"/>
				<field id="skuid__Resource_Name__c"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="multiple" value="" field="Name" operator="not in" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
					<values>
						<value>skuid</value>
						<value>skuidcore</value>
						<value>skuidmobilecore</value>
						<value>skuidbuilder</value>
						<value>skuidvis</value>
					</values>
				</condition>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="stng__ComponentPacks" limit="100" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Component_Pack__c" orderby="skuid__Load_Order__c, skuid__Type__c" doclone="" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true" async="true" label="Component Pack" labelplural="Component Packs">
			<fields>
				<field id="Name" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" label="Pack Id (lower-case alpha characters only)" helptext="Choose a unique Prefix for Components in your Pack, e.g. "acmevisualizations""/>
				<field id="skuid__Active__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__API_Version__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="v1" label="API Version" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT" helptext="Which Skuid API Version should this Component Pack be available for?" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="v1" label="v1"/>
						<entry value="v2" label="v2"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="skuid__Resource_Name__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" label="Pack Label" helptext="Choose a friendly label for your Component Pack, e.g. "Acme Visualizations""/>
				<field id="skuid__Resource_Namespace__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" label="Org Namespace" helptext="(Required ONLY if you are working in a Managed Package development org)"/>
				<field id="skuid__Load_Order__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Type__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultValue="Desktop" label="Pages available in" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT" helptext="Which type of Skuid Page should this Component Pack be available in?" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="Any" label="Any"/>
						<entry value="Desktop" label="Desktop Only"/>
						<entry value="Mobile" label="Mobile Only"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="skuid__Runtime_Definition_File__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Builder_Definition_File__c"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedById"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedBy.Name"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedBy.SmallPhotoUrl"/>
				<field id="CreatedById"/>
				<field id="CreatedBy.Name"/>
				<field id="CreatedDate"/>
				<field displaytype="FORMULA" id="pretty_update_date" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT" uionly="true" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue">
					<formula>
				IF({{CreatedDate}}={{LastModifiedDate}},
				JOIN_TEXT( " ","Created", DATE_DIFF({{LastModifiedDate}}) ),
				JOIN_TEXT( " ","Updated", DATE_DIFF({{LastModifiedDate}}) )
				)</formula>
				</field>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="multiple" value="" field="Name" operator="not in" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
					<values>
						<value>skuid</value>
						<value>skuidcore</value>
						<value>skuidmobilecore</value>
						<value>skuidbuilder</value>
						<value>skuidvis</value>
					</values>
				</condition>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
	</models>

													<fields>

															<renderConditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep">
																<renderCondition value="CustomComponent" sourcetype="feature" enclosevalueinquotes="false" operator="="/>

													</fields>
												</row>
												<row>
													<fields>

											</onerroractions>
										</action>
										<action type="save">

												<model>stng__ComponentPacks</model>
											</models>
											<onerroractions>
												<action type="unblockUI"/>
												<action type="showToast" duration="6" styleSettingsVariant="error" message="There was an error {{insertResults.0.errors.0.message}}"/>

												<model>stng__ComponentPacks</model>

									</actions>

									<enableConditions>
										<condition sourcetype="fieldvalue" fieldmodel="stng__ComponentPacks" field="Name" type="blank" operator="!="/>
									</enableConditions>
								</skuid__button>
								<skuid__button label="Cancel">
									<actions>

											<models>
												<model>stng__ComponentPacks</model>
											</models>
										</action>

									</models>
								</action>
							</afterCloseActions>

					</action>
					<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.loadJSZip"/>

name: Settings_ComposerTheme
content:
<skuid__page unsavedchangeswarning="yes" personalizationmode="server" showsidebar="false" showheader="false" theme="Skuid App">
	<models>
		<model id="stng__OrgPreferences" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" sobject="skuid__Preferences__c" datasource="salesforce">
			<fields>
				<field id="SetupOwnerId"/>
				<field id="SetupOwner.Name"/>
				<field id="skuid__Default_Builder_Theme__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="Composer Light" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT" label="Composer Theme">
                    <picklistentries>
                        <entry value="Composer Dark" label="Composer Dark"/>
                        <entry value="Composer Light" label="Composer Light"/>
                    </picklistentries>
               </field>
    			<field id="skuid__Default_Mobile_Theme__c"/>
                <field id="skuid__Default_Mobile_Builder_Theme__c"/>
                <field id="skuid__Default_Theme__c"/>
            </fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="userinfo" value="" field="SetupOwnerId" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" userinfotype="organizationid"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
