        <description/>
      </actionsequence>
      <actionsequence id="74714e81-7dff-42d0-b2c0-23e7c154a04b" label="Refresh Auth Provider picklist" type="reusable" event-scope="component">
        <description>Filter Auth Provider list to only provide matching APs for the data source type</description>
        <actions>
          <action type="emptyModelData">
            <models>
              <model>stng__AuthProviders</model>
            </models>
          </action>
          <action type="deactivateCondition" model="stng__AuthProviders" condition="stng__AuthProviderType"/>
          <action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="stng__ModelDataSources" label="if salesforce ds">
            <formula>{{skuid__Adapter_Name__c}} === "salesforce"</formula>
            <iftrueactions>
              <action type="setCondition" model="stng__AuthProviders" condition="stng__AuthProviderType" value="salesforce" valuesource="fieldvalue"/>
              <action type="requeryModel" model="stng__AuthProviders" behavior="standard">
                <onerroractions>
                  <action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000"/>
                </onerroractions>
              </action>
            </iftrueactions>
          </action>
          <action type="requeryModel" model="stng__AuthProviders" behavior="standard">
            <onerroractions>
              <action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000"/>
            </onerroractions>
          </action>
        </actions>
      </actionsequence>
			<actionsequence id="493e03ba-3fbf-4dcf-bee7-f7924a754a99" label="SelectedNav" type="event-triggered" event-scope="component" event-name="page.rendered">
				<description/>
				<actions>
					<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="uiControl" affectedrows="context">
						<updates>
							<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Selected_Global_Nav" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="DATA SOURCES"/>
						</updates>
					</action>
				</actions>
			</actionsequence>
    </actionsequences>
  </resources>
</skuid__page>

name: Settings_DataSourceDetailV2
content:
<skuid__page globalfeedbackenabled="false" title="" theme="Skuid App">
  <models>
    <model id="stng__SiteEnv" label="SiteEnvironment" labelplural="SiteEnvironment" limit="20" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="PLINY_WARDEN_HOST" displaytype="TEXT" label="PLINYWARDENHOST"/>
        <field id="PLINY_WARDEN_PORT" displaytype="TEXT" label="PLINYWARDENPORT"/>
        <field id="PLINY_WARDEN_VERSION" displaytype="TEXT" label="PLINYWARDENVERSION"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>  
    <model id="stng__ConnectionTest" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false">
      <fields>
        <field id="status" displaytype="TEXT"/>
        <field id="message" displaytype="TEXT"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__DataSources" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" doclone="" sobject="skuid__Model_Service__c" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Adapter_Name__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" defaultValue="salesforce" label="Data Source Type"/>
        <field id="skuid__Active__c"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="skuid__URL__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Use_Apex_Proxy__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Data Service Host" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF(ISBLANK({{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__SiteEnv","PLINY_WARDEN_HOST"), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__DataServices","skuid__Host__c","Id",{{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}))</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Data Service Port" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF(ISBLANK({{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__SiteEnv","PLINY_WARDEN_PORT"), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__DataServices","skuid__Port__c","Id",{{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}))</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Proxy_Version__c" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Data Service Version" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>IF(ISBLANK({{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__SiteEnv","PLINY_WARDEN_VERSION"), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__DataServices","skuid__Version__c","Id",{{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}))</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Data_Service_Id__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__External_Id__c"/>
        <field id="CustomDataService__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Use a Private Data Service" defaultValue=""/>
        <field id="IsSQLDataSource__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue">
          <formula>true</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="datasource_image" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>JOIN_TEXT("",LOWER({{skuid__Adapter_Name__c}}),".svg")
          </formula>
        </field>
        <field id="CreatedDate"/>
        <field id="CreatedById"/>
        <field id="CreatedBy.Name"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedById"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedBy.Name"/>
        <field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" value="id" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Id" sourcetype="param" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__DataServices" limit="" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" type="" sobject="skuid__Data_Service__c" doclone="" orderby="Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Host__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Port__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Version__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="modelmerge" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Id" mergefield="skuid__Data_Service_Id__c" model="stng__DataSources" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__DataSource_Warden" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="SkuidDataService" label="Data Source" labelplural="Data Sources" type="readwrite" namefield="name" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false">
      <methods>
        <method type="query" verb="GET" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{id}}"/>
        <method type="insert" verb="POST" successif="requestsucceeds" sendchanges="asjsoninbody" insertresponse="recordinbody" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources"/>
        <method type="update" verb="PUT" successif="requestsucceeds" sendchanges="asjsoninbody" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{id}}"/>
        <method type="delete" verb="DELETE" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{id}}" successif="requestsucceeds"/>
      </methods>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__External_Id__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__External_Id__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="id" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="host" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="port" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <fields>
        <field id="id" displaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" label="Id"/>
        <field id="name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Name" length="255" required="true" readonly="true"/>
        <field id="type" displaytype="PICKLIST" required="true" label="Data Source Type" picklistsource="rowsinmodel" picklistmodel="stng__DataSourceTypes" entryvalue="{{{value}}}" entrylabel="{{{label}}}" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue"/>
        <field id="is_active" displaytype="BOOLEAN" defaultValue="true" label="Is Active"/>
        <field id="data_source_id" displaytype="TEXT" label="Data Source ID" required="true"/>
        <field id="url" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Host, Port" helptext="The host name / IP address, and port, at which your database is accessible, e.g. "my-db.some-host.com:3306". Do NOT include "https://"."/>
        <field id="database_name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Name"/>
        <field id="database_username" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Username"/>
        <field id="database_password" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Password"/>
        <field id="config.ssl" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Use SSL to Connect"/>
        <field id="config.ssl-ca" displaytype="TEXTAREA" label="Server CA"/>
        <field id="config.ssl-key" displaytype="TEXTAREA" label="Client Key"/>
        <field id="config.ssl-cert" displaytype="TEXTAREA" label="Client Certificate"/>
        <field id="credential_source" displaytype="PICKLIST" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" label="Database Credential Source" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="true" defaultValue="org">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="org" label="All Skuid users share one database credential"/>
            <entry value="perusertemp" label="Generate temporary credentials for each Skuid user"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="credential_duration_seconds" label="Credential Duration (seconds)" displaytype="PICKLIST" returntype="DOUBLE" picklistsource="manual" enclosevalueinquotes="false" defaultValue="900">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="900" label="15 minutes"/>
            <entry value="1800" label="30 minutes"/>
            <entry value="2700" label="45 minutes"/>
            <entry value="3600" label="60 minutes"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="get_credentials_access_key_id" displaytype="TEXT" label="AWS Access Key Id"/>
        <field id="get_credentials_secret_access_key" displaytype="TEXT" label="AWS Secret Access Key" ogdisplaytype="PASSWORD"/>
        <field id="credential_username_source_type" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Username Source" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="true" defaultValue="userrecordfield"/>
        <field id="credential_username_source_property" displaytype="PICKLIST" label="Skuid user record field to use for database user name" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="username" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="username" label="Username"/>
            <entry value="email" label="Email"/>
            <entry value="federation_id" label="Federation Identifier"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="credential_groups_source_type" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Groups Source" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="true" defaultValue="shared"/>
        <field id="credential_groups_source_property" displaytype="TEXT" label="Database Group(s) Attribute Name"/>
        <field id="dso_import_error" displaytype="TEXT" uionly="true"/>
        <field id="ssl_checkbox_updated" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
          <formula>{{config.ssl}}</formula>
        </field>
        <field id="ssl_approach_ui" displaytype="PICKLIST" uionly="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="prefer" label="Prefer"/>
            <entry value="verify" label="Verify"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="ssl_method_valid" uionly="true" displaytype="BOOLEAN" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN" ogdisplaytype="FORMULA" defaultValue="true"/>
      </fields>
      <idfields>
        <field>id</field>
      </idfields>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__DataSourceObjects" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="SkuidDataService" label="Data Source Object" labelplural="Data Source Objects" type="readwrite" namefield="name">
      <methods>
        <method type="query" verb="GET" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{dataSourceId}}/entities"/>
        <method type="insert" verb="POST" successif="requestsucceeds" sendchanges="asjsoninbody" insertresponse="recordinbody" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{dataSourceId}}/entities"/>
        <method type="update" verb="PUT" successif="requestsucceeds" sendchanges="asjsoninbody" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{dataSourceId}}/entities/{{id}}"/>
        <method type="delete" verb="DELETE" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{dataSourceId}}/entities/{{id}}" successif="requestsucceeds"/>
      </methods>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__External_Id__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__External_Id__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="dataSourceId" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="host" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="port" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
      </conditions>
      <fields>
        <field id="id" displaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" label="Id"/>
        <field id="name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Name" length="255" required="true"/>
        <field id="custom_config" displaytype="TEXT" label="Custom Config"/>
        <field id="data_source_id" displaytype="TEXT" label="Name" length="255" required="true"/>
        <field id="schema" displaytype="TEXT" label="Schema"/>
        <field id="table_name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Table Name" required="true"/>
        <field id="label" displaytype="TEXT" label="Label" required="true"/>
        <field id="label_plural" displaytype="TEXT" label="Plural Label" required="true"/>
        <field id="UpdatedDate" label="Last Modified" displaytype="DATETIME"/>
        <field id="CreatedDate" label="Created" displaytype="DATETIME"/>
        <field id="CreatedByID" label="Created By" displaytype="TEXT" accessible="true" filterable="true"/>
        <field id="UpdatedByID" label="Last Modified By" displaytype="TEXT" accessible="true" filterable="true"/>
      </fields>
      <idfields>
        <field>id</field>
      </idfields>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__DSOImport" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true" label="Data Source Table" labelplural="Data Source Tables">
      <fields>
        <field id="name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Table Name"/>
        <field id="url" displaytype="TEXT" label="Url"/>
        <field id="dsName" displaytype="TEXT" label="Data Source Name"/>
        <field id="schema" displaytype="TEXT" label="Table Schema"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__DSOImport_Dependencies" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true" label="Data Source Table" labelplural="Data Source Tables">
      <fields>
        <field id="name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Table Name"/>
        <field id="url" displaytype="TEXT" label="Url"/>
        <field id="dsName" displaytype="TEXT" label="Data Source Name"/>
        <field id="schema" displaytype="TEXT" label="Table Schema"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="stng__DataSourceDetail_uionly" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="Ui-Only" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false">
      <fields>
        <field id="prefer" displaytype="PICKLIST" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry label="Prefer" value="prefer"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="verify" displaytype="PICKLIST" length="255" label="Verify" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="verify" label="Verify"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="is_initial_load" displaytype="BOOLEAN" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="true"/>
      </fields>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="branch" whenfinished="continue" model="stng__DataSourceDetail_uionly">
              <formula>NOT(ISBLANK({{prefer}}))</formula>
              <iftrueactions>
                <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__DataSourceDetail_uionly" affectedrows="context">
                  <updates>
                    <update valuesource="blank" field="verify" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
                  </updates>
                </action>
                <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__DataSource_Warden" affectedrows="context">
                  <updates>
                    <update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="ssl_approach_ui" value="prefer" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
                  </updates>
                </action>
              </iftrueactions>
            </action>
            <action type="save">
              <models>
                <model>stng__DataSourceDetail_uionly</model>
              </models>
            </action>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>prefer</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="branch" whenfinished="continue" model="stng__DataSourceDetail_uionly">
              <formula>NOT(ISBLANK({{verify}}))</formula>
              <iftrueactions>
                <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__DataSourceDetail_uionly" affectedrows="context">
                  <updates>
                    <update valuesource="blank" field="prefer" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
                  </updates>
                </action>
                <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__DataSource_Warden" affectedrows="context">
                  <updates>
                    <update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="ssl_approach_ui" value="verify" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
                  </updates>
                </action>
              </iftrueactions>
            </action>
            <action type="save">
              <models>
                <model>stng__DataSourceDetail_uionly</model>
              </models>
            </action>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>verify</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
  </models>
  <pageregioncontents>
    <pageregioncontent regionid="sk-1uFo3V-67" uniqueid="sk-1uLo4g-22" defaultcontent="true">
      <components>
        <skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-3jR0-1768">
          <components>
            <skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-2QTt-171508">
              <components>
                <skuid__grid uniqueid="grid-datasource-warden-header" flexDirection="row" justifyContent="flex-start" alignItems="flex-start" columnGutter="0" rowGutter="0">
                  <divisions>
                    <division minWidth="0px" ratio="1" alignSelf="auto">
                      <components/>
                    </division>
                    <division alignSelf="auto" minWidth="100%" ratio="1" maxWidth="1440px">
                      <components>
                        <skuid__grid uniqueid="sk-3X5L-15270" flexDirection="row" justifyContent="flex-start" alignItems="center" columnGutter="4" rowGutter="0">
                          <divisions>
                            <division ratio="0" alignSelf="auto" maxWidth="80px">
                              <components>
                                <skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-3XBL-15676" styleSettingsVariant="59ae1465-5a03-479d-911e-b2a256c8c3a1">
                                  <components>
                                    <skuid__text contents="<div class="ds-image-container" style="text-align:center;"><img src="/resource/1578083228000/skuid__DataSourceListImages/datasources/{{{datasource_image}}}" height=46 /></div>" uniqueid="text-data-source-image" model="stng__DataSources"/>
                                  </components>
                                  <background/>
                                  <renderConditions logictype="and"/>
                                  <styles>
                                    <spacing/>
                                  </styles>
                                </skuid__wrapper>
                              </components>
                            </division>
                            <division alignSelf="auto" minWidth="100px" ratio="1">
                              <components>
                                <skuid__grid uniqueid="sk-2me7-19360" flexDirection="row" justifyContent="flex-start" alignItems="flex-start" columnGutter="0" rowGutter="0">
                                  <divisions>
                                    <division minWidth="0px" ratio="1">
                                      <components>
                                        <skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-3L08-26518">
                                          <components>
                                            <skuid__header uniqueid="header-datasource-warden-header" title="{{Name}}" model="stng__DataSources">
                                              <skuid__buttonSet>
                                                <groups/>

                                              <renderConditions logictype="and">
                                                <renderCondition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="stng__DataSources" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="skipandnorender" field="Id" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
                                              </renderConditions>
                                            </skuid__header>
                                          </components>
                                          <background/>
                                          <interactions/>
                                        </skuid__wrapper>
                                      </components>

                                    <division alignSelf="auto" minWidth="0" ratio="0">
                                      <components>

                                            <skuid__buttonGroup>

                                      <renderConditions logictype="and">
                                        <renderCondition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="stng__DataSource_Warden" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasRows"/>
                                      </renderConditions>
                                    </division>
                                  </divisions>
                                </skuid__grid>
                                <skuid__grid uniqueid="sk-3X9--16277" flexDirection="row" justifyContent="flex-start" alignItems="center" columnGutter="1.5" rowGutter="0">
                                  <divisions>

                          <styles>
                            <spacing top="5" bottom="4" left="5" right="5"/>
                          </styles>
                          <renderConditions logictype="and"/>
                        </skuid__grid>
                      </components>
                    </division>
                    <division alignSelf="auto" minWidth="0px" ratio="1">
                      <components/>
                    </division>
                  </divisions>
                </skuid__grid>
              </components>
              <background type="color" color="white"/>
              <styles>
                <spacing/>

                                                              <renderConditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="cancel">
                                                                <renderCondition type="fieldvalue" field="credential_source" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="stng__DataSource_Warden" sourcetype="fieldvalue" value="perusertemp"/>
                                                              </renderConditions>
                                                            </skuid__field>
                                                          </fields>
                                                        </row>
                                                        <row uniqueid="sk-3XIx-42670">
                                                          <fields>
                                                            <skuid__field id="get_credentials_secret_access_key" uniqueid="field-datasource-warden-options-authentication-peruser-accesskey" displayAs="PASSWORD" required="true" showHelp="true">
                                                              <renderConditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="cancel">
                                                                <renderCondition type="fieldvalue" field="credential_source" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="stng__DataSource_Warden" sourcetype="fieldvalue" value="perusertemp"/>
                                                              </renderConditions>
                                                            </skuid__field>
                                                          </fields>
                                                        </row>
                                                        <row uniqueid="sk-3XIx-42676">
                                                          <fields>
                                                            <skuid__field id="credential_username_source_property" uniqueid="field-datasource-warden-options-samlfield-usernameproperty" required="true">
                                                              <renderConditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="cancel">
                                                                <renderCondition type="fieldvalue" field="credential_source" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="stng__DataSource_Warden" sourcetype="fieldvalue" value="perusertemp"/>
                                                              </renderConditions>
                                                            </skuid__field>
                                                          </fields>
                                                        </row>
                                                        <row uniqueid="sk-3XIx-42680">
                                                          <fields>
                                                            <skuid__field id="credential_groups_source_property" uniqueid="field-datasource-warden-options-shared-sourceproperty" label="Database Group(s) to assign to temporary users" required="true" placeholder="e.g. "admin", or "hr,sales" for multiple">
                                                              <renderConditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="cancel">
                                                                <renderCondition type="fieldvalue" field="credential_groups_source_type" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="stng__DataSource_Warden" sourcetype="fieldvalue" value="shared"/>
                                                                <renderCondition type="fieldvalue" field="credential_source" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="stng__DataSource_Warden" sourcetype="fieldvalue" value="perusertemp"/>
                                                              </renderConditions>
                                                            </skuid__field>
                                                          </fields>
                                                        </row>
                                                      </rows>
                                                      <renderConditions logictype="and">
                                                        <renderCondition type="fieldvalue" field="type" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="stng__DataSource_Warden" sourcetype="fieldvalue" value="AmazonRedshift"/>
                                                      </renderConditions>
                                                    </section>
                                                  </sections>
                                                  <styles>

                                                  </styles>
                                                  <renderConditions logictype="and"/>
                                                </skuid__form>
                                                <skuid__buttonSet uniqueid="sk-3XIx-42684" position="left">
                                                  <groups>

                                                          <renderConditions logictype="and"/>
                                                          <enableConditions logictype="and">
                                                            <condition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="stng__DataSource_Warden" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasChanged" value="true" operator="="/>

  <resources>
  <labels/>
  <javascript>
    <jsitem location="staticresource" name="next" filepath="js/skuidPages/skuidSettings.js" cachelocation="false" namespace="skuid"/>
    <jsitem location="staticresource" name="next" filepath="js/skuidPages/dataSourceConfig.js" cachelocation="false" namespace="skuid"/>
  </javascript>
  <actionsequences uniqueid="sk-3eXJ-317">
      <actionsequence id="0306b8c2-7cfe-415f-9205-ceaa6c5bbbbe" label="Get Data Service and Load Models" type="event-triggered" event-scope="component" event-name="page.rendered">
        <description/>
        <actions>
          <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.settings.dataSources.populateDefaultDataService"/>
          <action type="requeryModels" behavior="standard">
            <models>
             <model>stng__DataSources</model>
             <model>stng__DataServices</model>
            </models>
          </action>
          <action type="requeryModels" behavior="standard">
            <models>
             <model>stng__DataSource_Warden</model>
             <model>stng__DataSourceObjects</model>
            </models>
          </action>
        </actions>
      </actionsequence>
      <actionsequence id="c6e87914-1087-499d-9269-3e43e752fc6e" label="Import DataSource Objects" type="reusable">
        <actions>
          <action type="blockUI" showPlaceholder="true" styleSettingsVariant="dark" message=" "/>
          <action type="emptyModelData">
            <models>
              <model>stng__DSOImport</model>
              <model>stng__DSOImport_Dependencies</model>
            </models>
          </action>
          <action type="custom" snippet="importDSOS">
            <onerroractions>
              <action type="blockUI" message="There was an error importing Data Source Objects." timeout="5000" subtext="{{$PreviousAction.error}}"/>
              <action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000"/>
              <action type="closeAllPopups" message="There was an error" timeout="3000"/>
            </onerroractions>
          </action>
          <action type="showModal">
            <skuid__modal title="Import Data Source Objects" width="640px">
              <components>
                <skuid__wrapper uniqueid="wrapper-dependencies-found">
                  <components>
                    <skuid__messageArea uniqueid="sk-1ZPk-33807" model="stng__DataSource_Warden">
                      <group>
                        <skuid__messageBlock description="{{$Model.stng__DataSource_Warden.data.0.dso_import_error}}" styleSettingsVariant="warningStrong" title="Dependencies found" icon="sk-webicon-ink:warning"/>
                      </group>
                      <renderConditions logictype="and">
                        <renderCondition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="stng__DataSource_Warden" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="dso_import_error" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
                      </renderConditions>
                    </skuid__messageArea>
                    <skuid__buttonSet uniqueid="sk-1ZQR-36752" position="left">
                      <groups>
                        <skuid__buttonGroup>
                          <buttons>
                            <skuid__button label="Add dependent tables and retry" styleSettingsVariant="primary" uniqueid="button-datasource-warden-import-add-dependents">
                              <actions>
                                <action type="blockUI" duration="4" styleSettingsVariant="dark" message="Importing objects..." showPlaceholder="true"/>
                                <action type="custom" snippet="addDependentTablesAndRetry">
                                  <onerroractions>
                                    <action type="unblockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000"/>
                                  </onerroractions>
                                </action>
                                <action type="requeryModel" model="stng__DataSourceObjects" behavior="standard"/>
                                <action type="closeAllPopups"/>
                                <action type="unblockUI"/>
                                <action type="showToast" message="Data Source Objects imported!" styleSettingsVariant="dark" timeout="2000" duration="4"/>
                              </actions>
                            </skuid__button>
                          </buttons>
                        </skuid__buttonGroup>
                      </groups>
                      <styles>
                        <spacing top="2" bottom="4"/>
                      </styles>
                    </skuid__buttonSet>
                  </components>
                  <background/>
                  <renderConditions logictype="and">
                    <renderCondition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="stng__DataSource_Warden" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="dso_import_error" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
                  </renderConditions>
                  <styleVariantConditions/>
                  <styles>
                    <spacing/>
                  </styles>
                </skuid__wrapper>
                <skuid__table model="stng__DSOImport" uniqueid="table-datasource-warden-import" mode="readonly" pageSize="25" showSaveCancel="false">
                  <fields>
                    <field id="name" uniqueid="field-datasource-warden-import-name"/>
                    <field id="schema" uniqueid="field-datasource-warden-import-schema"/>
                  </fields>
                  <filtering enableSearch="true" instantSearch="false" searchMethod="client"/>
                  <rowActions>
                    <action type="multi" label="Import" icon="sk-webicon-ink:download" uniqueid="button-datasource-warden-import-import">
                      <actions>
                        <action type="blockUI" message="Importing {{name}}..." showPlaceholder="true" styleSettingsVariant="dark"/>
                        <action type="emptyModelData">
                          <models>
                            <model>stng__DSOImport_Dependencies</model>
                          </models>
                        </action>
                        <action type="custom" snippet="importDSO">
                          <onerroractions>
                            <action type="unblockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000"/>
                          </onerroractions>
                        </action>
                        <action type="requeryModel" model="stng__DataSourceObjects" behavior="standard"/>
                        <action type="closeAllPopups"/>
                        <action type="unblockUI"/>
                        <action type="showToast" message="Data Source Object imported!" timeout="2000" styleSettingsVariant="dark" duration="4"/>
                      </actions>
                    </action>
                  </rowActions>
                  <massActions>
                    <action type="multi" label="Import selected" uniqueid="button-datasource-warden-import-selected">
                      <actions>
                        <action type="blockUI" message="Importing objects..."/>
                        <action type="emptyModelData">
                          <models>
                            <model>stng__DSOImport_Dependencies</model>
                          </models>
                        </action>
                        <action type="custom" snippet="importMultipleDSOs">
                          <onerroractions>
                            <action type="unblockUI" message="There was an error importing these Data Source Objects." timeout="5000" subtext="{{$PreviousAction.error}}"/>
                          </onerroractions>
                        </action>
                        <action type="requeryModel" model="stng__DataSourceObjects" behavior="standard"/>
                        <action type="closeAllPopups"/>
                        <action type="unblockUI"/>
                        <action type="showToast" message="Data Source Objects imported!" timeout="2000" showPlaceholder="false" styleSettingsVariant="dark" duration="4"/>
                      </actions>
                      <tooltip position="top"/>
                    </action>
                  </massActions>
                </skuid__table>
              </components>
            </skuid__modal>
          </action>
          <action type="unblockUI"/>
        </actions>
        <description>Opens modal of all tables in Datasource and allows you to pull them all in. </description>
        <inputs/>
      </actionsequence>
      <actionsequence id="d58b2875-b6a0-4e5f-89c8-66d566a8f888" label="Test Connection" type="reusable">
        <actions>
          <action type="blockUI" message="Testing..." timeout="10000"/>
          <action type="custom" snippet="testConnection"/>
          <action type="unblockUI"/>
          <action type="showModal">
            <skuid__modal title="Connection Status" width="640px">
              <components>
                <skuid__messageArea uniqueid="sk-2gXj-51825" model="stng__ConnectionTest">
                  <group>
                    <skuid__messageBlock title="Successful" description="{{message}}" styleSettingsVariant="successStrong" icon="sk-webicon-ink:checkmark">
                      <renderConditions logictype="and">
                        <renderCondition type="fieldvalue" operator="!=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="stng__ConnectionTest" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="status" value="Unsuccessful."/>
                      </renderConditions>
                      <conditions/>
                    </skuid__messageBlock>
                    <skuid__messageBlock title="Unsuccessful" description="{{message}}" styleSettingsVariant="errorStrong">
                      <renderConditions logictype="and">
                        <renderCondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="stng__ConnectionTest" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="status" value="Unsuccessful."/>
                      </renderConditions>
                      <conditions/>
                    </skuid__messageBlock>
                  </group>
                  <renderConditions logictype="and">
                    <renderCondition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="stng__ConnectionTest" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasRows"/>
                  </renderConditions>
                </skuid__messageArea>
              </components>
              <afterCloseActions>
                <action type="emptyModelData">
                  <models>
                    <model>stng__ConnectionTest</model>
                  </models>
                </action>
              </afterCloseActions>
              <buttons>
                <skuid__button label="Done" styleSettingsVariant="primary" uniqueid="button-datasource-warden-test-done">
                  <actions>
                    <action type="closeAllPopups"/>
                  </actions>
                  <tooltip position="top"/>
                </skuid__button>
              </buttons>
            </skuid__modal>
          </action>
        </actions>
        <description>Test datasource connection</description>
      </actionsequence>
      <actionsequence id="5c4fa940-0de5-481b-8b53-152009b74ce1" label="Delete data source" type="reusable">
        <description/>
        <actions>
          <action type="markRowsForDeletion" model="stng__DataSources" affectedrows="context"/>
          <action type="markRowsForDeletion" model="stng__DataSource_Warden" affectedrows="context"/>
          <action type="showModal">
            <skuid__modal title="Delete Data Source" width="640px">
              <components>
                <skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-2lK0-19323" styleSettingsVariant="cfa0c754-42be-41a9-9c55-4ac58e443fcc">
                  <components>
                    <skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-2lK0-19324">
                      <components>
                        <skuid__grid uniqueid="sk-2lK0-19325" flexDirection="row" justifyContent="flex-start" alignItems="flex-start" columnGutter="2" rowGutter="0">
                          <divisions>
                            <division minWidth="32px" ratio="1" alignSelf="auto" maxWidth="32px">
                              <components>
                                <skuid__text contents="<img src="/resource/1578083228000/skuid__DataSourceListImages/datasources/{{{datasource_image}}}" height=32 />" uniqueid="text-data-source-image" model="stng__DataSources"/>
                              </components>
                            </division>
                            <division alignSelf="auto" minWidth="100px" ratio="1">
                              <components>
                                <skuid__text contents="{{{Name}}}" uniqueid="sk-2lK0-19329" styleSettingsVariant="medium" model="stng__DataSources">
                                  <styles>
                                    <spacing bottom="1" top="0.5"/>
                                  </styles>
                                  <conditions/>
                                </skuid__text>
                                <skuid__text contents="Created {{CreatedDate}} by&nbsp;{{CreatedBy.Name}}" uniqueid="sk-2lK0-19331" styleSettingsVariant="7c7f8594-184f-4d52-b33c-1f4dc6fb806a" model="stng__DataSources">
                                  <conditions/>
                                  <styles>
                                    <spacing bottom="0.5"/>
                                  </styles>
                                </skuid__text>
                                <skuid__text contents="Updated {{LastModifiedDate}} by&nbsp;{{LastModifiedBy.Name}}" uniqueid="sk-2lLB-36857" styleSettingsVariant="7c7f8594-184f-4d52-b33c-1f4dc6fb806a" model="stng__DataSources">
                                  <conditions/>
                                  <styles>
                                    <spacing bottom="0.5"/>
                                  </styles>
                                </skuid__text>
                              </components>
                            </division>
                          </divisions>
                        </skuid__grid>
                      </components>
                      <background/>
                      <styles>
                        <spacing top="2" bottom="2" left="3" right="2"/>
                      </styles>
                    </skuid__wrapper>
                  </components>
                  <background/>
                  <styles>
                    <spacing bottom="3" top="2"/>
                  </styles>
                </skuid__wrapper>
                <skuid__text contents="Are you sure you want to permanently delete this data source? <strong>You can&#39;t undo this.</strong>" uniqueid="sk-3JA-26216">
                  <conditions/>
                  <styles>
                    <spacing/>
                  </styles>
                </skuid__text>
              </components>
              <buttons>
                <skuid__button label="Yes, delete this data source" uniqueid="button-datasource-warden-delete-confirm" styleSettingsVariant="destructive">
                  <actions>
                    <action type="save">
                      <models>
                        <model>stng__DataSources</model>
                        <model>stng__DataSource_Warden</model>
                      </models>
                    </action>
                    <action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
                    <action type="redirect" window="self" url="/apex/skuid__DataSources"/>
                  </actions>
                </skuid__button>
                <skuid__button label="Cancel" uniqueid="button-datasource-warden-delete-cancel">
                  <actions>
                    <action type="cancel">
                      <models>
                        <model>stng__DataSources</model>
                        <model>stng__DataSource_Warden</model>
                      </models>
                    </action>
                    <action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
                  </actions>
                </skuid__button>
              </buttons>
              <afterCloseActions>
                <action type="cancel">
                  <models>
                    <model>stng__DataSources</model>
                    <model>stng__DataSource_Warden</model>
                  </models>
                </action>
              </afterCloseActions>
            </skuid__modal>
          </action>
        </actions>
      </actionsequence>
			<actionsequence id="493e03ba-3fbf-4dcf-bee7-f7924a754a99" label="SelectedNav" type="event-triggered" event-scope="component" event-name="page.rendered">
				<description/>
				<actions>
					<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="uiControl" affectedrows="context">
						<updates>
							<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Selected_Global_Nav" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="DATA SOURCES"/>
						</updates>
					</action>
				</actions>
			</actionsequence>
    </actionsequences>
  </resources>
</skuid__page>

name: Settings_DataSourceObjectDetail
content:
<skuid__page unsavedchangeswarning="yes" personalizationmode="client" theme="Skuid App">
	<models>
		<model id="stng__SiteEnv" label="SiteEnvironment" labelplural="SiteEnvironment" limit="20" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true">
			<fields>
				<field id="PLINY_WARDEN_HOST" displaytype="TEXT" label="PLINYWARDENHOST"/>
				<field id="PLINY_WARDEN_PORT" displaytype="TEXT" label="PLINYWARDENPORT"/>
				<field id="PLINY_WARDEN_VERSION" displaytype="TEXT" label="PLINYWARDENVERSION"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions/>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="stng__DataSources" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" doclone="" type="" sobject="skuid__Model_Service__c" orderby="skuid__Adapter_Name__c, Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
			<fields>
				<field id="skuid__Adapter_Name__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" defaultValue="salesforce" label="Data Source Type"/>
				<field id="skuid__Active__c"/>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="Id"/>
				<field id="skuid__URL__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Use_Apex_Proxy__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Data Service Host" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
					<formula>IF(ISBLANK({{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__SiteEnv","PLINY_WARDEN_HOST"), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__DataServices","skuid__Host__c","Id",{{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}))</formula>
				</field>
				<field id="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" uionly="true" displaytype="FORMULA" label="Data Service Port" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
					<formula>IF(ISBLANK({{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__SiteEnv","PLINY_WARDEN_PORT"), MODEL_LOOKUP("stng__DataServices","skuid__Port__c","Id",{{skuid__Data_Service_Id__c}}))</formula>
				</field>
				<field id="skuid__Data_Service_Id__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__External_Id__c"/>
				<field id="datasource_image" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="TEXT">
					<formula>JOIN_TEXT("",LOWER({{skuid__Adapter_Name__c}}),".svg")
					</formula>
				</field>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="param" value="dsid" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Id" sourcetype="param" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>

		<model id="stng__DataSourceConditions" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="SkuidDataService" label="Data Source Condition" labelplural="Data Source Conditions" type="readwrite" namefield="name">
			<methods>
				<method type="query" verb="GET" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{dataSourceId}}/entities/{{entityId}}/conditions"/>
				<method type="insert" verb="POST" successif="requestsucceeds" sendchanges="asjsoninbody" insertresponse="recordinbody" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{dataSourceId}}/entities/{{entityId}}/conditions"/>
				<method type="update" verb="PUT" successif="requestsucceeds" sendchanges="asjsoninbody" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{dataSourceId}}/entities/{{entityId}}/conditions/{{id}}"/>
				<method type="delete" verb="DELETE" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{dataSourceId}}/entities/{{entityId}}/conditions/{{id}}" successif="requestsucceeds"/>
			</methods>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="modelmerge" value="" sourcetype="param" sourceparam="entityId" operator="=" model="stng__DataSourceObjects" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="id" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
				<condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__External_Id__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__External_Id__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="dataSourceId" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
				<condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Proxy_Host__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="host" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
				<condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Proxy_Port__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="port" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="{{id}}" enclosevalueinquotes="true" sourcetype="param" sourceparam="id"/>
			</conditions>
			<fields>
				<field id="id" displaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" label="Id"/>
				<field id="name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Name" length="255" required="true"/>
				<field id="data_source_object_id" label="Data Source Object Id" ispolymorphic="false" isnamepointing="false" displaytype="STRING" accessible="true" filterable="true"/>
				<field id="type" displaytype="PICKLIST" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" label="Type" required="true" picklistsource="manual">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="fieldvalue" label="Single specified value"/>
						<entry value="userinfo" label="Skuid user attribute"/>
						<entry value="blank" label="None - blank value"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="field" displaytype="PICKLIST" label="Field" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="rowsinmodel" required="true" limitentries="true" picklistmodel="stng__DataSourceFields" entryvalue="{{name}}" entrylabel="{{name}}" returntype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue"/>
				<field id="value" displaytype="TEXT" label="Value"/>
				<field id="execute_on_query" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Enforce on Query"/>
				<field id="execute_on_insert" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Enforce on Insert"/>
				<field id="execute_on_update" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Enforce on Update"/>
				<field id="value_user_attributes" uionly="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" picklistsource="manual" label="Value" defaultValue="email" returntype="TEXT">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="email" label="Email"/>
						<entry value="federation_id" label="Federation Id"/>
						<entry value="first_name" label="First Name"/>
						<entry value="last_name" label="Last Name"/>
						<entry value="site_id" label="Site Id"/>
						<entry value="user_name" label="User Name"/>
						<entry value="user_id" label="User Id"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="is_user_info" displaytype="FORMULA" uionly="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" readonly="true" returntype="BOOLEAN">
					<formula>{{type}} === "userinfo"</formula>
				</field>
			</fields>
			<idfields>
				<field>id</field>
			</idfields>
			<actions>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__DataSourceConditions" affectedrows="context">
							<updates>
								<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="value" value="{{value_user_attributes}}"/>
							</updates>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>value_user_attributes</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="stng__DataSourceConditions" label="if type is updated to blank or fieldvalue, clear the value">
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__DataSourceConditions" affectedrows="context">
									<updates>
										<update field="value" valuesource="blank"/>
										<update field="value_user_attributes" valuesource="blank"/>
									</updates>
								</action>
							</iftrueactions>
							<formula>{{type}} === "blank" || {{type}} === "fieldvalue"</formula>
						</action>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="stng__DataSourceConditions" label="If type is user attributes and value is blank, pre-populate value">
							<formula>{{type}} === "userinfo" && ISBLANK({{value}})</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__DataSourceConditions" affectedrows="context">
									<updates>
										<update field="value_user_attributes" valuesource="fieldvalue" value="email"/>
									</updates>
								</action>
							</iftrueactions>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>type</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="custom" snippet="updateUserAttributePicklistField">
							<onerroractions>
								<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000"/>
							</onerroractions>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>models.saved</event>
						<event>models.loaded</event>
						<event>models.cancelled</event>
					</events>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" behavior="show" componentid="message-area-conditions-logic-outdated-warning" whenfinished="stop" model="stng__DataSourceObjects" label="if condition logic has value">
							<formula>NOT(ISBLANK({{conditions_logic}}))</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="toggleRenderComponent" behavior="show" componentid="message-area-conditions-logic-outdated-warning"/>
							</iftrueactions>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>models.saved</event>
					</events>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="publish" scope="skuid" event="refreshPageInclude" channel="skuidAdminPages">
							<params/>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>models.saved</event>
					</events>
				</action>
			</actions>
		</model>

				<field id="selected_dso" displaytype="PICKLIST" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="rowsinmodel" returntype="TEXT" picklistmodel="stng__DataSourceObjectList" entryvalue="{{id}}" entrylabel="{{name}}" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" mergefield="id" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
				<field id="dso_field_view" displaytype="PICKLIST" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="Table" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="Table" label="Table"/>
						<entry value="List" label="List"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="counter" displaytype="BOOLEAN" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="false"/>
				<field id="dso_profile_view" displaytype="PICKLIST" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="Table" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="Table" label="Table"/>
						<entry value="List" label="List"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="no_query_conditions" displaytype="DOUBLE" length="255" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" precision="9" scale="2" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="0"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions/>
			<actions>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="dsodetail_uionly">
							<formula>{{counter}}===false</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="dsodetail_uionly" affectedrows="context">
									<updates>
										<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="counter" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="true"/>
									</updates>
								</action>
							</iftrueactions>
						</action>
						<action type="blockUI" message="Gathering data" subtext="please wait..." styleSettingsVariant="dark" showPlaceholder="true"/>
						<action type="runComponentAction" componentid="include-datasource-objects-access-list-detail" action="unload"/>
						<action type="setCondition" model="stng__DataSourceObjects" condition="entityId" value="{{selected_dso}}"/>
						<action type="requeryModels" behavior="standard">
							<models>
								<model>stng__DataSourceObjects</model>
							</models>
						</action>
						<action type="requeryModels" behavior="standard">
							<models>
								<model>stng__DataSourceFields</model>
								<model>stng__DataSourceConditions</model>
								<model>Profile</model>
								<model>DataSourceObjectPermissions</model>
							</models>
						</action>
						<action type="setCondition" model="stng__DataSourceField_Detail" condition="fieldId" value="{{$Model.stng__DataSourceFields.data.0.id}}"/>
						<action type="requeryModel" model="stng__DataSourceField_Detail" behavior="standard"/>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="dsodetail_uionly" affectedrows="context">
							<updates>
								<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="dso_profile_view" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="Table"/>
							</updates>
						</action>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__DataSourceFields">
							<updates>
								<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="is_selected" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="false"/>
							</updates>
						</action>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="Profile" affectedrows="all">
							<updates>
								<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="is_selected" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="false"/>
							</updates>
						</action>
						<action type="custom" snippet="highlightFirstRow"/>
						<action type="runComponentAction" componentid="include-datasource-objects-access-list-detail" action="loadNewPage" pageName="Settings_DSOProfilePermissions_Include" namespace="skuid" queryString="inc_entityId={{$Model.stng__DataSourceObjects.data.0.id}}&inc_dataSourceId={{$Model.stng__DataSources.data.0.Id}}&inc_profileid={{$Model.Profile.data.0.Name}}&origin=dso" loadInBackground="true" showLoadingIndicator="false"/>
						<action type="save">
							<models>
								<model>stng__DataSourceFields</model>
								<model>Profile</model>
							</models>
							<onerroractions/>
						</action>
						<action type="unblockUI"/>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>selected_dso</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="dsodetail_uionly">
							<formula>{{dso_field_view}} === "List"</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop">
									<formula>{{$Model.stng__DataSourceField_Detail.data.length}} === 0</formula>
									<iftrueactions>
										<action type="setCondition" model="stng__DataSourceField_Detail" value="{{$Model.stng__DataSourceFields.data.0.id}}" condition="fieldId"/>
										<action type="requeryModel" model="stng__DataSourceField_Detail" behavior="standard"/>
										<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__DataSourceFields" affectedrows="all">
											<updates>
												<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="is_selected" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="false"/>
											</updates>
										</action>
										<action type="custom" snippet="highlightFirstRow">
											<onerroractions>
												<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000" styleSettingsVariant="dark"/>
											</onerroractions>
										</action>
									</iftrueactions>
								</action>
							</iftrueactions>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>dso_field_view</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="custom" snippet="newSnippet"/>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.created</event>
					</events>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="dsodetail_uionly">
							<formula>{{dso_profile_view}} === "Table"</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="requeryModel" snippet="BuildProfilePermissionSummary" model="DataSourceObjectPermissions" behavior="standard"/>
								<action type="unblockUI"/>
							</iftrueactions>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>dso_profile_view</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
			</actions>
		</model>

		<model id="stng__DataSourceField_Detail" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="SkuidDataService" label="Data Source Field" labelplural="Data Source Fields" type="readwrite" namefield="name">

				<method type="delete" verb="DELETE" endpoint="/api/v2/datasources/{{dataSourceId}}/entities/{{entityId}}/fields/{{id}}" successif="requestsucceeds"/>
			</methods>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="modelmerge" value="" sourcetype="param" sourceparam="entityId" operator="=" model="stng__DataSourceObjects" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="id" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>
				<condition type="modelmerge" value="skuid__External_Id__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__External_Id__c" sourcetype="modelmerge" model="stng__DataSources" sourceparam="dataSourceId" novaluebehavior="noquery"/>

				<condition type="multiple" field="display_type" operator="in" inactive="true" enclosevalueinquotes="true" name="__autofilter__display_type" state="filterableoff" value=""/>

			<fields>

				<field id="display_type" displaytype="PICKLIST" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" label="Display Type" required="true" picklistsource="manual">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="BOOLEAN" label="Checkbox"/>
						<entry value="COMBOBOX" label="Combobox"/>
						<entry value="CURRENCY" label="Currency"/>
						<entry value="DATE" label="Date"/>
						<entry value="DATETIME" label="Datetime"/>
						<entry value="EMAIL" label="Email"/>
						<entry value="PERCENT" label="Percent"/>
						<entry value="PICKLIST" label="Picklist"/>
						<entry value="MULTIPICKLIST" label="Multi-select Picklist"/>
						<entry value="DOUBLE" label="Number"/>
						<entry value="INTEGER" label="Integer"/>
						<entry value="REFERENCE" label="Reference"/>
						<entry value="TEXT" label="Text"/>
						<entry value="TEXTAREA" label="Textarea"/>
						<entry value="URL" label="Url"/>
						<entry value="UUID" label="UniqueId (UUID)"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="label" displaytype="TEXT" label="Label"/>
				<field id="length" displaytype="NUMBER" label="Length"/>
				<field id="is_id_field" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Id Field"/>
				<field id="is_name_field" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Name Field"/>
				<field id="filterable" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Filterable"/>
				<field id="groupable" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Groupable"/>
				<field id="required" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Required"/>
				<field id="readonly" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Readonly"/>
				<field id="sortable" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Sortable"/>
				<field id="precision" displaytype="DOUBLE" label="Precision" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" precision="2" scale="0"/>
				<field id="scale" displaytype="DOUBLE" label="Scale" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" precision="2" scale="0"/>
				<field id="reference_to" displaytype="OBJECT" label="Reference"/>
				<field id="reference_to.0.keyfield" displaytype="Text" label="Reference Key Field"/>
				<field id="reference_to.0.object" displaytype="Text" label="Referenced Object"/>
				<field id="UpdatedDate" label="Last Modified" displaytype="DATETIME"/>
				<field id="CreatedDate" label="Created" displaytype="DATETIME"/>
			</fields>
			<idfields>
				<field>id</field>
			</idfields>
			<actions>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="stng__DataSourceField_Detail" label="if field is picklist or mutipicklist, query picklist entries">
							<formula>{{display_type}} === 'PICKLIST' || {{display_type}} === 'MULTIPICKLIST'</formula>
							<iftrueactions>

								</action>
							</iftrueactions>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>models.loaded</event>
					</events>
				</action>
			</actions>
		</model>
	</models>

																					<components>
																						<skuid__text contents="<a href="https://docs.skuid.com/latest/en/data/data-source-objects/#conditions" target="_blank">Data source conditions</a>&nbsp;are used to either limit incoming data anytime a data source is queried&nbsp;<em>or</em>&nbsp;enforce field values when creating new records or updating existing records.&nbsp;
<ul>
	<li><strong style="background-color: transparent;">Enforce on Query</strong><br />
	<span style="background-color: transparent;">Whenever this data source is queried, it will only display data that matches the rules of this condition.<br />
	Useful for filtering records.&nbsp;</span><br />
	&nbsp;</li>
	<li><strong>Enforce on Insert</strong><br />
	Whenever a&nbsp;<em>new record</em>&nbsp;is created, the field for that record will match the value of the condition.<br />
	Particularly useful for&nbsp;<em>Created By &lt;User&gt;</em>&nbsp;fields<br />
	&nbsp;</li>
	<li><strong>Enforce on Update</strong><br />
	Whenever an end user&nbsp;<em>modifies an existing record</em>, the condition will be enforced. Meaning that, whether the user changes or removes a field&rsquo;s value, Skuid will disregard whatever the user entered and will instead match the condition&rsquo;s value.</li>
</ul>
" uniqueid="sk-3ux7-69074">

	<resources>
		<labels/>
		<javascript>
			<jsitem location="staticresource" name="next" filepath="js/skuidPages/skuidSettings.js" cachelocation="false" namespace="skuid"/>
			<jsitem location="staticresource" name="next" filepath="js/skuidPages/dataSourceConfig.js" cachelocation="false" namespace="skuid"/>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="highlightFirstRow" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var fieldModel = skuid.model.getModel('stng__DataSourceFields');
var profileModel = skuid.model.getModel('Profile');
fieldModel.updateRow(fieldModel.getFirstRow(), {is_selected: true});
profileModel.updateRow(profileModel.getFirstRow(), {is_selected: true});

profileModel.hasChanged = false;
fieldModel.hasChanged = false;
</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateUserAttributePicklistField" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
var conditionModel = skuid.model.getModel('stng__DataSourceConditions');
var rows = conditionModel.getRows();

$.each(rows, function(i, row) {
    if (row.type === "userinfo") {
        conditionModel.updateRow(row, {value_user_attributes: row.value});
    }
});
if (conditionModel.hasChanged) {
    conditionModel.hasChanged = false;
}</jsitem>
			<jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="newSnippet" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
var conditionModel = skuid.model.getModel('stng__DataSourceConditions');
var uiModel = skuid.model.getModel('dsodetail_uionly');
var rows = conditionModel.getRows();
var no_query_conditions = 0;

$.each(rows, function(i, row) {
    if (row.execute_on_query) {
        no_query_conditions ++;
    }
});

uiModel.updateRow(uiModel.getFirstRow(), {no_query_conditions: no_query_conditions});</jsitem>
		</javascript>
		<actionsequences uniqueid="sk-3eXJ-317">
			<actionsequence id="0306b8c2-7cfe-415f-9205-ceaa6c5bbbbe" label="Get Data Service and Load Models" type="event-triggered" event-scope="component" event-name="page.rendered">
				<description/>
				<actions>
					<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.settings.dataSources.populateDefaultDataService"/>
					<action type="requeryModels" behavior="standard">
						<models>
							<model>stng__DataSources</model>
							<model>stng__DataServices</model>
						</models>
					</action>
					<action type="requeryModels" behavior="standard">
						<models>
							<model>stng__DataSource_Warden</model>
							<model>stng__DataSourceObjects</model>
							<model>stng__DataSourceFields</model>

			<actionsequence id="e529c455-45d7-4243-8e44-5ceb354dd123" label="Go to DSO Field details" type="reusable">
				<actions>
					<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" label="If there are unsaved changes">
						<formula>{{$Model.stng__DataSourceField_Detail.hasChanged}} === true || {{$Model.stng__DataSourceFieldPicklistEntries.hasChanged}} === true</formula>
						<iftrueactions>
							<action type="showModal">
								<skuid__modal width="640px" title="Are you sure?">
									<components>
										<skuid__text contents="You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard your changes?" uniqueid="sk-2kFT-220961"/>
									</components>
									<buttons>
										<skuid__button label="Yes, discard changes" styleSettingsVariant="primary" uniqueid="sk-2kFf-271327">
											<actions>
												<action type="cancel">
													<models>
														<model>stng__DataSourceFieldPicklistEntries</model>
														<model>stng__DataSourceField_Detail</model>
													</models>
												</action>
												<action type="setCondition" model="stng__DataSourceField_Detail" condition="fieldId" value="{{id}}"/>
												<action type="requeryModel" model="stng__DataSourceField_Detail" behavior="standard">
													<onerroractions>
														<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000"/>
													</onerroractions>
												</action>
												<action type="closeAllPopups"/>
											</actions>
										</skuid__button>
										<skuid__button label="No, cancel" uniqueid="sk-2kFf-271798">
											<actions>
												<action type="closeAllPopups"/>
											</actions>
										</skuid__button>
									</buttons>
								</skuid__modal>
							</action>
						</iftrueactions>
					</action>
					<action type="setCondition" model="stng__DataSourceField_Detail" value="{{id}}" condition="fieldId"/>
					<action type="requeryModel" model="stng__DataSourceField_Detail" behavior="standard"/>
				</actions>
				<description/>
			</actionsequence>
			<actionsequence id="87719cb1-f382-4b96-b613-91d906af3e38" label="Create/Edit DSO Condition" type="reusable">
				<actions>
					<action type="branch" whenfinished="continue" label="If creating new DSO condition">
						<formula>{{$Input.action_type}} === "create_new"</formula>
						<iftrueactions>
							<action type="createRow" model="stng__DataSourceConditions" appendorprepend="prepend" defaultmodefornewitems="edit" affectedrows="context">
								<defaults>
									<default valuesource="fieldvalue" value="{{$Model.stng__DataSourceObjects.data.0.id}}" field="data_source_object_id"/>
								</defaults>
							</action>
						</iftrueactions>
					</action>
					<action type="showModal">
						<skuid__modal title="Edit condition" width="640px">
							<components>
								<skuid__form showErrorsInline="true" model="stng__DataSourceConditions" uniqueid="sk-3u18-60507" mode="edit">
									<sections>
										<section title=" " showHeading="false">
											<rows>
												<row>
