name: Settings_EncryptionKey
content:
<skuid__page globalfeedbackenabled="false" theme="Skuid App" personalizationmode="server" showheader="false" showsidebar="false">
	<models>
		<model id="stng__EncryptionSettings" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Encryption_Settings__c" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true" async="false">
			<fields>
				<field id="skuid__Key__c"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedById"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedBy.Name"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
				<field id="skuid__JobId__c"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="userinfo" value="" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" userinfotype="organizationid" field="SetupOwnerId"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="stng__ClearCredsJob" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="AsyncApexJob" orderby="CreatedDate DESC" datasource="salesforce">
			<fields>
				<field id="Id"/>
				<field id="CompletedDate"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="skuid" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="ApexClass.NamespacePrefix"/>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="DeleteModelDataSourceCredentials" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="ApexClass.Name"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="stng__ApexJobStatus" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="AsyncApexJob" orderby="CreatedDate DESC" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true" async="true">
			<fields>
				<field id="Status"/>
				<field id="JobItemsProcessed"/>
				<field id="NumberOfErrors"/>
				<field id="TotalJobItems"/>
				<field id="CompletedDate"/>
				<field id="Id"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Id" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="JobId"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
	</models>
	<components>
		<skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-2b34-3966">
			<components>
				<skuid__header title="Encryption Key" uniqueid="sk-2b35-4275" styleSettingsVariant="70409424-111e-4b10-8161-83f94804d8c6">
					<styles>
						<spacing bottom="3"/>
					</styles>
				</skuid__header>
				<skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-20qP-19994" styleSettingsVariant="7d5572d7-ec59-43f0-9d03-5259d1980637">
					<components>
						<skuid__messageArea uniqueid="sk-1yv7-17563">
							<group>
								<skuid__messageBlock title="Warning" description="The Encryption Key is currently being changed. Changes to encrypted fields are disabled until this process completes." styleSettingsVariant="warningStrong">
									<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
								</skuid__messageBlock>
							</group>
						</skuid__messageArea>
						<skuid__buttonSet uniqueid="sk-20qZ-27201" position="left">
							<groups>
								<skuid__buttonGroup>
									<buttons>
										<skuid__button label="Details" uniqueId="sk-20qZ-27200">
											<actions>
												<action type="blockUI" message="Getting job status..." styleSettingsVariant="dark" showPlaceholder="true"/>
												<action type="setCondition" model="stng__ApexJobStatus" condition="JobId" value="{{$Model.stng__EncryptionSettings.data.0.skuid__JobId__c}}"/>
												<action type="requeryModels" behavior="standard">
													<models>
														<model>stng__EncryptionSettings</model>
														<model>stng__ApexJobStatus</model>
													</models>
													<onerroractions>
														<action type="blockUI" message="Error getting Job Status" styleSettingsVariant="dark" timeout="3000"/>
													</onerroractions>
												</action>
												<action type="showModal">
													<skuid__modal title="Re-encryption Job Status ({{$Model.stng__ApexJobStatus.data.0.Status}})" width="640px">
														<components>
															<skuid__form showErrorsInline="true" model="stng__ApexJobStatus" uniqueid="sk-20rm-58254" mode="readonly">
																<sections>
																	<section title="Details">
																		<rows>
																			<row>
																				<fields>
																					<skuid__field id="Id"/>
																					<skuid__field id="TotalJobItems"/>
																				</fields>
																			</row>
																			<row>
																				<fields>
																					<skuid__field id="JobItemsProcessed"/>
																					<skuid__field id="Status"/>
																				</fields>
																			</row>
																			<row>
																				<fields>
																					<skuid__field id="CompletedDate"/>
																					<skuid__field id="NumberOfErrors"/>
																				</fields>
																			</row>
																		</rows>
																	</section>
																</sections>
															</skuid__form>
														</components>
														<buttons>
															<skuid__button label="Refresh" uniqueId="sk-20rK-47490" styleSettingsVariant="primary">
																<actions>
																	<action type="blockUI" message="Refreshing..." showPlaceholder="true" styleSettingsVariant="dark"/>
																	<action type="requeryModels" behavior="standard">
																		<models>
																			<model>stng__EncryptionSettings</model>
																			<model>stng__ApexJobStatus</model>
																		</models>
																		<onerroractions>
																			<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000" showPlaceholder="false" styleSettingsVariant="dark"/>
																		</onerroractions>
																	</action>
																	<action type="unblockUI"/>
																</actions>
															</skuid__button>
															<skuid__button label="Close" uniqueId="sk-10IU-7824">
																<actions>
																	<action type="closeAllPopups"/>
																</actions>
															</skuid__button>
														</buttons>
													</skuid__modal>
												</action>
												<action type="unblockUI"/>
											</actions>
										</skuid__button>
									</buttons>
								</skuid__buttonGroup>
							</groups>
							<styles>
								<spacing top="1.5"/>
							</styles>
							<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
							<styleVariantConditions/>
						</skuid__buttonSet>
					</components>
					<background/>
					<styles>
						<spacing top="5"/>
					</styles>
					<renderConditions logictype="and">
						<renderCondition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="stng__EncryptionSettings" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="skipandnorender" field="skuid__JobId__c" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Encryption_Settings__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
					</renderConditions>
					<styleVariantConditions/>
				</skuid__wrapper>
				<skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-20qU-23022" styleSettingsVariant="7d5572d7-ec59-43f0-9d03-5259d1980637">
					<components>
						<skuid__messageArea uniqueid="sk-20qU-23023">
							<group>
								<skuid__messageBlock title="Warning" description="A change was made to one or more Data Sources that had stored credentials. The Data Sources may not be changed until the existing credentials are cleared out. " styleSettingsVariant="warningStrong"/>
							</group>
						</skuid__messageArea>
						<skuid__buttonSet uniqueid="sk-20qf-30060" position="left">
							<groups>
								<skuid__buttonGroup>
									<buttons>
										<skuid__button label="Details" uniqueId="sk-20qf-30059">
											<actions>
												<action type="blockUI" window="self" message="Getting job status..."/>
												<action type="setCondition" model="stng__ApexJobStatus" condition="JobId" value="{{{$Model.stng__ClearCredsJob.data.0.Id}}}"/>
												<action type="requeryModels" model="stng__ApexJobStatus" behavior="standard">
													<onerroractions>
														<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error getting job status" timeout="3000"/>
													</onerroractions>
													<models>
														<model>stng__ClearCredsJob</model>
														<model>stng__ApexJobStatus</model>
													</models>
												</action>
												<action type="showModal">
													<skuid__modal title="Data Source Credentials Delete Job Status ({{$Model.stng__ApexJobStatus.data.0.Status}})" width="640px">
														<components>
															<skuid__form showErrorsInline="true" model="stng__ApexJobStatus" uniqueid="sk-20rm-58254" mode="readonly">
																<sections>
																	<section title="Details">
																		<rows>
																			<row>
																				<fields>
																					<skuid__field id="Id"/>
																					<skuid__field id="TotalJobItems"/>
																				</fields>
																			</row>
																			<row>
																				<fields>
																					<skuid__field id="JobItemsProcessed"/>
																					<skuid__field id="Status"/>
																				</fields>
																			</row>
																			<row>
																				<fields>
																					<skuid__field id="CompletedDate"/>
																					<skuid__field id="NumberOfErrors"/>
																				</fields>
																			</row>
																		</rows>
																	</section>
																</sections>
															</skuid__form>
														</components>
														<buttons>
															<skuid__button label="Refresh" uniqueId="sk-20rK-47490" styleSettingsVariant="primary">
																<actions>
																	<action type="blockUI" message="Refreshing..." showPlaceholder="true" styleSettingsVariant="dark"/>
																	<action type="requeryModels" behavior="standard">
																		<models>
																			<model>stng__ClearCredsJob</model>
																			<model>stng__ApexJobStatus</model>
																		</models>
																		<onerroractions>
																			<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000" showPlaceholder="false" styleSettingsVariant="dark"/>
																		</onerroractions>
																	</action>
																	<action type="unblockUI"/>
																</actions>
															</skuid__button>
															<skuid__button label="Close" uniqueId="sk-10IY-11250">
																<actions>
																	<action type="closeAllPopups"/>
																</actions>
															</skuid__button>
														</buttons>
													</skuid__modal>
												</action>
												<action type="unblockUI"/>
											</actions>
										</skuid__button>
									</buttons>
								</skuid__buttonGroup>
							</groups>
							<styles>
								<spacing top="1.5"/>
							</styles>
						</skuid__buttonSet>
					</components>
					<background/>
					<styles>
						<spacing top="5"/>
					</styles>
					<renderConditions logictype="and">
						<renderCondition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="stng__ClearCredsJob" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="skipandnorender" field="CompletedDate" fieldtargetobjects="AsyncApexJob" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
					</renderConditions>
					<styleVariantConditions/>
				</skuid__wrapper>
				<skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-1yx3-20665" styleSettingsVariant="7d5572d7-ec59-43f0-9d03-5259d1980637">
					<components>
						<skuid__buttonSet uniqueid="sk-1yxv-36732" position="left" model="stng__EncryptionSettings">
							<groups>
								<skuid__buttonGroup displayType="detached">
									<buttons>
										<skuid__button label="Generate New" uniqueid="button-generate-encryption-key">
											<actions>
												<action type="showModal">
													<skuid__modal title="Warning" width="640px">
														<components>
															<skuid__messageArea uniqueid="sk-20mt-37967">
																<group>
																	<skuid__messageBlock title="Are you sure?" description="Changing this value may result in downtime for Data Sources with encrypted values. The reason for this is that we have to decrypt and re-encrypt every SkuidCrypted value in your Org when this key is changed. This requires a batch process to run to completion, and until it finishes, some of your values will be encrypted with the new key and others will be encrypted with the old one." styleSettingsVariant="warningStrong"/>
																</group>
															</skuid__messageArea>
														</components>
														<buttons>
															<skuid__button label="Generate New" uniqueid="button-generate-encryption-key-confirm" styleSettingsVariant="primary">
																<actions>
																	<action type="blockUI" message="Generating new key..." styleSettingsVariant="dark" showPlaceholder="true"/>
																	<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.crypt.generateKey">
																		<onerroractions>
																			<action type="blockUI" message="Error generating the new key" timeout="3000" styleSettingsVariant="dark"/>
																		</onerroractions>
																	</action>
																	<action type="save" rollbackonanyerror="false">
																		<models>
																			<model>stng__EncryptionSettings</model>
																		</models>
																		<onerroractions>
																			<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000"/>
																		</onerroractions>
																	</action>
																	<action type="closeAllPopups"/>
																	<action type="unblockUI"/>
																	<action type="showToast" duration="4" styleSettingsVariant="default" message="Encryption key generated successfully"/>
																</actions>
															</skuid__button>
															<skuid__button label="Cancel" uniqueId="sk-20my-42295">
																<actions>
																	<action type="closeAllPopups"/>
																	<action type="unblockUI"/>
																</actions>
															</skuid__button>
														</buttons>
													</skuid__modal>
												</action>
											</actions>
											<enableconditions logictype="and">
												<condition type="blank" operator="=" fieldmodel="stng__EncryptionSettings" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__JobId__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
											</enableconditions>
											<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
											<styleVariantConditions/>
										</skuid__button>
									</buttons>
								</skuid__buttonGroup>
							</groups>
							<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
							<styleVariantConditions/>
							<styles>
								<spacing bottom="4"/>
							</styles>
						</skuid__buttonSet>
						<skuid__form showErrorsInline="true" model="stng__EncryptionSettings" uniqueid="sk-1yxM-23295" mode="read">
							<sections>
								<section title="New Section" showHeading="false">
									<rows>
										<row>
											<fields>
												<skuid__field id="skuid__Key__c" displayAs="PASSWORD"/>
											</fields>
										</row>
										<row>
											<fields>
												<skuid__field type="COMBO" label="Last Modified" template="{{#LastModifiedById}}{{LastModifiedBy.Name}} ({{LastModifiedDate}}){{/LastModifiedById}}" readOnly="true" redirectType="none"/>
											</fields>
										</row>
									</rows>
								</section>
							</sections>
						</skuid__form>
						<skuid__buttonSet uniqueid="sk--rx-10624" position="left" model="stng__EncryptionSettings">
							<groups>
								<skuid__buttonGroup displayType="detached">
									<buttons>
										<skuid__button label="Save" uniqueId="sk--rx-10623" styleSettingsVariant="primary">
											<actions>
												<action type="save" rollbackonanyerror="false">
													<models>
														<model>stng__EncryptionSettings</model>
													</models>
													<onerroractions>
														<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000"/>
													</onerroractions>
												</action>
											</actions>
											<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
											<enableConditions logictype="and">
												<condition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="stng__EncryptionSettings" sourcetype="modelproperty" sourceproperty="hasChanged" value="true" operator="="/>
												<condition type="blank" operator="=" fieldmodel="stng__EncryptionSettings" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="skuid__JobId__c" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Encryption_Settings__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
											</enableConditions>
											<styleVariantConditions/>
										</skuid__button>
										<skuid__button label="Cancel" uniqueId="sk--ry-11731">
											<actions>
												<action type="cancel">
													<models>
														<model>stng__EncryptionSettings</model>
													</models>
												</action>
											</actions>
											<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
											<enableConditions logictype="and">
												<condition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="stng__EncryptionSettings" sourcetype="modelproperty" sourceproperty="hasChanged" value="true" operator="="/>
												<condition type="blank" operator="=" fieldmodel="stng__EncryptionSettings" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__JobId__c" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Encryption_Settings__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
											</enableConditions>
											<styleVariantConditions/>
										</skuid__button>
									</buttons>
								</skuid__buttonGroup>
							</groups>
							<styles>
								<spacing top="3"/>
							</styles>
						</skuid__buttonSet>
					</components>
					<styles>
						<spacing top="4" bottom="4" styleSettingsVariant="7d5572d7-ec59-43f0-9d03-5259d1980637"/>
					</styles>
					<background/>
				</skuid__wrapper>
			</components>
			<styles>
				<spacing/>
			</styles>
			<background/>
		</skuid__wrapper>
	</components>
	<resources>

	</resources>
</skuid__page>

name: Settings_FeatureFlags
content:
<skuid__page unsavedchangeswarning="yes" personalizationmode="server" showsidebar="true" showheader="true" theme="Skuid App">
	<models>
		<model id="BooleanFeatures" query="true" limit="500" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true" label="Feature Flag" labelplural="Feature Flags" sobject="skuid__Feature_Flag__c">
			<fields>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="skuid__Enabled__c"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedById"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedBy.Name"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Type__c" value="Boolean"/>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" field="Name" value="ActiveDataSources" operator="does not contain"/>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="true" enclosevalueinquotes="false" field="skuid__Visible__c"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="IntegerFeatures" query="true" limit="500" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true" label="Feature Flag" labelplural="Feature Flags" sobject="skuid__Feature_Flag__c">
			<fields>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="skuid__Enabled__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Value__c"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedById"/>
				<field id="LastModifiedBy.Name"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Type__c" value="Integer"/>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" field="Name" value="ActiveDataSources" operator="does not contain"/>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="true" enclosevalueinquotes="false" field="skuid__Visible__c"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
	</models>
	<components>
		<skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-2WHY-2143">
			<components>
				<skuid__header title="Boolean Features" uniqueid="sk-2WIR-7103" styleSettingsVariant="70409424-111e-4b10-8161-83f94804d8c6">
					<styles>
						<spacing bottom="4" styleSettingsVariant="70409424-111e-4b10-8161-83f94804d8c6"/>
					</styles>
				</skuid__header>
				<skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-2WIV-7861" styleSettingsVariant="7d5572d7-ec59-43f0-9d03-5259d1980637">
					<components>
						<skuid__table model="BooleanFeatures" uniqueid="sk-2WMf-17270" mode="edit" pageSize="25" showSaveCancel="false" enableDrawers="false" styleSettingsVariant="a46a5155-e777-48c8-a2b4-81eca4e5cb20" adaptiveColumns="true">
							<fields>
								<field id="Name" uniqueid="fi-NNd-44508" readOnly="true" redirectType="none"/>
								<field id="skuid__Enabled__c" uniqueid="fi-NNd-44509"/>
								<field type="COMBO" label="Last Modified" template="{{{LastModifiedBy.Name}}} ({{LastModifiedDate}})" uniqueid="fi-NNd-44510" readOnly="true" redirectType="none"/>
							</fields>
							<filtering enableSearch="true" instantSearch="false" searchMethod="client" emptySearchBehavior="query"/>
							<rowActions/>
							<massActions/>
							<drawer>
								<components/>
							</drawer>
							<actions/>
						</skuid__table>
						<skuid__buttonSet uniqueid="sk-2Wr3-23052" model="BooleanFeatures" position="left">
							<groups>
								<skuid__buttonGroup displayType="detached">
									<buttons>
										<skuid__button label="Save" uniqueId="sk-2Wr3-23053" styleSettingsVariant="primary">

name: Settings_OrgPreferences
content:

						<entry value="right" label="Right"/>
						<entry value="bottomright" label="Bottom Right"/>
						<entry value="bottomleft" label="Bottom Left"/>
						<entry value="left" label="Left"/>

Enter the name of a Static Resource that has an “image” MIME type. Include your org’s namespace (if it has one)."/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="userinfo" value="" field="SetupOwnerId" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" userinfotype="organizationid"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>

			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>

				<skuid__header title="Cache Management" uniqueid="sk-10nW-2140" styleSettingsVariant="70409424-111e-4b10-8161-83f94804d8c6">
					<styles>
						<spacing top="5" bottom="4"/>
					</styles>
				</skuid__header>
				<skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-10nX-2429" styleSettingsVariant="7d5572d7-ec59-43f0-9d03-5259d1980637">
					<components>
						<skuid__text contents="In Skuid API Version V2 Pages running in Visualforce, you may need to use these buttons to get Skuid to pick up on changes to certain Salesforce metadata for which Skuid is not able to automatically check to see if there have been changes.<br />
<br />
If you are using Custom Labels or Translation Workbench, and you modify a label or translation, Visualforce users will not see the label / translation change reflected until the second time they visit a page that requests the label. To force users to immediately get the modified label / translation change, click <b>Invalidate Custom Labels / Translations Cache</b> to force Skuid to go refetch all labels and translations.<br />
<br />
If you have modified Organization-wide settings, such as your Company Name, you will need to click <b>Invalidate Organization Settings Cache</b> to get Skuid to pick up on the latest changes." uniqueid="sk-10nV-1870"/>
						<skuid__buttonSet uniqueid="sk-10nd-3179" position="left">
							<groups>
								<skuid__buttonGroup displayType="detached">
									<buttons>
										<skuid__button label="Invalidate Custom Labels/Translations Cache" uniqueId="sk-10nd-3178">
											<actions>
												<action type="publish" scope="skuid" event="invalidateLoaderServiceCache">
													<params>
														<param name="loaderServiceName" value="labelsService"/>
													</params>
												</action>
												<action type="showToast" duration="4" message="Labels/Translations cache successfully invalidated."/>
											</actions>
										</skuid__button>
										<skuid__button label="Invalidate Organization Settings Cache" uniqueId="sk-10ns-6181">
											<actions>
												<action type="publish" scope="skuid" event="invalidateLoaderServiceCache">
													<params>
														<param name="loaderServiceName" value="settingsService"/>
													</params>
												</action>
												<action type="showToast" duration="4" message="Organization Settings cache successfully invalidated."/>
											</actions>
										</skuid__button>
									</buttons>
								</skuid__buttonGroup>
							</groups>
							<styles>
								<spacing top="2"/>
							</styles>
						</skuid__buttonSet>
					</components>
					<styles>
						<spacing bottom="5"/>
					</styles>
					<background/>
				</skuid__wrapper>
			</components>
			<styles>
				<spacing/>
			</styles>
			<background/>
		</skuid__wrapper>
	</components>
	<resources>
		<labels/>
		<javascript>
			<jsitem location="staticresource" name="next" filepath="js/skuidPages/skuidSettings.js" cachelocation="false" namespace="skuid"/>
		</javascript>
		<actionsequences/>
	</resources>
	</skuid__page>

name: Settings_Subscriptions
content:
<skuid__page unsavedchangeswarning="yes" personalizationmode="server" showsidebar="false" showheader="false" theme="Skuid App">
	<models>
		<model id="stng__Profiles" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="PermissionSet" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true">
			<fields>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="ProfileId"/>
				<field id="Profile.Name"/>
				<field id="IsOwnedByProfile"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="true" enclosevalueinquotes="false" field="IsOwnedByProfile"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions>
			</actions>
		</model>
		<model id="stng__Packages" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="PackageLicense" doclone="" type="" orderby="NamespacePrefix" datasourcetype="" datasource="salesforce">
			<fields>
				<field id="NamespacePrefix"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="multiple" value="" field="Status" operator="in" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
					<values>
						<value>Active</value>
						<value>Trial</value>
					</values>
				</condition>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="1" enclosevalueinquotes="false" field="AllowedLicenses" operator="gte"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="stng__AllPermissionSets" limit="" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="PermissionSet" doclone="" orderby="Label" datasource="salesforce">
			<fields>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="NamespacePrefix"/>
				<field id="Label"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="false" enclosevalueinquotes="false" field="IsOwnedByProfile"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="stng__OrgPreferences" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" sobject="skuid__Preferences__c" datasource="salesforce">
			<fields>
				<field id="SetupOwnerId"/>
				<field id="SetupOwner.Name"/>
				<field id="skuid__Default_Builder_Theme__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="Composer Light"/>
				<field id="skuid__Default_Theme__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="Modern"/>
				<field id="skuid__Default_Mobile_Builder_Theme__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="MobileClassic"/>
				<field id="skuid__Default_Mobile_Theme__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="MobileClassic"/>
				<field id="skuid__Auto_Assign_Licenses_on_Activation__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Auto_Assign_Perm_Sets_on_Activation__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Auto_Revoke_Licenses_on_Deactivation__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Auto_Revoke_Perm_Sets_on_Deactivation__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Package_Names_For_Auto_Assignment__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXTAREA" displaytype="MULTIPICKLIST" picklistsource="rowsinmodel" returntype="TEXT" picklistmodel="stng__Packages" entryvalue="{{NamespacePrefix}}" entrylabel="{{NamespacePrefix}}" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue"/>
				<field id="skuid__Package_Names_For_Auto_Revocation__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXTAREA" displaytype="MULTIPICKLIST" picklistsource="rowsinmodel" returntype="TEXT" picklistmodel="stng__Packages" entryvalue="{{NamespacePrefix}}" entrylabel="{{NamespacePrefix}}"/>
				<field id="skuid__Perm_Sets_For_Auto_Assignment__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXTAREA" displaytype="MULTIPICKLIST" picklistsource="rowsinmodel" returntype="TEXT" picklistmodel="stng__AllPermissionSets" entryvalue="{{#NamespacePrefix}}{{NamespacePrefix}}__{{/NamespacePrefix}}{{Name}}" entrylabel="{{Label}}{{#NamespacePrefix}} ({{NamespacePrefix}}){{/NamespacePrefix}}" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue"/>
				<field id="skuid__Perm_Sets_For_Auto_Revocation__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXTAREA" displaytype="MULTIPICKLIST" picklistsource="rowsinmodel" returntype="TEXT" picklistmodel="stng__AllPermissionSets" entryvalue="{{#NamespacePrefix}}{{NamespacePrefix}}__{{/NamespacePrefix}}{{Name}}" entrylabel="{{Label}}{{#NamespacePrefix}} ({{NamespacePrefix}}){{/NamespacePrefix}}" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="userinfo" value="" field="SetupOwnerId" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" userinfotype="organizationid"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="stng__SkuidPermissionSets" limit="3" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="PermissionSet" doclone="" type="" orderby="Name" datasourcetype="" datasource="salesforce">
			<fields>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="Id"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="skuid" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="NamespacePrefix"/>
				<condition type="multiple" value="" field="Name" operator="in" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
					<values>
						<value>Skuid_Page_Builder</value>
						<value>Skuid_Page_Viewer</value>
						<value>Skuid_Admin</value>
					</values>
				</condition>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="stng__UserOrProfilePrefs" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Preferences__c" doclone="" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true" async="true">
			<fields>
				<field id="SetupOwnerId" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="REFERENCE" displaytype="REFERENCE" datasource="salesforce" label="Profile"/>
				<field id="SetupOwner.Name"/>
				<field id="skuid__Default_Builder_Theme__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="Composer Light"/>
				<field id="skuid__Default_Theme__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="Modern"/>
				<field id="skuid__Default_Mobile_Builder_Theme__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="MobileClassic"/>
				<field id="skuid__Default_Mobile_Theme__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="MobileClassic"/>
				<field id="skuid__Auto_Assign_Licenses_on_Activation__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="BOOLEAN" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Assign Licenses on Activation"/>
				<field id="skuid__Auto_Assign_Perm_Sets_on_Activation__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="BOOLEAN" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Assign Perm Sets on Activation"/>
				<field id="skuid__Auto_Revoke_Licenses_on_Deactivation__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="BOOLEAN" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Revoke Licenses on Deactivation"/>
				<field id="skuid__Auto_Revoke_Perm_Sets_on_Deactivation__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="BOOLEAN" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Revoke Perm Sets on Deactivation"/>
				<field id="skuid__Package_Names_For_Auto_Assignment__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXTAREA" displaytype="MULTIPICKLIST" picklistsource="rowsinmodel" returntype="TEXT" picklistmodel="stng__Packages" entryvalue="{{NamespacePrefix}}" entrylabel="{{NamespacePrefix}}" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue"/>
				<field id="skuid__Package_Names_For_Auto_Revocation__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXTAREA" displaytype="MULTIPICKLIST" picklistsource="rowsinmodel" returntype="TEXT" picklistmodel="stng__Packages" entryvalue="{{NamespacePrefix}}" entrylabel="{{NamespacePrefix}}"/>
				<field id="skuid__Perm_Sets_For_Auto_Assignment__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXTAREA" displaytype="MULTIPICKLIST" picklistsource="rowsinmodel" returntype="TEXT" picklistmodel="stng__AllPermissionSets" entryvalue="{{#NamespacePrefix}}{{NamespacePrefix}}__{{/NamespacePrefix}}{{Name}}" entrylabel="{{Label}}{{#NamespacePrefix}} ({{NamespacePrefix}}){{/NamespacePrefix}}" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue"/>
				<field id="skuid__Perm_Sets_For_Auto_Revocation__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXTAREA" displaytype="MULTIPICKLIST" picklistsource="rowsinmodel" returntype="TEXT" picklistmodel="stng__AllPermissionSets" entryvalue="{{#NamespacePrefix}}{{NamespacePrefix}}__{{/NamespacePrefix}}{{Name}}" entrylabel="{{Label}}{{#NamespacePrefix}} ({{NamespacePrefix}}){{/NamespacePrefix}}" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue"/>
				<field id="Profile_ui" uionly="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" length="255" label="Profile" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="rowsinmodel" returntype="TEXT" picklistmodel="stng__Profiles" entryvalue="{{ProfileId}}" entrylabel="{{#Profile.Name}}{{Profile.Name}}{{/Profile.Name}}{{^Profile.Name}}{{Name}}{{/Profile.Name}}"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="userinfo" value="" field="SetupOwnerId" operator="!=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" userinfotype="organizationid"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.settings.copyPrefsFromOrgDefault"/>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.created</event>
					</events>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__UserOrProfilePrefs" affectedrows="context">
							<updates>
								<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="SetupOwnerId" fieldtargetobjects="Profile" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{Profile_ui}}"/>
							</updates>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>Profile_ui</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
			</actions>
		</model>
		<model id="stng__SkuidPackageLicense" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="PackageLicense" doclone="" type="" orderby="" datasourcetype="" datasource="salesforce">
			<fields>
				<field id="NamespacePrefix"/>
				<field id="Id"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="skuid" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="NamespacePrefix"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
	</models>
	<components>
		<skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-2WHY-2143">
			<components>
				<skuid__header title="User Licensing / Permissions" uniqueid="sk-2WHZ-2466" styleSettingsVariant="70409424-111e-4b10-8161-83f94804d8c6">
					<styles>
						<spacing bottom="4"/>
					</styles>
				</skuid__header>
				<skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-2WHl-3807" styleSettingsVariant="7d5572d7-ec59-43f0-9d03-5259d1980637">
					<components>
						<skuid__text contents="To manually assign Skuid Licenses or Permission Sets to current Users, click one of these links:" uniqueid="sk-2WJ4-5117" styleSettingsVariant="4e169d0d-def8-4adb-9bb5-baca37505057">
							<styles>
								<spacing bottom="1"/>
							</styles>
						</skuid__text>
						<skuid__text contents="
<ol class="manual-license-actions">
{{#$Model.stng__SkuidPackageLicense.data.length}}
<li><a href="/ui/setup/mfpackage/UserLicenses/d?allPackageId=033G00000006Shv&packageLicenseId={{{$Model.stng__SkuidPackageLicense.data.0.Id}}}" target="_blank">Assign / remove user <b>Licenses</b> to Skuid</a> (needed for anyone who will be using Skuid in any way)</li>
{{/$Model.stng__SkuidPackageLicense.data.length}}
<li><a href="/005?id={{{$Model.stng__SkuidPermissionSets.data.2.Id}}}" target="_blank">Assign users the <b>Skuid Page Viewer</b> Permission Set</a> (needed for anyone who will be using Skuid in any way)</li>
<li><a href="/005?id={{{$Model.stng__SkuidPermissionSets.data.1.Id}}}" target="_blank">Assign users the <b>Skuid Page Builder</b> Permission Set</a> (needed for all users who will be creating / editing Skuid Pages)</li>
<li><a href="/005?id={{{$Model.stng__SkuidPermissionSets.data.0.Id}}}" target="_blank">Assign users the <b>Skuid Admin</b> Permission Set</a> (needed to manage Skuid Settings and deploy Pages using Page Assignments )</li>
</ol>
</div>" uniqueid="sk-2WI0-4850">
							<styles>
								<spacing/>
							</styles>
						</skuid__text>
					</components>
					<background/>
					<styles>
						<spacing/>
					</styles>
				</skuid__wrapper>
				<skuid__header title="Org Defaults" uniqueid="sk-2WI6-5257" styleSettingsVariant="70409424-111e-4b10-8161-83f94804d8c6">
					<styles>
						<spacing top="5" bottom="4" styleSettingsVariant="70409424-111e-4b10-8161-83f94804d8c6"/>
					</styles>
				</skuid__header>
				<skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-2WIO-6402" styleSettingsVariant="7d5572d7-ec59-43f0-9d03-5259d1980637">
					<components>
						<skuid__grid uniqueid="sk-2WML-12217" flexDirection="row" justifyContent="flex-start" alignItems="flex-start">
							<divisions>
								<division minWidth="100px" ratio="1" alignSelf="auto" maxWidth="600px">
									<components>
										<skuid__form showErrorsInline="true" model="stng__OrgPreferences" uniqueid="sk-2WLr-8565" mode="edit">
											<sections>
												<section title="Package Licenses">
													<rows>
														<row>
															<fields>
																<skuid__field id="skuid__Auto_Assign_Licenses_on_Activation__c" displayAs="SWITCH"/>
															</fields>
														</row>
														<row>
															<fields>
																<skuid__field id="skuid__Package_Names_For_Auto_Assignment__c"/>
															</fields>
														</row>
														<row>
															<fields>
																<skuid__field id="skuid__Auto_Revoke_Licenses_on_Deactivation__c" displayAs="SWITCH"/>
															</fields>
														</row>
														<row>
															<fields>
																<skuid__field id="skuid__Package_Names_For_Auto_Revocation__c"/>
															</fields>
														</row>
													</rows>
												</section>
												<section title="Permission Sets">
													<rows>
														<row>
															<fields>
																<skuid__field id="skuid__Auto_Assign_Perm_Sets_on_Activation__c" displayAs="SWITCH"/>
															</fields>
														</row>
														<row>
															<fields>
																<skuid__field id="skuid__Perm_Sets_For_Auto_Assignment__c"/>
															</fields>
														</row>
														<row>
															<fields>
																<skuid__field id="skuid__Auto_Revoke_Perm_Sets_on_Deactivation__c" displayAs="SWITCH"/>
															</fields>
														</row>
														<row>
															<fields>
																<skuid__field id="skuid__Perm_Sets_For_Auto_Revocation__c"/>
															</fields>
														</row>
													</rows>
												</section>
											</sections>
										</skuid__form>
										<skuid__buttonSet uniqueid="sk-2Wpa-8381" model="stng__OrgPreferences" position="left">
											<groups>
												<skuid__buttonGroup displayType="detached">
													<buttons>
														<skuid__button label="Save" uniqueId="sk-2Wpa-8380" styleSettingsVariant="primary">
															<actions>
																<action type="save">
																	<models>
																		<model>stng__OrgPreferences</model>
																	</models>
																	<onerroractions>
																		<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000"/>
																	</onerroractions>
																</action>
															</actions>
															<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
															<enableConditions logictype="and">
																<condition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="stng__OrgPreferences" sourcetype="modelproperty" sourceproperty="hasChanged" value="true" operator="="/>
															</enableConditions>
															<styleVariantConditions/>
															<hotkeys/>
														</skuid__button>
														<skuid__button label="Cancel" uniqueId="sk-2Wph-9594">
															<actions>
																<action type="cancel">
																	<models>
																		<model>stng__OrgPreferences</model>
																	</models>
																</action>
															</actions>
															<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
															<enableConditions logictype="and">
																<condition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="stng__OrgPreferences" sourcetype="modelproperty" sourceproperty="hasChanged" value="true" operator="="/>
															</enableConditions>
															<styleVariantConditions/>
														</skuid__button>
													</buttons>
												</skuid__buttonGroup>
											</groups>
											<styles>
												<spacing top="2"/>
											</styles>
										</skuid__buttonSet>
									</components>
								</division>
								<division alignSelf="auto" minWidth="100px" ratio="1">
									<components/>
								</division>
							</divisions>
						</skuid__grid>
					</components>
					<background/>
					<styles>
						<spacing/>
					</styles>
				</skuid__wrapper>
				<skuid__header title="Profile-specific Settings" uniqueid="sk-2WIR-7103" styleSettingsVariant="70409424-111e-4b10-8161-83f94804d8c6">
					<styles>
						<spacing top="5" bottom="4" styleSettingsVariant="70409424-111e-4b10-8161-83f94804d8c6"/>
					</styles>
				</skuid__header>
				<skuid__wrapper uniqueid="sk-2WIV-7861" styleSettingsVariant="7d5572d7-ec59-43f0-9d03-5259d1980637">
					<components>
						<skuid__table model="stng__UserOrProfilePrefs" uniqueid="sk-2WMf-17270" mode="readonly" pageSize="50" showSaveCancel="false" enableDrawers="false" styleSettingsVariant="a46a5155-e777-48c8-a2b4-81eca4e5cb20">
							<fields>
								<field id="SetupOwnerId" uniqueid="fi-2WpN-7606" pageSize="5" redirectType="none" label="Profile"/>
								<field type="COMBO" label="Auto assign on activation" template="Licenses: {{#skuid__Auto_Assign_Licenses_on_Activation__c}}Yes{{/skuid__Auto_Assign_Licenses_on_Activation__c}}{{^skuid__Auto_Assign_Licenses_on_Activation__c}}No{{/skuid__Auto_Assign_Licenses_on_Activation__c}}   •   Permission Sets: {{#skuid__Auto_Assign_Perm_Sets_on_Activation__c}}Yes{{/skuid__Auto_Assign_Perm_Sets_on_Activation__c}}{{^skuid__Auto_Assign_Perm_Sets_on_Activation__c}}No{{/skuid__Auto_Assign_Perm_Sets_on_Activation__c}}" readOnly="true" uniqueid="fi-1a4E-19006" redirectType="none"/>
								<field type="COMBO" label="Auto revoke on de-activation" template="Licenses: {{#skuid__Auto_Revoke_Licenses_on_Deactivation__c}}Yes{{/skuid__Auto_Revoke_Licenses_on_Deactivation__c}}{{^skuid__Auto_Revoke_Licenses_on_Deactivation__c}}No{{/skuid__Auto_Revoke_Licenses_on_Deactivation__c}}   •   Permission Sets: {{#skuid__Auto_Revoke_Perm_Sets_on_Deactivation__c}}Yes{{/skuid__Auto_Revoke_Perm_Sets_on_Deactivation__c}}{{^skuid__Auto_Revoke_Perm_Sets_on_Deactivation__c}}No{{/skuid__Auto_Revoke_Perm_Sets_on_Deactivation__c}}" redirectType="none" readOnly="true"/>
							</fields>
							<filtering enableSearch="false" instantSearch="false"/>
							<rowActions>
								<action type="multi" icon="sk-webicon-ink:dots-vertical">
									<actions>
										<action type="toggleMenu">
											<optionGroups>
												<optionGroup>
													<options>
														<option label="Edit">
															<actions>
																<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="stng__UserOrProfilePrefs" affectedrows="context">
																	<updates>
																		<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Profile_ui" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{SetupOwnerId}}"/>
																	</updates>
																</action>
																<action type="save" rollbackonanyerror="true">
																	<models>
																		<model>stng__UserOrProfilePrefs</model>
																	</models>
																</action>
																<action type="showModal">
																	<skuid__modal title="Edit Profile-specific Setting" width="640px">
																		<components>
																			<skuid__form showErrorsInline="true" model="stng__UserOrProfilePrefs" uniqueid="sk-1UXm-20214" mode="edit">
																				<sections>
																					<section title="General" showHeading="true">
																						<rows>
																							<row>
																								<fields>
																									<skuid__field id="Profile_ui"/>
																								</fields>
																							</row>
																							<row>
																								<fields>
																									<skuid__field id="skuid__Auto_Assign_Licenses_on_Activation__c" displayAs="SWITCH"/>
																									<skuid__field id="skuid__Auto_Assign_Perm_Sets_on_Activation__c" displayAs="SWITCH"/>
																								</fields>
																							</row>
																							<row>
																								<fields>
																									<skuid__field id="skuid__Auto_Revoke_Licenses_on_Deactivation__c" displayAs="SWITCH"/>
																									<skuid__field id="skuid__Auto_Revoke_Perm_Sets_on_Deactivation__c" displayAs="SWITCH"/>
																								</fields>
																							</row>
																						</rows>
																					</section>
																					<section title="Package Licensing">
																						<rows>
																							<row>
																								<fields>
																									<skuid__field id="skuid__Package_Names_For_Auto_Assignment__c"/>
																								</fields>
																							</row>
																							<row>
																								<fields>

																				</actions>
																				<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
																				<enableConditions logictype="and">
																					<condition type="fieldvalue" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="stng__UserOrProfilePrefs" sourcetype="modelproperty" sourceproperty="hasChanged" value="true" operator="="/>
																				</enableConditions>
																				<styleVariantConditions/>
																			</skuid__button>

																						</models>

																					<action type="closeAllPopups"/>
																				</actions>
																			</skuid__button>
																		</buttons>

																				<models>

																				</models>
																			</action>
																		</afterCloseActions>
																	</skuid__modal>
																</action>
															</actions>
														</option>
														<option label="Delete">
															<actions>

																<action type="showModal">
																	<skuid__modal title="Delete Profile-specific Setting" width="640px">
																		<components>
																			<skuid__text contents="Are you sure you want to delete this setting?" uniqueid="sk-1UZl-23941"/>
																		</components>
																		<buttons>
																			<skuid__button label="Delete" uniqueId="sk-1UZh-22159" styleSettingsVariant="destructive">
																				<actions>

																						<models>
																							<model>stng__UserOrProfilePrefs</model>
																						</models>
																						<onerroractions>

																						</onerroractions>
																					</action>
																					<action type="closeAllPopups"/>
																				</actions>
																			</skuid__button>
																			<skuid__button label="Cancel" uniqueId="sk-1UZh-22461">
																				<actions>
																					<action type="closeAllPopups"/>
																				</actions>
																			</skuid__button>
																		</buttons>
																		<afterCloseActions>
																			<action type="cancel">
																				<models>

																				</models>
																			</action>
																		</afterCloseActions>
																	</skuid__modal>
																</action>
															</actions>
														</option>
													</options>
												</optionGroup>
											</optionGroups>
										</action>
									</actions>
								</action>
							</rowActions>
							<massActions/>
							<drawer showDrawerIcon="true">
								<components>
									<skuid__form showErrorsInline="true" model="stng__UserOrProfilePrefs" uniqueid="sk-2Wpu-11674" mode="edit">
										<sections>
											<section title="Package Licensing">
												<rows>
													<row>
														<fields>
															<skuid__field id="skuid__Package_Names_For_Auto_Assignment__c"/>
														</fields>
													</row>
													<row>
														<fields>
															<skuid__field id="skuid__Package_Names_For_Auto_Revocation__c"/>
														</fields>
													</row>
												</rows>
											</section>
											<section title="Permission Sets">
												<rows>
													<row>
														<fields>
															<skuid__field id="skuid__Perm_Sets_For_Auto_Assignment__c"/>
														</fields>
													</row>
													<row>
														<fields>
															<skuid__field id="skuid__Perm_Sets_For_Auto_Revocation__c"/>
														</fields>
													</row>
												</rows>
											</section>
										</sections>
										<conditions>
											<condition type="contextrow" field="Id" mergefield="Id" operator="="/>
										</conditions>
									</skuid__form>
								</components>
							</drawer>
							<actions>
								<action type="multi" label="Add">
									<actions>
										<action type="createRow" model="stng__UserOrProfilePrefs" appendorprepend="prepend" defaultmodefornewitems="edit" affectedrows="context"/>
										<action type="showModal">
											<skuid__modal title="Add New Profile-specific Setting" width="640px">
												<components>
													<skuid__form showErrorsInline="true" model="stng__UserOrProfilePrefs" uniqueid="sk-2buv-10436" mode="edit">
														<sections>
															<section title="General" showHeading="true">
																<rows>
																	<row>
																		<fields>
																			<skuid__field id="Profile_ui"/>
																		</fields>
																	</row>
																	<row>
																		<fields>
																			<skuid__field id="skuid__Auto_Assign_Licenses_on_Activation__c" displayAs="SWITCH"/>
																			<skuid__field id="skuid__Auto_Assign_Perm_Sets_on_Activation__c" displayAs="SWITCH"/>
																		</fields>
																	</row>
																	<row>
																		<fields>
																			<skuid__field id="skuid__Auto_Revoke_Licenses_on_Deactivation__c" displayAs="SWITCH"/>
																			<skuid__field id="skuid__Auto_Revoke_Perm_Sets_on_Deactivation__c" displayAs="SWITCH"/>
																		</fields>
																	</row>
																</rows>
															</section>
															<section title="Package Licensing">
																<rows>
																	<row>
																		<fields>
																			<skuid__field id="skuid__Package_Names_For_Auto_Assignment__c"/>
																		</fields>
																	</row>
																	<row>
																		<fields>
																			<skuid__field id="skuid__Package_Names_For_Auto_Revocation__c"/>
																		</fields>
																	</row>
																</rows>
															</section>
															<section title="Permission Sets">
																<rows>
																	<row>
																		<fields>
																			<skuid__field id="skuid__Perm_Sets_For_Auto_Assignment__c"/>
																		</fields>
																	</row>
																	<row>
																		<fields>
																			<skuid__field id="skuid__Perm_Sets_For_Auto_Revocation__c"/>
																		</fields>
																	</row>
																</rows>
															</section>
														</sections>
													</skuid__form>
												</components>
												<buttons>
													<skuid__button label="Add" uniqueId="sk-2bvU-12973" styleSettingsVariant="primary">
														<actions>
															<action type="blockUI" styleSettingsVariant="dark" message="Saving.."/>
															<action type="save">
																<models>
																	<model>stng__UserOrProfilePrefs</model>
																</models>
																<onerroractions>
																	<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error" timeout="3000"/>
																</onerroractions>
															</action>
															<action type="closeAllPopups"/>
															<action type="unblockUI"/>
															<action type="showToast" duration="4" styleSettingsVariant="default" message="Profile-specific setting added"/>
														</actions>
													</skuid__button>
													<skuid__button label="Cancel" uniqueId="sk-2bvV-13087">
														<actions>
															<action type="cancel">
																<models>
																	<model>stng__UserOrProfilePrefs</model>
																</models>
															</action>
															<action type="closeAllPopups"/>
														</actions>
													</skuid__button>
												</buttons>
												<afterCloseActions>
													<action type="cancel">
														<models>
															<model>stng__UserOrProfilePrefs</model>
														</models>
													</action>
												</afterCloseActions>
											</skuid__modal>
										</action>
									</actions>
								</action>
							</actions>
							<styles>
								<spacing/>
							</styles>
						</skuid__table>
					</components>
					<background/>
					<styles>
						<spacing/>
					</styles>
				</skuid__wrapper>
			</components>
			<styles>
				<spacing bottom="5"/>
			</styles>
			<background/>
		</skuid__wrapper>
	</components>
	<resources>
		<labels/>

		<actionsequences/>
	</resources>
	<styles>
		<styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
	</styles>
	<interactions/>
</skuid__page>

name: SkuidCentral
content:
<skuid__page showsidebar="true" showheader="true" theme="Skuid App" unsavedchangeswarning="yes" personalizationmode="server" hideeditbutton="true">
	<models>
		<model id="help_uionly" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="Ui-Only">
			<fields>
				<field id="search" displaytype="TEXT" placeholder="Search by topic, keyword, or phrase (eg. Action Framework, Model, REST)" ogdisplaytype="TEXT"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions/>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="userPreferences" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" sobject="skuid__Preferences__c">
			<fields>
				<field id="skuid__New_Skuid_User__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Default_Builder_Theme__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Default_Mobile_Builder_Theme__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Default_Mobile_Theme__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Default_Theme__c"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="userinfo" value="" field="SetupOwnerId" fieldtargetobjects="Organization,Profile,User" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" userinfotype="userid"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="pgs__MasterPages" sobject="skuid__Page__c" query="true" limit="" datasource="salesforce" async="true" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false">
			<fields>
				<field id="Id"/>
				<field id="skuid__API_Version__c" overridemetadata="true" ogdisplaytype="STRING" displaytype="PICKLIST" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="v1" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="v1" label="v1"/>
						<entry value="v2" label="v2"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="skuid__Module__c"/>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="skuid__IsMaster__c"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="true" enclosevalueinquotes="false" field="skuid__IsMaster__c" clientorserver="server" operator="="/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="pgs__DataSources" limit="100" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" doclone="" sobject="skuid__Model_Service__c" orderby="Name" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true" async="false">
			<fields>
				<field id="skuid__Adapter_Name__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Active__c"/>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="skuid__URL__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__External_Id__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Authentication_URL__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Use_Apex_Proxy__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Access__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Access_Permission_Name__c"/>
				<field id="Id"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions/>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="pgs__NewPage_DuplicateCheck" limit="" query="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c" datasource="salesforce">
			<fields>
				<field id="Id"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="Name" clientorserver="server" state="filterableoff" inactive="true" name="searchname" operator="="/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="pgs__NewPage" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c" datasource="salesforce" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false" doclone="">
			<fields>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="skuid__Layout__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__MasterPage__c"/>
				<field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.Name"/>
				<field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.skuid__API_Version__c"/>
				<field id="CreatedDate"/>
				<field id="skuid__API_Version__c" overridemetadata="true" label="Skuid API Version" displaytype="PICKLIST" length="255" picklistsource="snippet" snippet="skuid.getPageAPIVersionPicklistEntries" required="true"/>
				<field id="skuid__Initial_State__c" uionly="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" label="Starting point" defaultValue="none" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="none" label="Start with a blank page"/>
						<entry value="masterpage" label="Use a Master Page"/>
						<entry value="from-xml" label="Paste XML from a prebuilt page"/>
						<entry value="from-xml-file" label="Upload XML file"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="skuid__Page_XML__c" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXTAREA" label="Page XML" length="163840"/>
				<field id="ui_controller_apply_master_page" displaytype="MULTIPICKLIST" uionly="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="masterpage" label="Apply master page"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field displaytype="MULTIPICKLIST" id="ui_controller_xml_options" uionly="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="show_xml_options" label="XML options"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="ui_controller_upload_xml" displaytype="PICKLIST" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT" uionly="true">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="import_xml" label="Import XML file"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="ui_controller_paste_xml" displaytype="PICKLIST" uionly="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" picklistsource="manual" returntype="TEXT">
					<picklistentries>
						<entry value="paste_xml" label="Paste XML"/>
					</picklistentries>
				</field>
				<field id="duplicatePageName" displaytype="BOOLEAN" uionly="true" ogdisplaytype="TEXT" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="false"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="fieldvalue" value="<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" personalizationmode="server" showsidebar="true" useviewportmeta="true" showheader="true"><models/><components/><resources><labels/><javascript/><css/></resources></skuidpage>" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Layout__c"/>
			</conditions>
			<actions>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.newPage.writeXMLToPageRecord"/>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>skuid__API_Version__c</field>
						<field>skuid__Initial_State__c</field>
						<field>skuid__MasterPage__c</field>
						<field>skuid__Page_XML__c</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.newPage.reassignDataSources"/>	
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" label="if XML isn't blank" model="pgs__NewPage">
						<formula>!ISBLANK({{skuid__Page_XML__c}})</formula>
						<iftrueactions>
							<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" affectedrows="context">
								<updates>
									<update valuesource="formula" field="skuid__API_Version__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
										<formula>IF(STARTS_WITH({{skuid__Page_XML__c}},"<skuid__page"), "v2","v1")</formula>
									</update>
								</updates>
							</action>
						</iftrueactions>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>skuid__Page_XML__c</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="setCondition" model="pgs__NewPage_DuplicateCheck" condition="searchname" value="{{{Name}}}"/>
						<action type="requeryModel" model="pgs__NewPage_DuplicateCheck" behavior="standard"/>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>Name</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="pgs__NewPage">
							<formula>{{ui_controller_apply_master_page}} === "masterpage"</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" affectedrows="context">
									<updates>
										<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="masterpage"/>
									</updates>
								</action>
							</iftrueactions>
						</action>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" affectedrows="context">
							<updates>
								<update valuesource="blank" field="skuid__MasterPage__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
							</updates>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>ui_controller_apply_master_page</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="pgs__NewPage" label="if master page field isn't blank">
						<formula>!ISBLANK({{skuid__MasterPage__c}})</formula>
						<iftrueactions>
							<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" affectedrows="context">
								<updates>
									<update valuesource="formula" field="skuid__API_Version__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true">
										<formula>MODEL_LOOKUP("pgs__MasterPages","skuid__API_Version__c","Id",{{skuid__MasterPage__c}})</formula>
									</update>
								</updates>
							</action>
						</iftrueactions>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>skuid__MasterPage__c</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="pgs__NewPage">
							<formula>{{ui_controller_paste_xml}} === "paste_xml"</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" affectedrows="context">
									<updates>
										<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="from-xml"/>
										<update valuesource="blank" field="ui_controller_upload_xml" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="import_xml"/>
									</updates>
								</action>
							</iftrueactions>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>ui_controller_paste_xml</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="pgs__NewPage">
							<formula>{{ui_controller_upload_xml}} === "import_xml"</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" affectedrows="context">
									<updates>
										<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="from-xml-file"/>
										<update valuesource="blank" field="ui_controller_paste_xml" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="paste_xml"/>
									</updates>
								</action>
							</iftrueactions>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>ui_controller_upload_xml</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="branch" whenfinished="stop" model="pgs__NewPage">
							<formula>{{ui_controller_xml_options}} === "show_xml_options"</formula>
							<iftrueactions>
								<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" affectedrows="context">
									<updates>
										<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="from-xml-file"/>
										<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="ui_controller_upload_xml" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="import_xml"/>
									</updates>
								</action>
							</iftrueactions>
						</action>
						<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" affectedrows="context">
							<updates>
								<update valuesource="blank" field="ui_controller_upload_xml" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="masterpage"/>
								<update valuesource="blank" field="ui_controller_paste_xml" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="import_xml"/>
								<update valuesource="blank" field="skuid__Page_XML__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
							</updates>
						</action>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>ui_controller_xml_options</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
				<action>
					<actions>
						<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.core.snippets.newPageRenderStartingPoint"/>
					</actions>
					<events>
						<event>row.updated</event>
					</events>
					<fields>
						<field>skuid__API_Version__c</field>
						<field>skuid__Type__c</field>
					</fields>
				</action>
			</actions>
		</model>
		<model id="orgPreferences" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" sobject="skuid__Preferences__c">
			<fields>

											<formula>NOT(ISBLANK({{skuid__Page_XML__c}}))</formula>
											<iftrueactions>
												<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.newPage.modifyXMLBeforeSave"/>
											</iftrueactions>
										</action>
										<action type="save">
											<models>
												<model>pgs__NewPage</model>
											</models>
											<onerroractions>
												<action type="blockUI" message="There was an error creating your page" timeout="3000" styleSettingsVariant="dark"/>
											</onerroractions>
										</action>
										<action type="redirect" url="/apex/skuid__PageBuilder?id={{{$Model.pgs__NewPage.data.0.Id}}}" window="blank"/>
										<action type="closeAllPopups"/>
										<action type="unblockUI"/>
									</actions>
									<renderConditions logictype="and"/>
									<enableConditions logictype="and">
										<condition fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage_DuplicateCheck" sourcetype="modelproperty" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceproperty="hasNoRows"/>
										<condition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="Name" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
										<condition type="blank" operator="!=" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="skuid__API_Version__c" value="null" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
									</enableConditions>
									<tooltip position="right" text="Create page and go to Page Composer" compact="true"/>
									<hotkeys/>
									<styleVariantConditions/>
								</skuid__button>
								<skuid__button label="Cancel" uniqueid="button-cancel-new-page">
									<actions>
										<action type="closeAllPopups"/>
									</actions>
								</skuid__button>
							</buttons>
							<afterCloseActions>
								<action type="cancel">
									<models>
										<model>pgs__NewPage</model>
									</models>
								</action>
							</afterCloseActions>
						</skuid__modal>
					</action>
				</actions>
				<description>This creates a popup wizard for a new page</description>
				<inputs/>
			</actionsequence>
			<actionsequence id="7ca5a008-4fd3-4c54-9fa3-11315a3f7f04" label="CreateNewV2PageWithTourParam" type="reusable">
				<description/>
				<actions>
					<action type="emptyModelData">
						<models>
							<model>tour_Pages</model>
						</models>
					</action>
					<action type="action-sequence" action-sequence-id="488f9d0f-2c3a-4844-93ed-2d836871db63"/>
					<action type="branch" whenfinished="continue">
						<formula>{{$Model.pgs__NewPage_DuplicateCheck.data.length}}>0</formula>
						<iftrueactions>
							<action type="showToast" duration="4" message="Already started the tour?  We need to start again from the beginning..." clickToDismiss="true" styleSettingsVariant="default"/>
							<action type="action-sequence" action-sequence-id="9f5c7ef6-3e11-402b-85d1-5f1a592420d8"/>
							<action type="action-sequence" action-sequence-id="488f9d0f-2c3a-4844-93ed-2d836871db63"/>
						</iftrueactions>
					</action>
					<action type="save">
						<models>
							<model>tour_Pages</model>
						</models>
						<onerroractions>
						</onerroractions>
					</action>
					<action type="showToast" duration="4" styleSettingsVariant="default" message="Loading tour..."/>
					<action type="redirect" window="self" url="/apex/skuid__PageBuilder?id={{{$Model.tour_Pages.data.0.Id}}}&tour=overview-intro"/>
				</actions>
			</actionsequence>
			<actionsequence id="9f5c7ef6-3e11-402b-85d1-5f1a592420d8" label="Delete existing tour page" type="reusable">
				<description/>
				<actions>
					<action type="emptyModelData">
						<models>
							<model>tour_Pages</model>
						</models>
					</action>
					<action type="setCondition" model="tour_Pages" condition="Name" value="{{$User.userName}}_Tour"/>
					<action type="requeryModel" model="tour_Pages" behavior="standard"/>
					<action type="markRowsForDeletion" model="tour_Pages" affectedrows="all"/>
					<action type="save">
						<models>
							<model>tour_Pages</model>
						</models>
					</action>
					<action type="deactivateCondition" model="tour_Pages" condition="Name"/>
				</actions>
			</actionsequence>
			<actionsequence id="488f9d0f-2c3a-4844-93ed-2d836871db63" label="Create new tour page" type="reusable">
				<description/>
				<actions>
					<action type="emptyModelData">
						<models/>
					</action>
					<action type="createRow" model="tour_Pages" appendorprepend="prepend" defaultmodefornewitems="edit" affectedrows="context">
						<defaults>
							<default valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Name" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{$User.userName}}_Tour"/>
							<default valuesource="fieldvalue" field="skuid__API_Version__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="v2"/>
						</defaults>
					</action>
					<action type="setCondition" model="pgs__NewPage_DuplicateCheck" condition="searchname" value="{{$Model.tour_Pages.data.0.Name}}"/>
					<action type="requeryModel" model="pgs__NewPage_DuplicateCheck" behavior="standard"/>
				</actions>
			</actionsequence>
			<actionsequence id="5f7500ab-b3ea-4ece-8f28-5fdd58cbd1f1" type="reusable" label="Update New User Preference">
				<description>if no preference - create one.  Othewize, update the record to false. </description>
				<actions>
					<action type="branch" whenfinished="continue">
						<formula>{{$Model.userPreferences.data.length}}===0</formula>
						<iftrueactions>
							<action type="createRow" model="userPreferences" appendorprepend="prepend" defaultmodefornewitems="edit" affectedrows="context">
								<defaults>
									<default valuesource="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Default_Builder_Theme__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{$Model.orgPreferences.data.0.skuid__Default_Builder_Theme__c}}"/>
									<default valuesource="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Default_Mobile_Builder_Theme__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{$Model.orgPreferences.data.0.skuid__Default_Mobile_Builder_Theme__c}}"/>
									<default valuesource="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Default_Mobile_Theme__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{$Model.orgPreferences.data.0.skuid__Default_Mobile_Theme__c}}"/>
									<default valuesource="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Default_Theme__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{$Model.orgPreferences.data.0.skuid__Default_Theme__c}}"/>
								</defaults>
							</action>
						</iftrueactions>
					</action>
					<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="userPreferences" affectedrows="context">
						<updates>
							<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="skuid__New_Skuid_User__c" enclosevalueinquotes="false" value="false"/>
						</updates>
					</action>
					<action type="save">
						<models>
							<model>userPreferences</model>
						</models>
					</action>
				</actions>
			</actionsequence>
			<actionsequence id="493e03ba-3fbf-4dcf-bee7-f7924a754a99" label="SelectedNav" type="event-triggered" event-scope="component" event-name="page.rendered">
				<description/>
				<actions>
					<action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="uiControl" affectedrows="context">
						<updates>
							<update valuesource="fieldvalue" field="Selected_Global_Nav" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="HELP"/>
						</updates>
					</action>
				</actions>
			</actionsequence>
		</actionsequences>
