name: SkuidCoreMaster
content:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="false" showheader="true" theme="Modern" personalizationmode="server" globalfeedbackenabled="false" hideeditbutton="true">
  <models>
    <model id="pgs__NewPage" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Page__c" datasource="salesforce" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false" doclone="">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout2__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout3__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout4__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Layout5__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__MasterPage__r.Name"/>
        <field id="CreatedDate"/>
        <field id="skuid__API_Version__c" overridemetadata="true" label="Skuid API Version" displaytype="PICKLIST" length="255" picklistsource="snippet" snippet="skuid.getPageAPIVersionPicklistEntries" required="true"/>
        <field id="skuid__Initial_State__c" uionly="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" label="Starting point" defaultValue="none" picklistsource="manual">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="none" label="Start with a blank page"/>
            <entry value="template" label="Use a page template"/>
            <entry value="masterpage" label="Use a Master Page"/>
            <entry value="from-xml" label="Paste XML from a prebuilt page"/>
            <entry value="from-xml-file" label="Upload XML file"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Page_Template__c" uionly="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" label="Select a Template" defaultValue="tab-page">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="tab-page" label="Object list / tab page, e.g. list of Opportunities"/>
            <entry value="detail-page" label="Record detail page, e.g. Account detail"/>
            <entry value="new-page" label="Page for creating a new record, e.g. new Case"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="skuid__Primary_Object__c" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXT" label="Primary Object" length="255"/>
        <field id="skuid__Page_XML__c" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXTAREA" label="Page XML" length="163840"/>
        <field id="skuid__DataSource__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="TEXT" label="Data Source"/>
        <field id="skuid__DataSourceType__ui" uionly="true" displaytype="PICKLIST" label="Data Source Type" readonly="false" picklistsource="snippet" snippet="skuid.settings.dataSources.getDataSourceTypePicklistEntriesForTemplateSelector" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="salesforce"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" personalizationmode="server" showsidebar="true" useviewportmeta="true" showheader="true"><models/><components/><resources><labels/><javascript/><css/></resources></skuidpage>" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Layout__c"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.pageList.buildLayoutFromTemplate"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>skuid__API_Version__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Initial_State__c</field>
            <field>skuid__MasterPage__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Page_Template__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Page_XML__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Primary_Object__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Type__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.core.snippets.newPageRenderStartingPoint"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>skuid__API_Version__c</field>
            <field>skuid__Type__c</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" affectedrows="context">
              <updates>
                <update valuesource="blank" field="skuid__DataSource__ui"/>
                <update valuesource="blank" field="skuid__Primary_Object__c"/>
              </updates>
            </action>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>skuid__DataSourceType__ui</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" affectedrows="context">
              <updates>
                <update valuesource="blank" field="skuid__Primary_Object__c"/>
              </updates>
            </action>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>row.updated</event>
          </events>
          <fields>
            <field>skuid__DataSource__ui</field>
          </fields>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="pgs_CurrentUser" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" type="" sobject="User" datasourcetype="salesforce" doclone="">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="SmallPhotoUrl"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="userinfo" value="" field="Id" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" userinfotype="userid" state=""/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="pgs__mobilepage" sobject="skuid__Page__c" query="true" limit="1" doclone="" datasource="salesforce" processonclient="true" async="true">
      <fields>
        <field id="Id"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions logic="">
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="Skuid" enclosevalueinquotes="true" field="skuid__Module__c" operator="!="/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="Mobile" field="skuid__Type__c" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" name="IsMobilePage"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="updateRow" fieldmodel="master__LegacyMobileVars" affectedrows="all">
              <updates>
                <update valuesource="formula" field="orgHasLegacyMobilePages">
                  <formula>{{$Model.pgs__mobilepage.data.length}} == 1</formula>
                </update>
              </updates>
            </action>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>models.loaded</event>
          </events>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="master__DataSourceReassign" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false">
      <fields>
        <field id="newName" displaytype="TEXT" label="Replacement Data Source" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue"/>
        <field id="currentName" displaytype="TEXT" label="Current (Invalid) Data Source"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="master__LegacyMobileVars" query="false" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="Ui-Only" processonclient="true" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false">
      <fields>
        <field id="orgHasLegacyMobilePages" displaytype="BOOLEAN" label="Org Has Legacy Mobile Pages" defaultvaluetype="fieldvalue" defaultValue="false"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <components>
    <skuidheaderincludes uniqueid="sk-2pxnU-228"/>
    <pageregion uniqueid="sk-1uFo3V-67" label="region1" cssclass="">
      <styles>
        <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
        <styleitem property="margin" value="17px"/>
      </styles>
    </pageregion>
  </components>
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="v1" filepath="js/builderReqs.js" cachelocation="false" namespace="skuid"/>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="v1" filepath="js/skuidPages/skuidPageUtils.js" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="skuid"/>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="v1" namespace="skuid" filepath="js/skuidPages/skuidPageList.js" cachelocation="false"/>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="v1" filepath="js/skuidPages/skuidCoreMaster.js" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="skuid"/>
    </javascript>
    <css>
      <cssitem location="inline" name="other" cachelocation="false">#sk-1uFo3V-67{
    -webkit-animation: fadein .5s; /* Safari, Chrome and Opera > 12.1 */
    animation: fadein .5s;
}

.nx-page{
    padding: 0 0 10px 0;
}

@keyframes fadein {
    from { opacity: 0; }
    to   { opacity: 1; }
}

/* Safari, Chrome and Opera > 12.1 */
@-webkit-keyframes fadein {
    from { opacity: 0; }
    to   { opacity: 1; }
}

/* If header is present */
.bodyDiv .sk-headerwrapper {
    display: none;
}

.bodyDiv .nx-pagebuilder-toolbar-wrapper-fixed {
    padding: 0 27px;
}

/** legacy IE8 support **/
.sk-ie-legacy .sk-grid-division{
    width: 200px;
    height: 43px;
    display: block;
    float: left;
}
.sk-ie-legacy .sk-master-grid-navigation,
.sk-ie-legacy .sk-master-grid-navigation .sk-navigation{
    width: 450px;
    color: #eee !important;
}
.sk-ie-legacy .sk-master-grid-profpic{
    width: 30px;
}
.sk-ie-legacy .sk-master-grid-logo{
    width: 54px;
}
.sk-ie-legacy .sk-master-grid-division-rightside{
    float: right;
    color: #eee;
}

.sk-ie-legacy .sk-subnavigation,
.sk-ie-legacy .sk-dropnav-dropdown,
.sk-ie-legacy .sk-subnavigation div{
    background: #333 !important;
}

.sk-ie-legacy .sk-master-grid-division-search .ui-autocomplete-input{
    background: #222;
}

.sk-ie-legacy .sk-master-grid-division-search .sk-search-results{
    background: #111;
}</cssitem>
    </css>
    <actionsequences>
      <actionsequence id="82793f2e-b6b1-40dd-93ac-5cc0d7192b5d" label="NewPage - Popup" type="reusable">
        <actions>
          <action type="emptyModelData">
            <models>
              <model>pgs__NewPage</model>
            </models>
          </action>
          <action type="createRow" model="pgs__NewPage" appendorprepend="prepend" defaultmodefornewitems="edit" affectedrows="context">
            <defaults>
              <default type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="none"/>
              <default type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Page_Template__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="tab-page"/>
              <default type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__API_Version__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="v1"/>
            </defaults>
          </action>
          <action type="showPopup" window="self">
            <popup title="Create new Page" width="660px">
              <components>
                <wizard deferstepcontentsrendering="true" buttonslocation="bottom" uniqueid="sk-10set8-247">
                  <steps>
                    <step stepid="step0">
                      <components>
                        <basicfieldeditor showsavecancel="false" showheader="true" model="pgs__NewPage" mode="edit" uniqueid="NewPageEditor" showerrorsinline="true" layout="above">
                          <columns layoutmode="responsive" columngutter="4px" rowgutter="4px">
                            <column behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" ratio="1" minwidth="300px">
                              <sections>
                                <section title="Page setup" collapsible="no">
                                  <fields>
                                    <field uniqueid="sk-Ad0_X-505" id="Name"/>
                                    <field uniqueid="sk-AbQ_C-819" id="skuid__API_Version__c"/>
                                    <field id="skuid__Initial_State__c" type="CUSTOM" required="true" addnoneoption="false" cssclass="" snippet="skuid.core.snippets.newPageStartingPoint" uniqueid="sk-58ubt-358">
                                      <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep"/>
                                    </field>
                                    <field id="skuid__Type__c" required="true" type="RADIO_BUTTONS" uniqueid="sk-58ubt-359">
                                      <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep">
                                        <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" fieldmodel="master__LegacyMobileVars" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="orgHasLegacyMobilePages" value="true"/>
                                        <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="none"/>
                                        <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__API_Version__c" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Page__c" value="v1"/>
                                      </renderconditions>
                                      <enableconditions/>
                                      <label>Page Type</label>
                                    </field>
                                  </fields>
                                  <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                                </section>
                                <section title="Use a Master Page" collapsible="no">
                                  <fields>
                                    <field uniqueid="sk-AdG6M-540" id="skuid__MasterPage__c">
                                      <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep"/>
                                      <enableconditions/>
                                      <filters>
                                        <filter type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false" field="skuid__IsMaster__c" fieldtargetobjects="skuid__Page__c" value="true"/>
                                      </filters>
                                    </field>
                                  </fields>
                                  <renderconditions logictype="and">
                                    <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="pgs__NewPage" sourcetype="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Initial_State__c" value="masterpage"/>
                                  </renderconditions>
                                </section>
                              </sections>
                            </column>
                          </columns>
                          <conditions/>
                          <renderconditions logictype="and"/>

name: SkuidCoreMasterV2
content:
<skuid__page unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="false" showheader="false" theme="Skuid App" personalizationmode="client" globalfeedbackenabled="false" hideeditbutton="true">
	<models>
		<model id="uiControl" limit="20" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" datasource="Ui-Only">
			<fields>
				<field id="Selected_Global_Nav" displaytype="TEXT" length="255"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions/>
			<actions/>
		</model>
		<model id="pgs_CurrentUser" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="salesforce" type="" sobject="User" datasourcetype="salesforce" doclone="">
			<fields>
				<field id="Name"/>
				<field id="SmallPhotoUrl"/>
			</fields>
			<conditions>
				<condition type="userinfo" value="" field="Id" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" userinfotype="userid" state=""/>
			</conditions>
			<actions/>
		</model>
	</models>
	<components>
		<skuid__wrapper uniqueid="wrapper-enforcing-full-page-min-height" minHeight="custom" minHeightCustom="calc(100vh - 56px)">
			<components>
		<skuid__pageRegion uniqueid="sk-1uFo3V-67" label="region1"/>
	</components>
			<styles>
				<spacing/>
			</styles>
			<background/>
		</skuid__wrapper>
	</components>
	<pageregioncontents>
		<pageregioncontent uniqueid="__header">
			<components>
				<skuid__layoutRegion sticky="true" uniqueid="header-layout-region">
					<components>
						<skuid__masthead uniqueid="masthead-with-main-nav">
							<divisions>
								<division type="logo" flex="0" minWidth="80px">
									<components>
										<skuid__image source="staticresource" uniqueid="image-skuid-logo-composer-light" datasource="salesforce" resource="skuid__SkuidLogo_LightBgSVG" alt="Skuid Central" imageWidth="32px">
											<interactions>
												<interaction type="tap">
													<action type="redirect" window="self" url="/apex/skuid__SkuidCentral"/>
												</interaction>
											</interactions>
											<renderConditions logictype="and">
												<renderCondition type="fieldvalue" sourcetype="designSystem" operator="!=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="Ink Composer Dark"/>
											</renderConditions>
											<styles>
												<spacing left="2" right="1"/>
											</styles>
										</skuid__image>
										<skuid__image source="staticresource" uniqueid="image-skuid-logo-composer-dark" datasource="salesforce" resource="skuid__SkuidLogoCustomHeader" alt="Skuid Central" imageWidth="32px">
											<interactions>
												<interaction type="tap">
													<action type="redirect" window="self" url="/apex/skuid__SkuidCentral"/>
												</interaction>
											</interactions>
											<renderConditions logictype="and">
												<renderCondition type="fieldvalue" sourcetype="designSystem" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="Ink Composer Dark"/>
											</renderConditions>
									<styles>

															</selectedConditions>
															<styleVariantConditions/>

														<item label="SETTINGS" uniqueid="sk-UDE-555">

								</division>
								<division type="search" flex="0" minWidth="auto">
									<components>
										<skuid__search uniqueid="search-main-nav" soslFields="All Fields" placeholder="Search Skuid" minWidth="220px">
											<objects>
												<object id="skuid__Page__c" datasource="salesforce" displayTemplate="{{Name}}">
													<fields>
														<field id="Name"/>
														<field id="LastModifiedDate"/>
														<field id="LastModifiedBy.Name"/>
													</fields>
													<conditions>
														<condition type="fieldvalue" value="Skuid" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="!=" field="skuid__Module__c"/>
													</conditions>
													<resultActions>
														<action label="Edit Page" icon="sk-webicon-ink:edit">
															<actions>
																<action type="redirect" window="self" url="/apex/skuid__PageBuilder?id={{Id}}"/>
															</actions>
														</action>
														<action label="Preview" icon="sk-webicon-ink:preview">
															<actions>
																<action type="custom" snippet="skuid.core.actions.previewPage"/>
															</actions>
														</action>
													</resultActions>
												</object>
											</objects>
											<resultActions/>
											<hotkeys>
												<hotkey modifiers="ctrl,shift" key="l"/>
												<hotkey modifiers="meta,shift" key="l"/>
											</hotkeys>
											<styles>
												<spacing left="2" right="2"/>
											</styles>
										</skuid__search>
									</components>
									<styles>
										<spacing/>
									</styles>
								</division>
								<division type="logo" flex="0" minWidth="32px">
									<components>
										<skuid__image source="url" height="custom" heightCustom="100%" datasource="salesforce" model="pgs_CurrentUser" url="{{$Model.pgs_CurrentUser.data.0.SmallPhotoUrl}}" styleSettingsVariant="e84637e9-e395-4b14-9707-36f937394df8" imageWidth="32px"/>
									</components>
									<styles>
										<spacing/>
									</styles>
								</division>
								<division type="navigation" flex="0" minWidth="auto">
									<components>
										<skuid__navigation uniqueid="nav-user-menu" source="sfusermenu" type="dropdown" label="{{$User.name}}" fsBlock="true">
											<styles>
												<spacing/>
											</styles>
										</skuid__navigation>
									</components>
									<styles>
										<spacing right="2"/>
									</styles>
								</division>
							</divisions>
						</skuid__masthead>
					</components>
					<styles>
						<spacing/>
					</styles>
					<background/>
				</skuid__layoutRegion>
			</components>
		</pageregioncontent>
	</pageregioncontents>
	<resources>
		<javascript>
			<jsitem location="staticresource" name="next" namespace="skuid" filepath="js/builderReqs.js"/>
			<jsitem location="staticresource" name="next" namespace="skuid" filepath="js/skuidPages/skuidPageUtils.js"/>
			<jsitem location="staticresource" name="next" namespace="skuid" filepath="js/skuidPages/skuidCoreMaster.js"/>
		</javascript>
		<actionsequences uniqueid="sk-18o-2-463"/>
		<labels/>
	</resources>
	<styles>
		<styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
	</styles>
</skuid__page>

name: SkuidSettings
content:

																					</actions>

name: ThemeBuilder
content:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" hideeditbutton="true" globalfeedbackenabled="false">
  <models>
    <model id="Theme" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="skuid__Theme__c" datasourcetype="" type="">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Resource_Name__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Resource_Namespace__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="param" enclosevalueinquotes="true" operator="=" field="Id" value="id"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="ThemeClone" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="" type="" sobject="skuid__Theme__c" doclone="" unloadwarningifunsavedchanges="false">
      <fields>
        <field id="skuid__Active__c"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="skuid__Resource_Name__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Resource_Namespace__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Type__c"/>
        <field id="skuid__Skuid_Version_Date__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions/>
          <events>
            <event>models.saved</event>
          </events>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="ThemeResource" limit="1" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" sobject="StaticResource" doclone="" type="" datasourcetype="">
      <fields>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="NamespacePrefix"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
        <field id="SystemModstamp"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions logic="">
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="" field="Name" operator="=" model="Theme" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="skuid__Resource_Name__c" novaluebehavior="deactivate"/>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="" field="NamespacePrefix" operator="=" model="Theme" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="skuid__Resource_Namespace__c" novaluebehavior="deactivate" state=""/>
      </conditions>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="Page" limit="20" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="" type="" sobject="skuid__Page__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="Id"/>
        <field id="Name"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
    <model id="PreviewPage" limit="" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="" type="" sobject="skuid__Theme__c">
      <fields>
        <field id="PreviewPage" uionly="true" displaytype="REFERENCE" label="Preview Page" targetobjects="skuid__Page__c"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
      <actions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <pageregioncontents>
    <pageregioncontent regionid="sk-1uFo3V-67" uniqueid="sk-Ce2Pn-57">
      <components>
        <themecomposer/>
        <pagetitle model="Theme" cssclass="" uniqueid="tb-buttons">
          <actions>
            <action type="multi" icon="sk-icon-clone" label="{{$Label.Clone}}" cssclass="tb-title-button">
              <actions>
                <action type="custom" snippet="z99"/>
                <action type="emptyModelData">
                  <models>
                    <model>ThemeClone</model>
                  </models>
                </action>
                <action type="createRow" model="ThemeClone" appendorprepend="prepend" defaultmodefornewitems="edit">
                  <defaults>
                    <default type="fieldvalue" field="Name" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{$Model.Theme.data.0.Name}} (Clone)"/>
                    <default type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Resource_Name__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="clone_{{$Model.Theme.data.0.skuid__Resource_Name__c}}"/>
                    <default type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Resource_Namespace__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{$Model.Theme.data.0.skuid__Resource_Namespace__c}}"/>
                    <default type="fieldvalue" value="{{$Model.Theme.data.0.skuid__Type__c}}" field="skuid__Type__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true"/>
                    <default type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Active__c" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
                    <default type="fieldvalue" field="skuid__Skuid_Version_Date__c" enclosevalueinquotes="true" value="{{$Model.Theme.data.0.skuid__Skuid_Version_Date__c}}"/>
                  </defaults>
                </action>
                <action type="showPopup">
                  <popup title="Clone Theme" width="50%">
                    <components>
                      <pagetitle model="ThemeClone" uniqueid="sk-7xGOm-427">
                        <maintitle>Clone Theme</maintitle>
                        <subtitle>
                          <template>{{Model.label}}</template>
                        </subtitle>
                        <actions>
                          <action type="multi" rollbackonanyerror="true" icon="sk-icon-save" label="Save">
                            <actions>
                              <action type="save">
                                <models>
                                  <model>ThemeClone</model>
                                </models>
                              </action>
                              <action type="custom" snippet="skuid.themeBuilder.clone">
                                <onerroractions>
                                  <action type="closeAllPopups" message="There was an error" timeout="3000"/>
                                  <action type="blockUI" message="Unable to create static resource (one with this name may already exist)" timeout="2000"/>
                                  <action type="markRowsForDeletion" message="There was an error" timeout="3000" model="ThemeClone"/>
                                  <action type="save" message="There was an error" timeout="3000">
                                    <onerroractions/>
                                    <models>
                                      <model>ThemeClone</model>
                                    </models>
                                  </action>
                                </onerroractions>
                              </action>
                              <action type="closeAllPopups"/>
                              <action type="showPopup">
                                <popup title="Clone Theme" width="50%">
                                  <components>
                                    <pagetitle uniqueid="sk-1rxnJt-243" model="ThemeClone">
                                      <maintitle>Cloning Finished</maintitle>
                                      <subtitle>
                                        <template>{{Model.label}}</template>
                                      </subtitle>
                                      <actions/>
                                    </pagetitle>
                                    <pagetitle uniqueid="sk-1rxrZC-255" model="ThemeClone">
                                      <actions>
                                        <action type="multi" label="Open Theme" icon="sk-icon-table-edit">
                                          <actions>
                                            <action type="redirect" window="blank" url="/apex/skuid__EditTheme?id={{$Model.ThemeClone.data.0.Id}}"/>
                                            <action type="closeAllPopups"/>
                                          </actions>
                                        </action>
                                        <action type="multi" label="Stay Here" secondary="true" icon="sk-icon-cancel">
                                          <actions>
                                            <action type="closeAllPopups"/>
                                          </actions>
                                        </action>
                                      </actions>
                                    </pagetitle>
                                  </components>
                                </popup>
                              </action>
                            </actions>
                          </action>
                          <action type="multi" icon="sk-icon-cancel" label="Cancel" window="self" secondary="true">
                            <hotkeys/>
                            <actions>
                              <action type="cancel">
                                <models>
                                  <model>ThemeClone</model>
                                </models>
                              </action>
                              <action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
                            </actions>
                          </action>
                        </actions>
                      </pagetitle>
                      <basicfieldeditor showheader="true" showsavecancel="false" showerrorsinline="true" model="ThemeClone" buttonposition="" uniqueid="sk-7xB19-398" mode="edit">
                        <columns>
                          <column width="100%">
                            <sections>
                              <section title="Theme Properties" collapsible="no">
                                <fields>
                                  <field id="Name" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"/>
                                  <field id="skuid__Resource_Name__c" valuehalign="" type=""/>
                                  <field id="skuid__Active__c"/>
                                </fields>
                              </section>
                            </sections>
                          </column>
                        </columns>
                      </basicfieldeditor>
                    </components>
                  </popup>
                </action>
              </actions>
            </action>
            <action type="multi" label="{{$Label.Preview}}" uniqueid="tb-button-preview" icon="sk-icon-photoview" cssclass="tb-title-button" snippet="skuid.pageList.previewPage">
              <actions>
                <action type="custom" snippet="z99"/>
                <action type="emptyModelData">
                  <models>
                    <model>PreviewPage</model>
                  </models>
                </action>
                <action type="createRow" model="PreviewPage" appendorprepend="prepend" defaultmodefornewitems="edit"/>
                <action type="showPopup">
                  <popup title="Preview Theme" width="50%">
                    <components>
                      <pagetitle uniqueid="1425600897111-939" model="PreviewPage">
                        <actions>
                          <action type="multi" label="Preview" icon="sk-icon-photoview">
                            <actions>
                              <action type="custom" snippet="previewPage"/>
                              <action type="closeTopmostPopup"/>
                            </actions>
                          </action>
                        </actions>
                        <maintitle>Select a Page to use for previewing this Theme</maintitle>
                      </pagetitle>
                      <basicfieldeditor showheader="true" showsavecancel="false" model="PreviewPage" buttonposition="" uniqueid="1425599342195-276" mode="edit" layout="">
                        <columns>
                          <column width="100%">
                            <sections>
                              <section title="Section A" collapsible="no" showheader="false">
                                <fields>
                                  <field id="PreviewPage" valuehalign="" type=""/>
                                </fields>
                              </section>
                            </sections>
                          </column>
                        </columns>
                      </basicfieldeditor>
                    </components>
                  </popup>
                </action>
              </actions>
              <hotkeys>
                <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="p"/>
                <hotkey modifiers="meta" key="p"/>
              </hotkeys>
            </action>
            <action type="multi" label="{{$Label.Save}}" icon="sk-icon-save" uniqueid="tb-button-save" cssclass="tb-title-button">
              <hotkeys>
                <hotkey modifiers="ctrl" key="s"/>
                <hotkey modifiers="meta" key="s"/>
              </hotkeys>
              <actions>
                <action type="publish" event="skuid.themeBuilder.save"/>
              </actions>
            </action>
            <action type="multi" label="{{$Label.Cancel}}" window="self" icon="sk-icon-cancel" uniqueid="tb-button-cancel" cssclass="tb-title-button">
              <actions>
                <action type="publish" event="skuid.themeBuilder.cancel" snippet="skuid.themeBuilder.cancel">
                  <models>
                    <model>Theme</model>
                  </models>
                </action>
              </actions>
              <hotkeys/>
            </action>
          </actions>
          <maintitle>Editing Theme: {{Name}}</maintitle>
        </pagetitle>
        <wrapper uniqueid="tb-wrapper">
          <components>
            <panelset type="standard" uniqueid="1425337927715-490" scroll="">
              <panels>
                <panel type="left" width="124px">
                  <components>
                    <template multiple="false" model="" uniqueid="1425337307497-390" allowhtml="true">
                      <contents><div id="tb-nav">
<ul>
<li pane-label="Global"tab-id="Global">Global</li>
<li pane-label="Header"tab-id="Header">Header</li>

                      <renderconditions logictype="and">
                        <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="true" fieldmodel="Theme" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceparam="type" value="Mobile" field="skuid__Type__c"/>
                      </renderconditions>
                    </template>

                      <contents><div id="tb-nav">
<ul>
<li pane-label="Global"tab-id="tb-preview-global">Global</li>

                      <renderconditions logictype="and">
                        <rendercondition type="fieldvalue" fieldmodel="Theme" sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" sourceparam="type" enclosevalueinquotes="true" sourceproperty="hasRows" operator="=" field="skuid__Type__c" value="Desktop"/>
                      </renderconditions>
                    </template>
                  </components>
                </panel>
                <panel uniqueid="tb-preview" cssclass="">
                  <components/>
                </panel>
              </panels>
              <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
            </panelset>
            <panelset type="standard" uniqueid="sk-8cHMu-139" scroll="" cssclass="tb-preview ">
              <panels>
                <panel type="right" width="280px">
                  <components/>

                <panel>

                      <contents><iframe id="tb-iframe" class="display-none" width="100%", height="100%" src="/apex/skuid__ThemelessPage?page=ThemeBuilderDesktop_IFRAME"/></contents>

    <css>
      <cssitem location="inline" name="extra" cachelocation="false">.tb-preview iframe{
    overflow-x: hidden;
    border: none;
}
.tb-iframe-mobile{
    margin-left: 124px;
    border: none;
}
.nx-editor-contents{
    margin: 0;
}
.nx-page{
    padding: 0 !important;
}
.nx-panel{
    min-height: 0px;
}

.tb-iframe-mobile {
    margin-left: 129px;
}
.sk-headerwrapper{
    z-index: 202;
}
.nx-page-content{
    padding: 0 !important;
}</cssitem>
    </css>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="Snippets" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
    
	var $ = skuid.$,
	    registerSnippet = skuid.snippet.registerSnippet;
	
	// Utility functions for changing z-index
	registerSnippet('z99',function(){
	   $('#tb-holder').addClass('z99');
	   $('#tb-nav').addClass('z99');
	});
	
	registerSnippet('removeZ99',function(){
	   $('#tb-holder').removeClass('z99');
	   $('#tb-nav').removeClass('z99');
	});
	
	// Preview page
    registerSnippet('previewPage',function(){
        var params = arguments[0],
            pagePreview = skuid.snippet.get('skuid.builder.page.preview'),
            pageModel = skuid.$M('Page'),
            pageRow = params.row.PreviewPage__r;
        pageModel.adoptRow(pageRow);
        pagePreview && pagePreview({
            model: pageModel,
            row: pageRow,
            // Specify that we want to preview in context of a particular theme
            params: {
                usetheme: skuid.$M('Theme').data[0].Name
            }
        });
    });
	
})(skuid);</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="iframeResizer" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload', function(){
		$('#tb-iframe').css('height', window.innerHeight-128 + 'px');
		$('#tb-holder').css('height', window.innerHeight-110 + 'px');
	});
	$( window ).resize(function() {
	    $('#tb-iframe').css('height', window.innerHeight-128 + 'px');
	    $('#tb-holder').css('height', window.innerHeight-110 + 'px');
	});
})(skuid);</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="AceEditor" cachelocation="true" namespace="skuid" filepath="ace.js"/>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="v1" cachelocation="false" namespace="skuid" filepath="js/lib/less.js"/>
    </javascript>
  </resources>
</skuidpage>

name: ThemeBuilderDesktop_IFRAME
content:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" showsidebar="true" showheader="true" personalizationmode="client" hideeditbutton="true" globalfeedbackenabled="false">
  <models>
    <model id="Sample" limit="20" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" datasourcetype="Ui-Only" processonclient="true" type="">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Name"/>
        <field id="Industry" displaytype="TEXT" label="Industry"/>
        <field id="Description" displaytype="TEXT" label="Description"/>
        <field id="AnnualRevenue" displaytype="TEXT" label="AnnualRevenue"/>
        <field id="BillingState" displaytype="TEXT" label="BillingState"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" field="Industry" operator="=" inactive="true" enclosevalueinquotes="true" name="__autofilter__Industry" state="filterableoff" value=""/>
        <condition type="blank" value="null" field="Id" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="publish" event="skuid:themeBuilder:createDataInModel:Sample"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>models.saved</event>
            <event>models.loaded</event>
            <event>models.cancelled</event>
          </events>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="SampleSingle" limit="20" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" datasourcetype="Ui-Only" processonclient="true" type="">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Name"/>
        <field id="Industry" displaytype="TEXT" label="Industry"/>
        <field id="Description" displaytype="TEXT" label="Description"/>
        <field id="tags" displaytype="MULTIPICKLIST" label="Tags" defaultValue="west">
          <picklistentries>
            <entry value="west" label="West"/>
            <entry value="New Entry" label="Central"/>
            <entry value="New Entry" label="East"/>
            <entry value="New Entry" label="International"/>
            <entry value="New Entry" label="Big"/>
            <entry value="New Entry" label="Medium"/>
            <entry value="New Entry" label="Small"/>
            <entry value="New Entry" label="Non-Profit"/>
          </picklistentries>
        </field>
        <field id="Date" displaytype="DATE" label="Date"/>
        <field id="Datetime" displaytype="DATETIME" label="Datetime"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" field="Industry" operator="=" inactive="true" enclosevalueinquotes="true" name="__autofilter__Industry" state="filterableoff" value=""/>
        <condition type="blank" value="null" field="Id" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="publish" event="skuid:themeBuilder:createDataInModel:SampleSingle"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>models.saved</event>
            <event>models.loaded</event>
            <event>models.cancelled</event>
          </events>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="SampleEvents" limit="10" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" datasourcetype="Ui-Only" processonclient="true" type="">
      <fields>
        <field id="Subject" displaytype="TEXT" label="Subject"/>
        <field id="StartDateTime" displaytype="DATETIME" label="StartDateTime"/>
        <field id="EndDateTime" displaytype="DATETIME" label="EndDateTime"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="blank" value="null" field="Id" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="publish" event="skuid.themeBuilder.createDataInModel.SampleEvents"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>models.saved</event>
            <event>models.loaded</event>
            <event>models.cancelled</event>

name: ThemeBuilderMobile_IFRAME
content:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="" theme="" hideeditbutton="true" globalfeedbackenabled="false">
  <models>
    <model id="Sample" limit="0" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="Ui-Only" datasource="Ui-Only">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Name"/>
        <field id="Industry" displaytype="TEXT" label="Industry"/>
        <field id="Description" displaytype="TEXT" label="Description"/>
        <field id="IsDeleted" displaytype="TEXT" label="IsDeleted"/>
        <field id="AnnualRevenue" displaytype="TEXT" label="AnnualRevenue"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
    </model>
    <model id="SampleSingle" limit="0" query="true" createrowifnonefound="false" datasource="Ui-Only" datasourcetype="Ui-Only">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Name"/>
        <field id="Industry" displaytype="TEXT" label="Industry"/>
        <field id="Description" displaytype="TEXT" label="Description"/>
        <field id="IsDeleted" displaytype="TEXT" label="IsDeleted"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
    </model>
    <model id="SampleNew" limit="0" query="true" createrowifnonefound="true" datasourcetype="Ui-Only" datasource="Ui-Only">
      <fields>
        <field id="Name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Name"/>
        <field id="Description" displaytype="TEXT" label="Description"/>
        <field id="Industry" displaytype="TEXT" label="Industry"/>
        <field id="IsDeleted" displaytype="TEXT" label="IsDeleted"/>
        <field id="OwnerId" displaytype="TEXT" label="OwnerId"/>
        <field id="Owner.Name" displaytype="TEXT" label="Owner.Name"/>
        <field id="CreatedDate" displaytype="DATE" label="CreatedDate"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
    </model>
    <model id="SampleEvents" limit="" query="false" createrowifnonefound="true" datasourcetype="Ui-Only" datasource="Ui-Only">
      <fields>
        <field id="Subject" displaytype="TEXT" label="Subject"/>
        <field id="StartDateTime" displaytype="DATETIME" label="StartDateTime"/>
        <field id="EndDateTime" displaytype="DATETIME" label="EndDateTime"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="blank" value="null" field="Id" operator="=" enclosevalueinquotes="false"/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="publish" event="skuid.themeBuilder.createDataInModel.SampleEvents"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>models.saved</event>
            <event>models.loaded</event>
            <event>models.cancelled</event>
          </events>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
    <model id="SampleOpportunities" limit="" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="Ui-Only" datasource="Ui-Only">
      <fields>
        <field id="Id" displaytype="TEXT" label="Id"/>
        <field id="Amount" displaytype="TEXT" label="Amount"/>
        <field id="CloseDate" displaytype="TEXT" label="CloseDate"/>
        <field id="FiscalYear" displaytype="TEXT" label="FiscalYear"/>
        <field id="FiscalQuarter" displaytype="TEXT" label="FiscalQuarter"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
    </model>
    <model id="SampleGeoChartAccounts" limit="" query="false" createrowifnonefound="false" datasourcetype="Ui-Only" datasource="Ui-Only">
      <fields>
        <field id="BillingState" displaytype="TEXT" label="BillingState"/>
        <field id="Id" displaytype="TEXT" label="Id"/>
        <field id="AnnualRevenue" displaytype="TEXT" label="AnnualRevenue"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions/>
    </model>
  </models>
  <components>
    <skuidmobile>
      <mobilepanels>
        <mobilepanel minwidth="200" uniqueid="Global">
          <components>
            <mobiletitle>
              <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
              <contents>New Sample Panel</contents>
            </mobiletitle>
            <mobiledeck showsavecancel="true" searchmethod="server" searchbox="true" tokenizesearch="true" createrecords="true" precision="1" minwidth="400" model="SampleNew" mode="edit" emptysearchbehavior="query">
              <components>
                <mobilefield id="Name" valuehalign="" type="">
                  <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep"/>
                  <enableconditions logictype="and"/>
                </mobilefield>
                <mobilefield id="Industry" valuehalign="" type="">
                  <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep"/>
                  <enableconditions logictype="and"/>
                </mobilefield>
                <mobilefield id="Description" valuehalign="" type="">
                  <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep"/>
                  <enableconditions logictype="and"/>
                </mobilefield>
                <mobilefield id="IsDeleted" valuehalign="" type="">
                  <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep"/>
                  <enableconditions logictype="and"/>
                  <label>Checkbox</label>
                </mobilefield>
              </components>
              <searchfields/>
              <aftersaveactions/>
              <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
              <conditions/>
              <cardtitle>New Sample</cardtitle>
            </mobiledeck>
            <template><script>skuid.events.publish('firstPanelLoaded', []);</script></template>
          </components>
          <interactions/>
        </mobilepanel>
        <mobilepanel minwidth="200" uniqueid="Title">
          <components>
            <mobiletitle>
              <contents>A Sample Title</contents>
              <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
            </mobiletitle>
          </components>
        </mobilepanel>
        <mobilepanel minwidth="200" uniqueid="Header">
          <components/>
        </mobilepanel>
        <mobilepanel minwidth="200" uniqueid="Buttons">
          <components>
            <mobilegrid precision="1" minwidth="200">
              <divisions>
                <division size="1" type="flex">
                  <components>
                    <mobilebutton label="A Nav Button" style="nav" icon="sk-icon-lead">
                      <actions/>
                      <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                      <enableconditions logictype="and"/>
                    </mobilebutton>
                  </components>
                  <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
                </division>

    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="extras" cachelocation="false" url="">
(function(skuid){
    var $ = skuid.$;
    
    // This event is published from a template on the global
    // because $.ready fires too early
    skuid.events.subscribe('firstPanelLoaded', function(){
        if(!this.executed){
            this.executed = true;
            $('input[type="checkbox"]').removeAttr('disabled');
        }
    });
    
    
    skuid.events.subscribe('skuid.mobile.mainPanelSet', function(tabId){
        $('input[type="checkbox"]').removeAttr('disabled');
    });
})(skuid);
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="readyAlert" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
    var pageRendered = false;
  skuid.tbIframe = {
    onePageRender: function(callback){
        if(pageRendered){
            callback();
        }
        else{
            skuid.events.subscribe('page.rendered', callback);
        }
    }  
  };
  skuid.events.subscribe('page.rendered', function(){
      pageRendered = true;
  });
})(skuid);</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="v1" namespace="skuid" cachelocation="false" filepath="js/lib/html2Canvas.js"/>
